title: Third Grade Learning Games
description:
21 fun and educational games to help your child learn 3rd Grade lessons! Teach Third Grade lessons like multiplication, division, grammar, geometry, sentences, reading, rounding, science, STEM, place values, and more. Whether they are just starting Third Grade, or need to review and master the subjects, this is a perfect learning tool for kids aged 7-10. Math, language, science, STEM, reading, and critical thinking skills are all tested and practiced in these games.

All lessons and activities are designed using real third grade curriculums, so you can be sure these games will help give your child a boost in the classroom. And with helpful voice narration and exciting games, your 3rd grade student won't want to stop playing and learning! Improve your child's homework with these 3rd grade teacher approved lessons, including science, STEM, language, and math.

These learning games include dozens of important lessons for third grade, including:
‚Ä¢ Decimals and Fractions - Convert from decimals to fractions, and add decimals
‚Ä¢ Multiplication - Word problems, solve for x problems, multiply 3-factor and more
‚Ä¢ Geometry - Perimeter, area, and different types of angles
‚Ä¢ Measurement - Measure length, volume, temperature, and time
‚Ä¢ Division - Basic division and word problems
‚Ä¢ Rounding - Round numbers to the nearest 10 or 100, and identify place values
‚Ä¢ Sentence Jumble - Help with reading compression and grammar
‚Ä¢ Parts of Speech - Adverbs, pronouns, prepositions, adjectives, nouns, and verbs
‚Ä¢ Syllables - Sound out words to figure out how many syllables they have
‚Ä¢ Grammar and Tense - Learn the difference between past, present, and future tense
‚Ä¢ Analogies - Compare words to complete the analogy
‚Ä¢ Prefixes - Use a prefix to build words in a fun asteroid space game
‚Ä¢ Food Chain - Identify types of animal and their role in the food chain
‚Ä¢ Solar System - Learn about the planets and bodies in our solar system
‚Ä¢ Water Cycle - Study the phases of the water cycle and how they interact
‚Ä¢ Sound and Hearing - Understand what sound is and how the ear works
‚Ä¢ Nutrition - Identify types of food and build a healthy plate
‚Ä¢ Recycling and Energy - Learn why recycling is important and where energy comes from
‚Ä¢ Timed Facts - Quickly answer third grade math facts to earn baseballs to hit
‚Ä¢ Reading - Read 3rd grade level articles and answer questions
‚Ä¢ Erosion - Learn the causes and effects of erosion

Perfect for 3rd grade kids and students who need a fun and entertaining educational game to play. This bundle of games helps your child learn important math, grammar, spelling, multiplication, language, science, and problem solving skills used in third grade all while having fun! 3rd Grade teachers around the world use this app in their classroom to help reinforce math, language, and STEM subjects.

Ages: 7, 8, 9, and 10 year old children and students.

=====================================

PROBLEMS WITH THE GAME? 
If you are having any issues please email us at help@rosimosi.com and we will get it fixed for you ASAP.

LEAVE US A REVIEW!
If you're enjoying the game then we'd love for you to leave us a review! Reviews help small developers like us to keep improving the game.

summary: 21 fun and educational games for 3rd Grade!

scraped_reviews.content: Subscription required for the free trial! There are 3 days free in the trial, sure, but app could give those 3 days free without automatically rolling into a subscription. Or app could make some of the games open for free, always, so we could try. I hate my time wasted by bait and switch tactics. If I can give a -1 star, I would. UPDATE: Fair dev response and I upped my rating. Maybe it was me, but I saw no way to get to the free games. Everything was locked. I'll try again if I get time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, as the description says we offer the first couple games for free so that parents can see the type of content they're buying. There is a small fee to unlock the game. We think it's a good deal for the amount of content and games you receive.

scraped_reviews.content: Invested in my child by purchasing the annual subscription but you can also purchase the standalone apps. Excellent content, my child can play & navigate by herself & I can monitor her progress. It's worth it $$$. No pesky pop-ups & their customer service is professional & responsive. Try the free games to decide if it's for you but I doubt you'll regret getting this! Fun way for kids to learn & there are so many topics. Great product, they obviously put alot of thought & effort into it.

A few months ago after I had purchased the game, i lost my log in info and couldn't get back on. After I got ahold of someone at customer service, i was immediately helped and was able to get my account restored. Great customer service! Not only that, the games are great 3rd grade level and my daughter loves the app!

A game like this should not be $3.99! If I made this game it would be $1.00. NOBODY SHOULD WANT A GAME SO WIRED FOR 3.99!!! Its teaches a lot and it's more challenging than I thought. And the voice of the game is too robotic, so this rate should DEFINITELY help you. The way I feel about the game is üòîüëå.

This could be a good game. I suggest changing the recommended age. This is currently advertised for ages 6 to 12, and this is certainly not suitable for the younger end of that range. Also, once the child gets into the game they are asked for money to continue. Either make this a free or paid game upfront and eliminate any monetary deception.

title: Fitbit
description:
See the big picture on your health and fitness journey with the Fitbit app. Find easy ways to get active, sleep better, stress less and eat healthier.

Track the stats you care about across health, fitness and sleep, and change your goals as your routines evolve. Stay motivated with energizing workout content for your body and mind. See how far you‚Äôve come with a glance at your personal goal progress and how you stack up to friends and family. Unlock even more possibilities when you sync up with a wearable device like Fitbit tracker or smartwatch and see how your activity, sleep, nutrition and stress all fit together.

GET MORE ACTIVE: See how small moves add up by using your smartphone to track steps and distance‚Äîor pair with a Fitbit tracker or Wear OS by Google smartwatch to record your heart rate, Active Zone Minutes, calories burned and more. Leverage tiles and complications to easily access your stats.It‚Äôs a fitness planner in your pocket: Use the app as a diary to set goals and track your progress. Plus, that motivation you‚Äôve been looking for is right in the app. Bring the gym home with a curated list of audio and video workouts that you can do at your own pace, right from your living room.* You‚Äôll find sessions for HIIT, cardio, strength, running, biking, yoga and more.

TRACK YOUR HEART HEALTH: Understand your overall health by using your watch or tracker to keep tabs on your heart rate 24/7. Monitor your heart rhythm and see your resting heart rate trends, plus time spent in heart rate zones during workouts.

SLEEP BETTER: Find sleep tools to help you learn about your sleep quality and improve it‚Äîfrom  measuring your sleep duration and sleep stages to understanding your restless time. Set reminders for bedtime and wake-up time to keep your sleeping schedule managed.

STRESS LESS: Listen to audio sessions to lessen stress and improve your mood. Use mindfulness to start your day a better way, find moments of calm and set intentions with meditation or get help falling asleep with breathing exercises and relaxing sounds.*

EAT SMARTER: Keep your diet in check with easy-to-use tools for setting goals. Tracking meals and logging food & water intake lets you see if you‚Äôre getting enough protein, fat, fiber and carbs on your way to managing your weight and overall health.

EVEN MORE WITH FITBIT PREMIUM: Upgrade to Fitbit Premium and get all the guidance, insights and inspiration you need to take your workout routine to the next level.

‚Ä¢ Your Daily Readiness Score helps you understand when it‚Äôs time to go all out and when it‚Äôs time for rest & recovery‚Äîplus, you‚Äôll get recommended workouts based on your body‚Äôs needs.
‚Ä¢ Get the support you need across a whole library of workouts to keep your mind and body fit‚Äîfrom strength training, HIIT and cycling to dance cardio, yoga, meditation and more‚Äîled by Fitbit‚Äôs expert trainers who are ready to coach.
‚Ä¢ Perfect your mindfulness practice with a full library of sessions that calm anxiety, prep for sleep and even help you meditate while walking.
‚Ä¢ Find new ways to rest & recover with your Sleep Score. Plus, check out your sleep patterns and monthly trends in your Sleep Profile.
‚Ä¢ Feed your appetite with access to easy, healthy recipes to help you reach your nutrition goals and bring your wellness full circle.


*A Fitbit Premium subscription is required to access the full content library.

Some Fitbit devices let you handle calls and texts right from your wrist so permissions might be required during setup.

EAT SMARTER: Keep your diet in check with easy-to-use tools for setting goals. Tracking meals and logging food & water intake lets you see if you‚Äôre getting enough protein, fat, fiber and carbs on your way to managing your weight and overall health.

EVEN MORE WITH FITBIT PREMIUM: Upgrade to Fitbit Premium and get all the guidance, insights and inspiration you need to take your workout routine to the next level.

‚Ä¢ Your Daily Readiness Score helps you understand when it‚Äôs time to go all out and when it‚Äôs time for rest & recovery‚Äîplus, you‚Äôll get recommended workouts based on your body‚Äôs needs.
‚Ä¢ Get the support you need across a whole library of workouts to keep your mind and body fit‚Äîfrom strength training, HIIT and cycling to dance cardio, yoga, meditation and more‚Äîled by Fitbit‚Äôs expert trainers who are ready to coach.
‚Ä¢ Perfect your mindfulness practice with a full library of sessions that calm anxiety, prep for sleep and even help you meditate while walking.
‚Ä¢ Find new ways to rest & recover with your Sleep Score. Plus, check out your sleep patterns and monthly trends in your Sleep Profile.
‚Ä¢ Feed your appetite with access to easy, healthy recipes to help you reach your nutrition goals and bring your wellness full circle.


*A Fitbit Premium subscription is required to access the full content library.

Some Fitbit devices let you handle calls and texts right from your wrist so permissions might be required during setup.
summary: Fitbit is dedicated to helping people lead healthier, more active lives.

scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Laertes. Sorry to hear this and appreciate the troubleshooting. Please try to log out, force quit the app, restart your mobile phone and log back in. If the issue persists, reach out to support: https://goo.gle/contactfitbit

scraped_reviews.content: The app keeps failing on sync. I have to restart the phone to make it work again, which leads me to believe it's a bug in the app.\n UPDATE: It seems the late Oct 2025 bug fix has improved the sync problems. Although it still happens, it is less often. By the way, the easiest way for me to recover if it gets stuck in sync is to "Force stop" the app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Edwin. We're sorry to hear this. We appreciate your feedback and the troubleshooting steps you have tried. For more info about syncing, please see https://goo.gle/4mmWRHy. For further assistance, please contact our support team at https://goo.gle/contactfitbit.

scraped_reviews.content: I've used this app for 9 years. You'd think with Google behind it technical problems wouldn't be the main issue, because they have plenty of resources to fix them. You'd be wrong. Info WITHIN THE APP won't sync, like calories burned syncing to the food tracking charts, and there's no excuse for that. This is a known issue that they STILL haven't fixed. I'm finally looking for alternatives and will not be returning once my current Fitbit dies.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Aimee. We're sorry to hear this. We recommend trying these syncing tips: https://support.google.com/fitbit/answer/14236618 For further help, reach out through phone, chat, social support, or through our community forums at: https://goo.gle/contactfitbit

scraped_reviews.content: Edit: Customer service at least is fast. Problem is they walked me through the same steps I already did. which, while works, it's still a temporary thing and they don't have a long term solution, other than me doing this every other day. Sad when you have to constantly uninstall app and reinstall just to get it to talk to the device in order continue getting alerts. Everything is synced, paired, connecting. Restarted both fitbit and phone, repaired, resunced. Nothing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Kelsey. Sorry to hear this, but thanks for troubleshooting beforehand. We're always looking for ways to improve, and we appreciate your feedback. Please update your Fitbit app to 4.55, and follow the syncing troubleshoots in this page: https://goo.gle/syncing ‚Äî for more help, contact us at https://goo.gle/contactfitbit

scraped_reviews.content: It's not quite what I expected but useful for basic info. Recently, I thought about connecting my phone to it, but realized it didn't do what I thought it would and backed out before giving it access. Unfortunately, it didn't seem to agree and now it vibrates every time I get a text and displays it on my fitbit for anyone close enough to see. The phone was never given permission, so it doesn't recognize them as being connected so there's no option to turn this off which is incredibly suspicious.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Lilithe. Sorry to hear this. We're always looking for ways to improve, and we appreciate your feedback. You can turn off the notifications through the Fitbit app by following the guide here: https://support.google.com/fitbit/answer/14225533 ‚Äî for more help, contact us at https://goo.gle/contactfitbit

scraped_reviews.content: It's kinda bad. I got it so I could track my steps without having to carry my phone, but it only logs one out of every four steps (followed customer service's instructions to figure that out). For the last week, I've been getting a black screen when I open the app. It's still sending data to Google fit and from there to other apps. I'm just not getting anything helpful. Apparently I haven't had a pulse in days or any sleep ever.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Alexis. Sorry to hear about the trouble. For further assistance, please contact our support team at: https://goo.gle/contactfitbit

title: Glovo: Food & Grocery Delivery
description: Glovo is the number one app for ordering anything you want! With more than 240,000 restaurants and stores available, and delivery in minutes. Want to order food straight to your door? Or get a grocery delivery of your essentials? We save you time, when you don‚Äôt have it. Order food, groceries and gifts in your city without leaving home. With Glovo, you have the city in the palm of your hands. WHY USE GLOVO? ‚òÖ Over 80 million downloads worldwide. ‚òÖ Order from 25 countries including Spain, Portugal, Romania, Morocco, Italy, Poland, Croatia, Ukraine, Georgia, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Tunisia, Kenya, Uganda, Ivory Coast, Ghana, Nigeria, Bulgaria, Serbia, Armenia, Slovenia, Bosnia-herzegovina, Montenegro, Moldova & Andorra. ‚òÖ More than 240,000 restaurants, supermarkets and stores available globally. ‚òÖ Deliveries from the biggest chains: McDonald's, Burger King, KFC, Pizza Hut, Taco Bell, Telepizza, Starbucks, Domino‚Äôs Pizza, Carrefour, PENNY., Eataly, Flying Tiger, Kiko Milano, Lafarmacia, Auchan, Decathlon, MediaMarkt and many more. ‚òÖ Your favourite food delivery in minutes: Order burgers, pizza, chicken, kebab, pasta, sandwiches, sushi, pok√©‚Ä¶anything you want. ‚òÖ Pay however you like. We accept PayPal, card payment, cash and even restaurant vouchers. ‚òÖ Track your delivery or takeaway in real time and chat with our support team if need be. ‚òÖ Subscribe to Glovo Prime and get unlimited free deliveries of food, groceries, and shopping. Save on every delivery! Available in selected countries. ‚òÖ Invite your friends and earn money for each one who places an order on the app. Your favourite food, in minutes Fancy a tasty dinner? Has it been a long day? You deserve to have your food delivered to your door! Or are you on your way somewhere? You can order to take away and grab it on the go. With Glovo, you can order up to 65 different types of food in your city. Including a burger from the most famous restaurants, to ordering from your favourite sushi place. There are more than 216,000 restaurants available worldwide for delivery or takeaway in a matter of minutes. Grocery delivery without leaving home Forget something from the supermarket? Got friends over and want to order another round of drinks or snacks? Now you can also order your groceries from the supermarket. Choose whatever you want from your favourite supermarket or local store and Glovo will deliver it to you in a few minutes. Snacks, drinks, something sweet, a missing ingredient... any groceries you need! The app to order anything Glovo delivers everything. Find more than 27000 stores on the app, with all kinds of products. All your shopping on one app: surprise gifts, a last-minute purchase or whatever you need. And if you need to send or pick up something in your city, Glovo can run errands for you. Choose a pick-up and delivery point and a courier will take care of the rest, with delivery in minutes! Need help? Contact us! If you‚Äôre looking for help with an order or have any questions about Glovo, please contact our support team via the support section in our app or on our website. You can also find us on: ‚òÖ Our site: https://glovoapp.com/ ‚òÖ Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/glovoappES ‚òÖ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/glovo_es/ ‚òÖ Twitter: https://twitter.com/Glovo_ES Download Glovo now! Get food, groceries and shopping - with delivery in minutes or for take away.
descriptionHTML:
Glovo is the number one app for ordering anything you want! With more than 240,000 restaurants and stores available, and delivery in minutes. Want to order food straight to your door? Or get a grocery delivery of your essentials? We save you time, when you don‚Äôt have it. Order food, groceries and gifts in your city without leaving home. With Glovo, you have the city in the palm of your hands.

WHY USE GLOVO?

‚òÖ Over 80 million downloads worldwide.
‚òÖ Order from 25 countries including Spain, Portugal, Romania, Morocco, Italy, Poland, Croatia, Ukraine, Georgia, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Tunisia, Kenya, Uganda, Ivory Coast, Ghana, Nigeria, Bulgaria, Serbia, Armenia, Slovenia, Bosnia-herzegovina, Montenegro, Moldova & Andorra.
‚òÖ More than 240,000 restaurants, supermarkets and stores available globally.
‚òÖ Deliveries from the biggest chains: McDonald's, Burger King, KFC, Pizza Hut, Taco Bell, Telepizza, Starbucks, Domino‚Äôs Pizza, Carrefour, PENNY., Eataly, Flying Tiger, Kiko Milano, Lafarmacia, Auchan, Decathlon, MediaMarkt and many more.
‚òÖ Your favourite food delivery in minutes: Order burgers, pizza, chicken, kebab, pasta, sandwiches, sushi, pok√©‚Ä¶anything you want.
‚òÖ Pay however you like. We accept PayPal, card payment, cash and even restaurant vouchers.
‚òÖ Track your delivery or takeaway in real time and chat with our support team if need be.
‚òÖ Subscribe to Glovo Prime and get unlimited free deliveries of food, groceries, and shopping. Save on every delivery! Available in selected countries.
‚òÖ Invite your friends and earn money for each one who places an order on the app.

Your favourite food, in minutes

Fancy a tasty dinner? Has it been a long day? You deserve to have your food delivered to your door! Or are you on your way somewhere? You can order to take away and grab it on the go.

With Glovo, you can order up to 65 different types of food in your city. Including a burger from the most famous restaurants, to ordering from your favourite sushi place. There are more than 216,000 restaurants available worldwide for delivery or takeaway in a matter of minutes.

Grocery delivery without leaving home

Forget something from the supermarket? Got friends over and want to order another round of drinks or snacks?

Now you can also order your groceries from the supermarket. Choose whatever you want from your favourite supermarket or local store and Glovo will deliver it to you in a few minutes. Snacks, drinks, something sweet, a missing ingredient... any groceries you need!

The app to order anything

Glovo delivers everything. Find more than 27000 stores on the app, with all kinds of products. All your shopping on one app: surprise gifts, a last-minute purchase or whatever you need.

And if you need to send or pick up something in your city, Glovo can run errands for you. Choose a pick-up and delivery point and a courier will take care of the rest, with delivery in minutes!

Need help? Contact us!

If you‚Äôre looking for help with an order or have any questions about Glovo, please contact our support team via the support section in our app or on our website.

You can also find us on:
‚òÖ Our site: https://glovoapp.com/
‚òÖ Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/glovoappES
‚òÖ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/glovo_es/
‚òÖ Twitter: https://twitter.com/Glovo_ES

Download Glovo now! Get food, groceries and shopping - with delivery in minutes or for take away.
summary: Get your favourite food, groceries & shopping delivered straight to your door!

scraped_reviews.content: I‚Äôm really disappointed. My Glovo order got cancelled twice due to a ‚Äútechnical issue.‚Äù I waited a long time each time, and by the time I was notified, it was too late to order from anywhere else. This is not the first time this happens. Very unreliable service and zero respect for the customer‚Äôs time. Glovo needs to fix these technical issues and improve communication.

leaving feedback here because there is no place in the app to leave feedback or raise an issue! I'm shocked by this. There must have been some algorithm change recently because for the last week, the app is very frequently showing 90% of restaurants or supermarkets as "temporarily unavailable for orders". Please take a look at this asap, as it's making our Prime subscription pointless, if we can never order when we want, at times that we know for sure the stores are open.

Complete and utter garbage. The buggy app made me think it hadn't processed my payment, then it duplicated the order. When I contacted the customer service chat to ask for a refund, I go through 4 people and they finally tell me that's not possible to go through the refund, even though I had never asked for one before and was a frequent client for years. In my country there isn't even a call center contact them, just e-mail or chat. NOT RECOMMENDED. Gladly there are other options.

Do not order using this unless you are OK with not getting a big part of your order. I ordered a few days ago from Kaufland and 6!!!! of the items were missing and there was no receipt either. I emailed 4 times, it's been 5 days now and I never got any answers or a refund. The interface has also tons of problems, they don't store any info about the emails and complaints, you can't really add any coupons at checkout and the list goes on.

I'm becoming more and more disappointed with this app. Lately all of my orders take well over one hour. I've heard excuses for "there's a bug in the app" or the couriour's GPS isn't working. Today my order for one sandwich was "preparing" for 45 minutes before a couriour started to go to pick it up. It won't arrive for another 25 min and I'm sure my food will be cold. I'll likely be canceling my Glovo prime membership. I will say that their customer service chat is usually pretty helpful.

This app is faulty is some unfortunate ways. I ordered food from a restaurant that said they don't have the food anymore. But I had already paid because that's how you order. I called Glovo and they said they'll refund me that money, fast forward, days apart I made three phone calls in and they still kept promising the same thing. I lost my money, went hungry and the point was made, that no one cares from this app. I'm about to delete it and find a more reliable app. ü§∑üèø‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Please could you send an email to playstorereviews@glovoapp.com with more details, so that we can personally assist you and resolve the issue. If possible, please send it from the same email your Glovo account is registered with. We look forward to hearing from you.

scraped_reviews.content: Buggy and doesn't seem safe when you're trying to add a card as a payment option, I don't feel comfortable using the app because of that. Besides that, the fees are insane, it doubles your price sometimes if you're ordering for one. Also, a lot of restaurants have 15-20% higher prices on the app than their regular prices, which is just ridiculous, maybe even illegal.

Scam company, they stole my money. The prime subscription renews automatically without warning. I reached out to customer service in less than a min to unsubscribe and refund, but was told no refunds. Orders are often quite slow. Several minutes after you place an order, the app timer will reset to zero and show as if you just placed the order. Also, now you cannot track the driver when they are picking up the order.

The reason I ordered were certain items, which they didnt have. So instead of then allowing me to change (different type of apples, and potatoes for example), they just didnt send it at all. They didnt charge me for those, but I would have wanted a different kind instead...i tried calling multiple times, no answer. I had already paid the 15% tip online to the courier for the original order, it kept the amount, which now was almost 25%. Never again! Way expensive for items that I didnt need!

Ordered and was given a time, which was then put off 10-15 at a time FOR 2¬Ω HOURS! Then, when that place and EVERY other place in the area was closed, they finally said they couldn't deliver it. So, nothing to eat and all the time to do something else frittered away by little lies. Offered 4‚Ç¨ compensation within the app, but I won't be using it again, so whatever.

Literally the worst app ever. You can wait for hours before even finding out the restaurant doesn't have your order & being asked to cancel. You can not cancel or modify orders in the app. As a pregnant woman sometimes glovo has been my only food option, time & time again I have been made to wait only to be disappointed. Do not download this app. No matter the inconvenience you're better off going to get your own food.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please accept our sincerest apologies for the issues with your order. We are committed to offer the best service to our customers and this time it was not like this. Please get in touch via GlovoApp support or GlovoWeb support and give us further details so that we can assist you and review the issue.

scraped_reviews.content: Tourists beware. I used Glovo five times during a trip to Morocco, on occasion 4 an item was missing, Glovo refunded straight away. On occasion five, a third of the takeaway was missing- I completed their process including pictures of the missing items and although they admitted "it must have been disappointing", they have refused to reimburse me. So I paid for something I never received, excellent. And their word is final of course.

I ordered today something thinking that it will automatically be for delivery and not for pick-up( like it always used to be before), but apparently this specific restaurant had pick-up only. Immediately after I ordered I realised the mistake and I tried to cancel it. I looked for a "cancel order" button but there wasn't anything like that available and the option was to talk to glovo support in chat. I told him quick to cancel the order and he took ages only to say that it's not possible. üëé

One of the most frustrating features is how it shows you 'delivery time' instead of distance when picking a restaurant. So it will tell you 30 mins total delivery time, then you order and it's a restaurant on the other side of the city, no drivers take the job, and when they do it takes half an hour just for driver to bring it and it's freezing cold by the time they arrive. This keeps happening. It should show me restaurants that are close, not 10-15km away

The lack of ways to contact support after placing an order is extremely infuriating. The money is taken out of whatever card they want, not the one chosen, especially if Edenred is chosen. They take more money than the order total (order value from Kaufland, with tips, 97.85, money taken out of the account 100.85) with no explanation. Horrible!!

Glovo is better than most, but they need to update their maps because they spoil an otherwise great app and make ordering food more complicated than it needs to be (at least where I live). (Update) It's 2024, and the map bug still hasn't been worked out. Makes me less inclined to order every time. (Update) It's 2025, and instead of updating delivery charges for the different stores, they are adding extra delivery charges at the end, right as you are about to checkout. Please do better.

Beware! The most horrible customer service I have ever encountered. Cannot cancel subscription unless support approves it, support takes days to answer, always a different person not reading the information, I was charged for several months even after being told it's cancelled and I will get a refund. Had to ask for help from my bank to block them. horrible, never again.

Shame on this company !! I opened complaint tickets since the last 3 orders as they're all wrong. Glovo needs to refund me for products I paid for and never received from the grocery, with bill tickets that proves the wrong charge. I keep on receiving an automatic answer from a robot saying that they can't refund my money. I am leaving the app as they're thieves and will charge you money without refunding you for their mistake. Investing in robots for their "support" made them lose a customer.

Customer service has been removed. I have used glovo alot, but now I'm not too keen to use it anymore. I always got quick response in the past and usually got refunded if something was missing and often got a voucher if the order was delayed. the other day I was waiting after 1h and 20 mins for my order so went to find customer service which was nowhere to be found. clicking the help button only let you leave feedback and not talk to anyone. So now I can't trust glovo anymore.

Shocked by the terrible service. I ordered a salad from a restaurant 5 minutes away, expecting a 20-minute wait. After a 1.5-hour delay, I tried to cancel but the app blocked me, claiming it was "under preparation." To my astonishment, when I called customer service, they told me I still had to pay the full amount for an order I never received. Unacceptable and predatory.

1. Worst experience ever had, requested team to provide the invoices for my orders as invoices are not received to mail but no support and no option to download from app. 2. Delivery Executive did not call and mentioned as Delivery attempt failed and refund after multiple followups with final warning as next time they won't refund the back. 3. Multiple times faced items missing in order. 4. They will refund the Money only to Glovo wallet not to actual payment mode, if any issues.

Wouldn't use. there's no way to complain or communicate. made an order, didn't arrive, delivery time was pushed back 3HOURS, still said it was "arriving on time". Can't complain, cancellation was at full cost of food. fine when it works but no engagement means there's always a risk of something not going right and you can't do anything about it

on my first order i did not receive all the products i ordered. When i made a complaint i was told the money is refunded, however no money were added to my card. I discovered I only received a coupon but this is not what I want, I dont plan to use this app any more. Give the money back!!!! It is impossible to speak with an operator.A lot of random menus for random issues but nothing to talk with an operator. Very bad overall experience

This app didn't have a "cancel prime payment" buttin. You had to send them an email through their app and then they would "cancel it" for you. They didn't, surprise! They did add a button recently and my payments stop going through for a wopping 1 month before they RESUBSCRIBED me to their prime. I will file a report. Don't use this trash.

There‚Äôs no way to cancel an order and get your money back, even if the order never arrives. On top of that, they‚Äôll charge you an extra cancellation fee. I placed an order through Glovo that was delayed by almost an hour beyond the estimated delivery time and still hadn‚Äôt arrived. I contacted support to cancel, and a Glovo representative assured me I would receive a full refund. However, not only did I not get my money back, but they also charged me a cancellation fee on top of it.

Just don't. Even that trial chance isn't worth it. Worst of the worst apps you can use. Orders taking even 3hrs. If you try canceling, you can loss the entire amount you initially paid. It's just better you walk into the actual place you ordering than using this app. Just a solid disappointment. And how the invest alot in ads

Horrible customer service! They'll make you jump through hoops to get a refund which you'll ultimately not get. If you pay with your card they'll fail to refund incase some items on your order are out of stock. Prices on the app sometimes don't reflect true prices in shops, that oversight is borne by the customer. Discounted items are most likely expired or about to expire, buy at your own risk because they will never refund you.

I rarely use the app, but each time it's a dissapointment. last time I ordered groceries via this app. My bill was around 100 euros. when I received my order surprise, surprise, they only delivered products valued at 80 euros. a lot of missing products. many wrongly delivered, other damaged. after losing 2 hours to see what is missing and file a complaint, they just give me back the difference of 20 euros. after I lost 2h of my time, got wrong products and damaged products. thank you glovo.

The customer support is the worst I've ever seen. Some very unprofessianal agents and managers, who tend to blame the client, not their incapability. A brief phonecall with a manager helped me decide that i will never be coming back again. Good luck, you'll need it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Cris, Please could you send an email to playstorereviews@glovoapp.com with more details, so that we can personally assist you and resolve the issue. If possible, please send it from the same email your Glovo account is registered with. We look forward to hearing from you.

scraped_reviews.content: warning , make sure you always have the latest version of this application . the fees and minimum required for free delivery with prime can change and not be updated unless you have the latest version , and you will not see any warning - but they will charge you the old amount anyway. also completely ignore prime day and pay close attention to the price changes during discounts or promotions . this service is absolutely riddled with hidden price manipulation and fees.

Their service was horrible. Ordered food from an outlet that's 3km away from my house. They gave me an expected delivery time which wasn't honoured. Upon calling the delivery guy, he kept telling me he'll be there in 5mins even after 1 hour of calling. Finally, after 2.5 hours of waiting, he ended the delivery in the app system and I didnt have my order yet. To make it worse, Glovo had given out a contact no. of the outlet which was switched off. long story...

the worst support you can have, they close the conversation when they don't want to deal with you. Try to fix an error or to get your money back from the app and see by yourself. the prices are way more expensive than the real menu, and they add money to the bill as "service fee" that makes no sense. now I want to delete my data from their system but they don't want to. I'm giving a zero to the whole company not only the app.

The online payment is always buggy and card declines for no reason and their technical team is so lazy to fix their bugs and problems I am adding that all the menu on the apps is alot and I mean it a lot pricier than most of the other apps, the same menu the same restaurant is available on other delivery food apps with half of the price for any tunsians don't use glovo its a steal use Kool app instead.

A very good and reliable app, great for food and the prime discounts. The main this I am mad about is that when I go and pay cash, the courier tip is magically added. I don't know if they are doing it, if it something automated, but it is not listed in the price and gets added later on. I had a meal of ‚Ç¨21.32, no tip in cash, and when the courier came it was now ‚Ç¨23.30. Even on the app where it wasn't listed... please fix that

The worst food delivery app in the world I've used them all, I'm in a different country every week once you order, they'll keep on delaying and delaying and delaying the delivery time there is absolutely no option to reach support, there is no support department If you choose to cancel, you get charged half the price so it's kind of a scam app, either wait for hours or pay half the price canceling

I have been trying to cash out an order but glovo isn't recognising my number or something! Every time I put my number, they aren't even sending me a code, not through SMS or on WhatsApp, it's really annoying. A glovo dispatch rider is standing by me and he's telling me I'm supposed to call customer service, but I can't even find that on the app. What's the use of ordering for something when I can't even cash out???

It's absolutely terrible! if there was an option to give less than one star, I would! The app of Glovo automatically forced my order to be a pick-up when I've chosen delivery, there was no option to contact Glovo by any mean, not even a single tip on how to do that from the site, and when I've contacted the restaurant they've told me to contact Glovo, which again is not possible! Probably the most terrible experience I've ever had with ordering food! if you read this just don't order from here.

Just like another comment, im leaving feedback because i ordered i meal that i needed to have to take my medicine, the rider didnt even show up at the restaurant who had absolutely no delay in preparing the food, still in the apo i could see as a reason for the delay : "the restaurant is taking more time to prepare the order". The order was something like 10 euros, your support guy offered me somthing like 70 cents. Or to just get paid for the canceling. No solution at all.

Glovo - The Pinnacle of Unprofessionalism They make you pay in advance for your orders which is not a problem as many other applications share the same requirement, but accepting your order and payment, letting you know that it's getting processed, making you wait 30 mins, just so you can receive a notification that your order is cancelled without any reason and issue a refund, absolute clowns.

I recently had an order with missing items and when contacting support, they told me that my order was split for two riders and the missing items still need to arrive. I never got them and the support chat can no longer be accessed as they closed the case. I keep making appeals to get my money back but haven't gotten any answers. It's been 3 days with no answer.

Worst service you can get, I advise everyone, if there is another option, just go with them. Incompetent, support is useless. Doesn't help with anything but will blame you everything. Explain to me this, when your order is 1 hour past expected time and you want to cancel the order, if you do cancel it, they will charge you full price as "Cancelation fee". Absolute joke this is.

After the latest update, it became impossible to choose the location. It doesn't find the current address, in addition to that, it's impossible to search the address in the input box, because the keyboard just not responding (can't type anything). This literally breaks the entire app. Did you replace all developers by vibe coders, or what's the problem?

I used to love this app but it's going downhill. They charge "bad weather" fees even when the sun is shining, it's impossible to contact support if you don't follow one of their pre-determined scripts, and the app doesn't notify you anymore of support replies so that they end up closing your case when you don't reply (because you never were alerted that there was a reply). There is no way to re-open a case and you can only open a case about a delivery again when you still have the ticket.

non-existent customer service The driver claimed to pick up my order while he was kms away parked for about 30 mins. The app simply reseted the time of delivery, didn't allow to cancel, and the driver wouldn't respond. When I said I would call the police he claimed his bike was broken, but he had not even picked the food, as he claimed. I tried to find help from Glovo but there is no option until after the delivery is done. I was only allowed to send a note after it happened.

I placed an order with the apartment building number auto-filled by GPS. The courier arrived, called me, and said, "I'm here under your house building X." When I said that I live in the next building, they just dropped the phone. The order was marked as delivered, the courier didn't pick up the phone, and support said that they couldn't do anything about it. I was left without money and without food. The courier is just a scammer, and Glovo supports that. I'm frustrated; I don't recommend

I changed my rating because of how poor service is this app these days Deducting my money for items not delivered and no refunds and that order I ordered to use it that time refund taking years or not initiated I noticed I losing cash with this app second no customer care representatives to help you when you having problems like charged for items not at that store you booking then tracking isn't accurate misleading

Edit: SHOULD BE SUED. CHANGES THE ADRESS AS SOON AS YOU ORDER AND THEN SAYS IT'S YOUR FAULT. SCAM. Got my food late a lot of times. Last time, the order was canceled, but I still haven't gotten my money back. Orders arrived without some items. All in all, you have to pray for everything to be how it should be.

Glovo is a lifesaver! The app is super easy to use, and the delivery times are always lightning-fast. I've ordered everything from food to groceries, and it's always arrived hot and fresh. The selection of restaurants and shops is amazing, and the tracking feature keeps me updated on my order's progress. Customer support is also really responsive and helpful. Glovo has become my go-to app for convenience and reliability. Highly recommend ü§™

Poor delivery services The delivery guy kept calling asking where they're delivering while I've clearly added my location. He even threatened to return the order back to the restaurant if I didn't make it in time to pick up my order yet he's the one who refused to make the delivery to the specified location

title: Camera for Android - HD Camera
description: HD Camera - Camera for Android is a fully featured professional camera app with amazing filters, professional effects, HD panorama, beauty camera, night mode, short videos, time-lapse photography. With HD Camera, you can easily take incredible HD selfie photos or HD videos for all Android devices! Never been so faster! HD Camera for Android is an easy-to-use camera and photo/video editing app to quickly shoot excellent HD photo and videos with daily updated effects and poster templates, real-time filter, stylish HDR, photo editor, collage maker. Creating beautiful and natural photo and video selfie has never been easier! üöÄüèÜ üíé All-in-one HD Camera - Filters, Effects, Beauty ‚ù§ HD Camera: Just a tap to shoot beautiful and high definition photos and videos ‚ù§ 8 Shooting Modes: Photo, video, pro mode, beauty, night, time-lapse, panorama, short video ‚ù§ Real-time trendy filters: over 200 themed filters for your daily selfie ‚ù§ Powerful HDR: capture fantastic photos in low-light or backlit scenes ‚ù§ Auto beauty: Restore your true beauty with a mirror-like shooting experience ‚ù§ Smart Camera: Support for Quick Snap, Continuous shooting, Auto-stabilize üì∏ Professional Camera, Quick Snap and Selfie Camera ‚óè Quick Snap: Continuous shooting, auto-stabilize, intelligently face detection ‚óè Focus mode and zoom: Optical / digital zoom, AF mode, infinity, Macro ‚óè Different scene modes: Support night and sport mode, food, party, sunset, action ‚óè Exposure: adjust the ISO sensitivity to fit the scene, whether dark or bright ‚óè Professional effects: color effects, exposure compensation/lock, torch ‚óè White balance: adjust the intensities of the colors and restore the original color of photos ‚óè Audio control: Option to take photo remotely by making a noise üî• Easy Yet Powerful Photo Editor, Collage Maker, Video Cutter - Selfie Editor: Rotate and crop photos with stickers, filters and texts. You can adjust the brightness, contrast, vignette, fade, temperature, saturation. - Photo Collage: select several pictures and upload them to get a cool photo collage for Instagram stories - Amazing templates: Pick the favorite layout design, edit collage with filters, background, stickers, text, etc. - Video cutter: Cut and trim your video easily with just one click üéä Intelligent shooting features - Set the photo size and path and save storage - Overlay a choice of grids and Golden ration line - Record the shooting location information and timestamp - Beauty camera to capture every moment - Volume key control to take photos and videos - Touch the screen to shoot a photo - To turn off the optional shutter sound - Front and back camera support - Countdown timer - Torch and flash - Auto level Download the native android system HD Camera - Beauty Camera to take perfect selfies and HD/4K videos and share them to Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, Snapchat, Tik Tok! üíØ

Download the native android system HD Camera - Beauty Camera to take perfect selfies and HD/4K videos and share them to Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, Snapchat, Tik Tok! üíØ

title: LINE: Calls & Messages
description:
LINE is transforming the way people communicate, closing the distance between family, friends, and loved ones‚Äîfor free. With voice and video calls, messages, and a limitless variety of exciting stickers, you‚Äôll be able to express yourself in ways that you never thought possible. Available all around the world on mobile, desktop, and Wear OS, the LINE platform continues to grow, always offering new services and features that make your life more fun and convenient.

‚óÜ Messages, Voice calls, Video calls
Enjoy voice and video calls and exchanging messages with your LINE friends.

‚óÜ LINE stickers, emojis, and themes
Express yourself just the way you want with stickers and emojis. Also, find your favorite themes to customize your LINE app.

‚óÜ Home
Gives you easy access to your friends list, birthdays, the sticker shop and various services and contents offered by LINE.

‚óÜ Seamless connection on mobile, Wear OS, and PC

Chat anytime and anywhere. Whether you‚Äôre on the go or working at the office or remotely, use LINE via your smartphone, Wear OS, or desktop.

‚óÜ Store your personal information with Keep Memo

My own chatroom to temporarily store messages, photos, and videos.

‚óÜ Messages protected with Letter Sealing

Letter Sealing encrypts your messages, call history and location information. Always be assured of your privacy when using LINE.

‚óÜ Smartwatch
On smartwatches equipped with Wear OS, you can connect it with the LINE app to check messages and add the LINE app complication to your watch face.

* We recommend using a data plan or connecting to Wi-Fi as you may incur data usage fees otherwise.

* Please use LINE with Android OS versions 11.0 or above to enjoy LINE to the fullest extent.

**********
If your network speed is too slow or you don't have enough device storage, LINE may not install properly.

If this happens, please check your connection and try again.
**********

scraped_reviews.content: Login/account transfer is broken and customer support is useless. They will tell you to use a link to make a new inquiry then give you the same link that did not work and ask you to do it over and over again. The app worked fine until they updated it then I was unable to login even though I always used a Google account to login. It's ridiculous that they can't seem to get basic things right like other apps and makes me concerned for app security and privacy.

I can't send or receive messages. It's been happening since the last update. Please hurry and fix!!!!! I get notifications of new messages, but when I open it, it doesn't appear. It use to happen every now and then, but lately it's been happening every single day, maybe 2-4 times a day. It use to be able to fix with just a restart, force closing the app, and clearing cache. Now none of those solutions work anymore. Please fix!!!!!

The charts feature doesn't work for sending or receiving. I keep getting pop-up notifications on my phone, telling me I have new line messages, but when I go to chats in the app, it says I have no new chats. The chat feature doesn't seem to be allowing me to send messages either. When I select a friend's name and hit "create message" I just get sent back to the select friend page. I'm hoping that I can fix by deleting the app and reinstalling...

I'm pretty upset that I can no longer get pop up notifications, even though it's still an option in the settings. I've also been having issues with receiving notifications for a while now. Sometimes they come in and at other times I get nothing until I open the app or send the person a message myself. This is incredibly inconvenient for a messaging app. This used to be my #1 messaging app, but with every update it just gets worse. At the very least fix the pop up notifications. Everyone wants them back.

If you accidentally delete the App or even log out of your account, good luck ever getting back in. Unless you've linked a phone or email, (which for some reason isn't already pre linked when you register and they don't tell you to do that if you ever want to get back in) you're locked out. No help from support. For some reason you can't just login with your username. Anyways, horrible verification process and I'll never be able to get back into my account again.

Been using LINE for almost 4 years and my only qualms are the account transfers (it deletes everything) and for some reason, I am now unable to send photos. It's also very inconsistent with the issue. It doesn't matter if I'm on wifi or data. Sometimes it sends and sometimes it doesn't. This started about a week ago when the One UI update rolled out. I have an S9+. It looks like others are having the same issue with different devices. Please fix this.

Can't use on two devices anymore. I loved this app for years, spent a lot of money on stickers and themes, and used to switch seamlessly between the PC and mobile versions. Now I have LINE on phone and tablet. Still only two devices, but the app refuses to work when I try to chat on tablet. I get an error about already having it on another device. Duh! Unbelievable that I can't access my own account on whichever device I'm using. Absolutely archaic app desperately needs updating.

I'm so sick of moving my conversations manually when I get a new phone. And if you lose your phone, good luck, your conversations are gone! There should be some default instant back up that you have to opt out of. It's a cool app in other ways but when his happens it's so annoying I can't even remember the good things. To LINE: fix this or you risk losing customers. You have market power now but don't depend on that when you have such an annoying feature compared to other apps!

Absolutely terrible. Made me want to leave the restaurant using it for food orders. There are no translations in it which was difficult, but its constant requests for battery overrides and notifications actually deleted our first attempt to order after a 15 minute struggle. Because of my food allergy we had to ask the staff for help anyway because it offers no way to modify orders or otherwise give important information to the kitchen. DO NOT USE. DO NOT DOWNLOAD. 0/5 STARS. NEGATIVE STARS.

Another user here who is getting notifications but no new messages when I open the app. I'm also almost completely unable to send messages. They take several retries to go through, if the ever do. Sometimes I can untick the messages by creating an album, but now even that is taking retries and a lot of waiting to work. This app used to be amazing up until a couple months ago. Sadly, it's just about useless to me now. I've had to switch to Discord. Will probably completely uninstall Line soon. :(

Good chat app, a must for staying in contact with friends in my game. Unfortunately, there's a problem with creating albums in chat rooms. When I attempt to switch to albums of specific screenshots on my phone, images from my general screenshots are what I'm shown. A similar thing happens when I try to switch to photos from my fishing trip, and instead I am shown shots from my camera roll. This is very frustrating, because I created the albums on my phone to make it easier to find the pics that I want for the chat room album.

As noted by many reviewers, the app just all of a sudden decides you cannot send or respond to chats, though you can receive them. And random people can keep adding me to their friends lists, but I cannot block them. Their customer service is not existent, their response is they can't help me. Sadly, this app was really the only way to keep in touch with elderly relatives in Taiwan since Line is so prevalent for daily life there.

The customer service is abysmal and extremely condescending. They absolutely do not help you, take a long time to reply and lock you out with no rhyme or reasons. I have used this app for more than 15 years, transferring it in different phones in different countries. I got logged out by mistake and the customer service is so unhelpful. I have spend money and have a lot of friends from Japan on the app and I have lost everything so quickly. I would absolutely not recommend using this app.

I use line daily for a game I play. Recently, it's been having issues uploading images. I thought maybe there was an update. And there was!! However, it did not fix this uploading images bug. I have to continually resend image. Sometimes it will eventually upload. Sometimes after 100 tries, I get frustrated and just give up. Please fix this, and I will give you 5 stars.

Can't see messages. I have the One Plush 8T and the app seems to be messing up. I will get notifications that I received a message. I go to check and there is nothing there. A while later (minutes to even hours) the messages show up. I have good connection too. Uploads are hit or miss as well. Most of the time it struggles to upload a small file. This app needs a fix FAST!!

Everything was fantastic until I had to reset my password (because it wasn't in my notes). I have to use multiple emails, so when I went to type in my registered email, I typed in the wrong one (or at least I think I did, it just says that the email was sent anyways instead of saying it was the wrong email... I even typed in a random email and it still said it sent). Line has a "24" hour wait thing too which is absolute garbage. So while it is my fault, this process should not be this painful.

Had the app for 1 day and suddenly my messages couldn't be read. I received error messages from LINE about connection issues without a way to resolve the problem. I tried to use it with and without Wi-Fi and that didn't help it. I attempted to reinstall the app and have now been locked out for 60 days. Not seconds, not minutes, but 60 whole days. That is far too long a wait for me to try to work with this app again. I'll probably forget this app exists by the time the 60 days is up.

calls drop a bit too often, app sometimes bugs out and will NOT open whatsoever, then have to reinstall (happened thrice already), and offers only work half the time and most of them are barely worth mentioning. but the messaging still works fine, stickers are pretty fun and varying, and finding friends via ID is simple and quick. some of the issues could just be my model phone, but still would be nice to get it looked into.

Line is great but there's some things that can be pretty frustrating!! Notifications randomly lag throughout the day, and then when you open the app all of them flood through at once. Voice call quality is terrible and lags sometimes. It gets exponentially worse the more ppl are in a call. Also, I wish the pictures and videos could automatically be saved locally. I loose videos and gifs sometimes because of that.

At first Line was absolutely amazing. However, the last six updates have given me more headaches than i can even begin to count. During calls there is an ungodly high pitched echo that bounces between sides and progressively gets louder. Constant dropped calls. Microphone issues where there are none. Messages not sending until hours later when there is service/wifi connection. No notifications. Poor sound quality. I have changed phones and services, as well as desktop line. Please fix this.

Would be great if: 1) it had delay send; 2) increasing the font size also increases where you type your messages to send (that stays tiny). Needs more font size options like other apps. For older people/visually impaired, increasing font size only changes what you see after sending or what you received; 3) photos can be sent in original size and resolutions. Kakao currently allows full size/res transfer so that's what our friends and family have been using more and more.

Ever since the app updated, I am unable to dial out via phone or video call. It shows "network error" or "unable to make call. please try again". The chat function doesn't work either, I cannot send anything at all. Not sure what happened since I was able to use the app fully less than a week ago, and not it's completely useless. I'm disappointed with this version.

It is unfortunate that Line is so popular in some countries, such as Taiwan. Its almost necessary to use it. But it is an outdated pile of junk. It does not cache messages on the cloud. It does not allow you to transfer history between iOS and Android. And its very easy to get permanently locked out during phone transfer process. They offer essentially zero support. Time for this thing to be abandoned.

Line is wonderful. Always reliable. Newest features are regularly added or improved. The only thing I wish for right now is when I press 'share' from other apps, Line doesn't show up in the list, only Line Keep. Keeps creates extra burdens when you just want share, not keep. Thank you. It was going strong, but recently it stopped sending me any type of notification, audio or visual. Still trying to figure why. Any help??

Garbage! The notifications don't work! I've tried everything and it does not work. Emailed the "d called help" and they emailed me back saying "we can't help with this issue!" How do you say that to someone that's using your app that you can't help fix their problem?????? What's the point and have the option to reach out to support for help only to have them say sorry too bad can't fix it!!!!!!!

It constantly nags to register a phone number even if a number is already registered. For groups, it's lacking in administrator controls and groups are limited to 499 members. To chat with people, you must "friend" them. But there does not seem to be any obvious way to "un-friend" to declutter your contacts list. There's also lag of several seconds when backing out of a chatroom to return to your messages list.

Good Chat App. Easy to use and find your friends. You can make group chats, calls and video chat. You can also add contacts from your phone to see who is a user. (One thing that bugs me don't understand why I can't add this app to more than one device though) I use Viber on my phone and my 10" S6 Tablet, why not Line? Overall I have had a good exp. with it but I think they need to let us use it on more than one device. I'm not asking to be logged in both at the same time! Is that too much?

I used to be able to set the notifications sounds but the last few updates do not have that option anymore. I have 2 accounts on two different makes of phones. I can set sonds on all my other messaging apps and the funny thing is that the line app sounds are in the lists on both phones. This is a pain for everyone if a message is received everyone looks at their phone and in my case I have to look at both phones. Put the sound option back to make everyone's life easier please.

It's been a week at least, if not more, since photos last worked properly. Please fix this problem, I miss using LINE the way I used to. Edit: Two updates, including one just now, and still no fix for the sent/received photos in sight. I just don't understand why this happened, nor why it continues to be so broken over half a month later.

The most bizarre data storage model I've ever seen - messages *are* stored on their servers, I know because they're delivered if I was offline for a while, but every message is kept in my device's persistent data storage (as opposed to cache storage), so after a few months of use, LINE had consumed over 2.5GB of my device storage. And clearing the app's data on my phone apparently deleted (my copy of) all of those messages from LINE's servers as well, because afterwards all of my chats were still there, but were completely blank, with no way to recall the prior messages. For comparison, my 8 other chat apps *combined* use just under 1GB of storage. Spammy with ads for IAPs (stickers, themes, etc.). Default notification setting is set to "annoying and obtrusive" mode - big floating pop-up, even turns on screen if off. Weird interface makes it hard to find some settings - they're not all found in one place. Account is linked to a physical device, not to a username and password. Sure, you can *add* a username/password to allow you to access your chats (on ONE computer only), but if you get a new phone, or factory reset your current phone, there's no way to reconnect it to your existing account, you have to create a new one. Want to use LINE on a tablet without telephony? Good luck. All of these design decisions make no sense to me. Only reason for giving two stars instead of one is that the app does work, for the basic purpose of sending & receiving messages.

WORST experience using an app! I'd give it negative stars if I could. Had issues with getting verification code, but customer service resolved, but my account gets suspended soon as I create it. Didn't even send a single message yet, or add anyone, or set my Line ID. All I got was an unknown error. Didn't even notify me it got suspended until I asked for help from customer service. Won't even tell me the reasoning. It's been 12 days since my first inquiry into this, 5 since the second

Good messaging app! I haven't had problems with the latest update so far. Messages load a bit slow if I'm not it for a long time but it's not such a major issue for me. I would also like to see some helpful administrative features for group chats (i.e. having designated users as admins who would be the only ones allowed to add/remove other users in their group chat, as well as choose theme and profile picture, and be able to delete any notes within the group chat). That would be great :)

It's a useful but outdated app. There is no encryption by default, and one-sided enabling is impossible, meaning that, for all practical purposes, there is no encryption at all. Transferring to another phone is cumbersome and error-prone, making this an unreliable app. The Windows desktop app tends to freeze and restart without success. It's better not to start off with this communication platform at all, if possible.

Horrible. Got this to play a game with friends and was suddenly kicked out of my account. Can't log in; I was told to wait 5 months to try again. No reason given. Contacted support: no help at all. Can't get to support thru the app either. I had to go thru here. Was given a link for further help, and the link sent me straight back to the app that I can't even use. 5 months pass and nope. Still can't log in at all or even try. If I could, I would rate 0 stars since I can't even use this app.

I thought I was the only one experiencing issues until I read everyone else's recent May reviews. I can't send or receive any messages unless I'm on Wi-Fi. The app does not work on mobile data. It is very frustrating and I hope it is fixed soon. Sometimes I don't get notified new messages even though I have notifications turned on. I would have to go into the chat to check if I received messages and they would be there.

This app was great, but now is becoming super annoying... after receiving a message from someone while having that conversation open, then closing it, recieve a notification for an unread message from them right after... and it's just the one that they sent while you had the chat open. 3 updates since it started and still not fixed. I know it isn't just my phone either, the same thing is happening to the other person.

Uninstalled, used this ap for a long time and it started taking up way to much space on my phone. It was insane how much it took up. it should not take 7.4 GB for an ap. Trying to find a good ap to use, so my some of my gaming buddies can switch over. You guys need to change how much space it takes up. I know quite a lot of people that have uninstalled for that same reason as well

The messaging on the app is fine, however there is a glitch where messages are not recieved until I open the app. If it's left in the background for more than an hour, I won't receive notifications for any messages until I open the app. It causes me to miss messages a lot so I haven't really used it. I'm using a Samsung A32, and I've turned off pause background activity and battery saver, so it's not those. Please fix this

It requires an email added to the app before you try to transfer to another phone. I didn't have my old phone because it wasn't working anymore, and I didn't realize I needed the email added. I can put in my phone number and get a text verification, so WHY would that not be enough to prove it's me? I'd give this 0 stars if I could. I've tried contacting their support, we'll see if they can help.

Ridiculously merciless app. beware that if You change devices make sure to perform a back up before logging in to the new device, if You log into the new device it logs out the old and deletes EVERYTHING, so if Your chats we not backed up it's gone forever and the most infuriating thing is that I have everything in My PC but there's no way to sync the backup from that to a mobile device! terrible system!

I apparently violated ToS before having ever added a single contact or sent a single message. There is no way to appeal this, nor any explanation of why or how this is possible. But even then I don't know for sure because the app only tells me "an unknown error has occurred" and nothing else. App is unusable in the most literal sense of the word.

I rarely give 1 star to apps, but Line is an exception, congrats. I tried to log in to my account 2 times using a phone number, and the loading after entering verification codes oh man it takes forever, then i changed my connection from Wi-Fi to Mobile Data and there's a error message. But the main problem is i have to WAIT 18 DAYS to log in again??? I'm done.

LINE is my go-to messaging app! It stands out because it combines absolutely reliable messaging and crystal-clear free voice/video calls with unique, fun features. The massive library of expressive stickers is unmatched and makes conversations so much more lively and engaging. I also appreciate the integrated services, like LINE Pay and LINE Today, which make it a truly versatile app. It's fast, stable, and a joy to use daily. Highly recommended for connecting with friends and family!

Really bloaded and ads. The app does what it should and runs stable. Has a lot of functions especially when you're living in Japan. the problem is that when you start to follow some official accounts and groups, public chats. it's really hard to find the right chat in the list. yes you can pin chats and make favorites but it would be better if you could group it for, private, work, groups... it's not fun as it is right now. also I don't want to get annoyed with AI stuff.

My wife tried to sign up. Account was suspended for "trying to meet people in person", when she has only ever messaged me on it. Been that way for months. Support is useless. Help page says to reinstall, but verification "is temporary blocked" so now she can't get in at all. Just all around terrible support, really. Clearly some automated check made a mistake and they're not willing to bother to fix it.

I've used this app with mostly good confidence for over 10 years, but this year it takes 5-10 seconds for the app to open after clicking on a notification banner, and they've added unnecessary AI but it's right next to the stamp button? Doesn't feel optional and it's in the way of smooth functionality. I can make my own art, write my own messages, and think for myself like any other human can. I don't have the same fondness for LINE like I used to.

I downloaded line yesterday to more easily communicate with my Japanese friends. I made an account, added my friends, and texted them all a hello message. the next day my friend asks if I saw her message, so I look in the app, and I find that I'm suspended from sending messages for "violating terms of service". I went to check their terms of service, and I violated absolutely none of it. what's worse, there's no option to contact support and have them reverse the mistake.

It's hard to transfer the app from an old device to another. It's system is asking for too many complicated steps. The app camera cannot scan the QR code from an old device. I don't have much time the client, who is using Line app is getting impatient in another email, because we cannot open my Line from another device, which has the files needed to be sent ASAP!!!

"Unknown error occurred" for every single thing I click on. Can't send messages, can't change my details, can view my account, can't do anything! and the help centre is useless, there are no solutions as to how to fix it. I don't recommend this app to anyone. Deleting it myself too. The developers should be ashamed honestly üò§

The worst support that ever. I bought a new phone cause the old one had water damage. So I thought maybe I can backup on pc before I transfer my account to a new one, nope not possible. Wanna contact support ? Nope you gotta login and need to confirm it on your old broken non usable phone. So basically from my knowledge there is no possible way to contact them. So guys, if you use this app remember you wont get any support at all only FAQ. Remember to backup every hour to prevent this.

title: NBC News: Breaking News & Live
description:
NBC News brings you breaking news, top stories and live news you need to know. Our free news app features real-time news alerts, in-depth stories, exclusive reporting and articles from award-winning journalists covering US news and international news

 

Get your daily news fix with topics spanning politics, health news, tech and science news, business, sports, celebrities and entertainment. Get alerted about local news, weather and local headlines from your area. Watch NBC News NOW in the app for 24-hour news coverage, special reports and live streams of current events, and stay up-to-date when news breaks with our live blogs. Watch your favorite primetime and daytime NBC News shows, and listen to a live audio feed of NBC News NOW with no login required.

 

NBC News app features: 

Breaking news alerts and push notifications for fast news updates sent straight to your mobile device 

Presidential election and state election results, election maps and election polls 

Expert opinion and analysis of political news and government news with live commentary from our political correspondents in Washington, D.C. 

Local news and weather alerts from your city and region National news and global news reporting at your fingertips, with headline news and top news from America and abroad

Watch live news 24/7 with NBC News NOW and watch live video as events unfold Livestream full episodes of Meet the Press, NBC Nightly News with Tom Llamas and Dateline 

Bring NBC News NOW and more on the go with streaming live audio (no authentication required!)

 

Additional information: Video is accessible via 3G, 4G, LTE and Wi-Fi networks ‚Äì data charges may apply

 Privacy Policy: Privacy Policy
Your Privacy Choices: Do Not Sell or Share/Process My Personal Information for Targeted Advertising 
CA Notice: California Notice 

This app features Nielsen proprietary measurement software which will allow you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen‚Äôs TV Ratings. To learn more about our digital measurement products and your choices in regard to them, please visit Digital measurement privacy statement for more information.
