summary: Breaking news alerts, headlines and live video from NBC News

scraped_reviews.content: it used to be great. that is until they thought popping up videos as you scroll past it thinking you're going to watch it. I can't believe they thought this was a good idea without the option to disable it. Very intrusive. I can't think of any other main stream media app that has inconvenienced users in this way. I've gotten to the point where I opt to open my other apps first. By then I've lost interest in opening the nbc app because of the videos popping up and close out the app for the day

NBC is steadily making this app worse. Now a video pops up everytime and won't go away. The X does not close the video. The screen turns white a LOT. When you scroll the news, the screen jumps up and down as ads appear and it's difficult to see. Scroll to the top and refresh, and the screen jumps halfway down. This is really really stupid. Please fire all your app developers and hire two dozen monkeys instead. I'm sure they will do a better job!

This is a great app and my go to for news. Unfortunately, I can only give it 1 star. Since the format has changed, there are no more sections for science, LGBTQ, sports, etc. on the front page nor do I get top stories from my local NBC affiliate, which I found extremely useful. The news articles (a few) seem to also repeat as you scroll. As it is now, the new version of the app feels disjointed. I don't mind searching for what I'm looking for. I don't like seeing the same articles twice.
Not happy with the latest updates. The Pop-Up videos drag it down and I am no longer getting local news even though I have it configured for it.
it's not showing the news reports on the screen. just a bar. I have to tap it, and it takes me to the site. putting Flipboard back on my widgets page

Liked the app before much better. New features with these pop ups you can't turn off increases neurological issues in myself (and I have to believe others). Would love a feature to be able to shut this off so I could keep myself better informed!

The news content is fine, but the app constantly crashes. I can't get through one article without the app closing. Or it will "update" and send me to the home page while I'm reading. Also, none of the videos will ever work. For these reasons, I may need to delete the app and just read the website. Disappointed.

l uninstalled the NBC News app and then installed it again because it was screwing up my phone every time l tried to read an article. lt would freeze my screen and/or open up other applications. Very glitchy, maybe infected with a virus. The 2nd installation was even worse. And they eliminated the Discover section at the bottom.

You took a nice layout and changed it to ads. You allowed local information to be on the page, and now that is gone. It‚Äôs a chaotic mess that distracts from the original purpose it was made for. If it doesn't change back to the original, I will find my news somewhere else.

The new update is horrible. The home page takes forever to load now and the new and very frequent ads get in the way. It is now harder to find the news stories you want to read. They have also added a pop up window for the news now video that follows as you scroll. It is very annoying and takes several taps to get rid of it. This app is not as user-friendly as it used to be. Harder to read and harder to scroll through. Not my favorite anymore.
App has become super ad based with scrolling ads in the middle of content. Has also removed all the local news section.
‚ÄãThis is a decent, well-designed news app that can have a powerful, positive effect on your related news consumption.

Trash! Recent upload turned your whole app into something that resembles the click bait adds after your "articles" end. One headline rolles into the next category without separation or distinction. Seriously you need to add Dark Mode!

The newest update is swamped with ads bigger than the stories. local news has gone missing again. ads shift stories around at random as they load. most ads are scams I don't want to risk accidentally touching. must uninstall this app.

Most of the content are great. However somtimes the title of a report is misleading, inaccurate, or even contradictory to the story. As to the content of the news/report, the reporter doesn't seem to tell the whole story.
Notifications rarely open the correct article. Links automatically open in Chrome, which is not how I have my system set up. Ignores custom OS settings.
The new format is terrible. I lost local news and sports and have no control over the news content that I want to see. It is no longer customizable.

Unplugging from cell phone distractions is a big movement. You should offer much more fine grained control over notifications, otherwise I'm forced to turn it all off. (ex breaking news vs morning rundown)
the movie in the middle that autoplays is annoying. otherwise, good app.
Negative 5 stars. Can't find my local news easily. Too many pop-ups.
fragmented stories mixed in with mostly advertisements, loads very slowly

I had this app for a long time and liked it. But recently it has become more flaky. While scrolling down, the advertisements kept flickering on and off and resetting the screen to where I was before. The live broadcast kept popping up when I did not choose it. Most annoying. When you cannot control what you see on an app it becomes useless.
Barely usable. Open the app, read a story, get a random update and get pulled out of the story and back to the homepage. Repeatedly. Very annoying.
this thing of running all the ads and reading the news on the right is just not working. I'll just go to another source. have watched NBC for years but I'm not doing this new format.
constant pop up videos is freaking annoying
No dark mode in 2025 should be criminal. No fine-tuning of notifications either. Do better.
This has always been my go to news station. I get breaking news notifications. The app is free, unlike other news stations.
App keeps crashing and resetting. I can't even type this review without everything freezing.
Great news service - update of current news.
page is constantly freezing when I open a news story...terrible just like Peacock. I don't know what's wrong with NBC and thier entities!
Love the format and reporting of important everyday up to the hour news stories. üí•‚úÖüíØ

All the information I need to keep right up to date in particular with world developments. As such the news broadcasting here on the NBC News site ranks at par with many American as well as British periodicals, thank you very much and enjoy your afternoon üá¨üáßüá∫üá∏
The NBC News has always been very reliable and impartial, in my opinion. For years, NBC News has been the homepage on my personal computer.
Crashes constantly. It's almost like it is being done deliberately to make it difficult to get the latest news.
I asking About Google play and playstore browser and Chrome Google and Apps market And The others Apps. and My experience Data privacy policy Annesty is

There is a glitch in this version of the app that doesn't allow me to silence the sound notification. And the video notification pops up incessantly which also can neither be separated from the app, nor silenced. My wife is a light sleeper, so I have to turn notifications completely off as a result.

What kind of news app doesn't allow public comments??? How stupid. And the endless ads at the bottom of each article are annoying. Overall, it's just a terrible app. I'd suggest you UN-install and pick a better news app (honestly, anything is better than this one).

Update - app has been significantly improved with increased access to content. BUT, still really buggy, especially for casting. Advertising is the worst ever - basically it creates for me a list of products I will never buy and companies I will stop patronizing. Maybe they could get help from a big tech company like Comcast . . . Oh, wait ...

Videos in the app regularly skip, freeze or even do not load at all whether using mobile data or WiFi, and despite app and Android OS being up to date. Articles will sometimes not load fully. Sometimes while reading an article app will jump back to app home screen or phone home screen for no reason. While I appreciate the broad range of articles and issues in the app, breaking news push notifications about celebs and other public figures (non politicians) should not be breaking news.

Infuriating user experience. If whole reading an article you put your phone to sleep, switch to another app or take a phone call, and then come back to the NBC News app, NBC News will show you the article you were reading and then jump to the headlines. The article you were in the middle of reading is GONE! This happens every time. The articles are fine, but the app keeps aggressively closing them. Three stars is generously giving the app credit for the article that it reluctantly displays.

App is ruined with commercials. I used to listen all the time especially on my way home from work. I knew the absence of commercials wasn't going to last but didn't expect them to what they did. Now is over 50% commercials. Also they cut the host off mid-sentence for commercial break and they don't even pause the broadcast so when you end up coming back after over five minutes of commercials the host is on a completely different topic and you don't get to hear them finish what they were saying.

This is easily the worst news app of all the major networks. I was in the midst of reading an article when my husband came to talk to me. While we were talking, the screen timed out and when I reopened the app, I was back to the homepage. There's no search option, at least not one that's obvious, so now I can't find and finish the article I wanted to read.  This is why NBC's news app is always my last choice and I only read articles when a notification interests me.

Locked itself to the screen so that I couldn't stop it. I couldn't back out and couldn't get anything else to start so that I could kill it. I had to restart the phone just to escape. Worse still it was only showing a blank screen. Each time I hit the back button it flashed the logo then a blank screen. It was probably trying to load some stinking advert.

Great commentary,informative,and the anchors tend to cover all the angles. Carefull, getting a bit repetitive on the hottest topics. There are a Ridicules amount of pop ups and ads while selecting topics and viewing video. Videos tend to stop short of completion and are difficult to restart, if you can ever get it back to that video. What the hey! It's free news...it's either this or the cheap stuff with fantasy news or out and out gibberish for gullible folks under a rock!

The app is great except for the listen live feature has this infuriating policy of playing the same commercial first everytime you hear a commercial break. Over and over and over again. If I hear the same commercial for Comcast I might actually go crazy. SUPER ANNOYING. Otherwise it's faster than the website and videos have better playback on the app.

Quiet time not working. Getting notifications in the middle of the night and wakes me up. Super annoying and inappropriate. 2024 update. Quiet time is still not working. Developer clearly does not care. Always getting push notifications about sports. I don't need a notification every time someone gets a medal in the Olympics. This is not news. Uninstalled

This app is awful. I often cannot get it to go landscape. There is no full screen button. It repeatedly skips back 30 seconds or so (or to the beginning) at least 10 times every broadcast. It skipped back to the beginning 3 times this morning. For years I watched NBC News on YouTube without any problems, but they no longer post current newscasts. So I used their web page, but has the same skipping problem and couldn't use the scroll bar without freezing. PLEASE BRING BACK THE YOUTUBE NEWSCASTS!

I would give your app 5 stars, but I can't. You see the problem is the stories and the news are great. But unfortunately I (like many other people that have been complaining consistently about the exact same thing) can't see the videos because it keeps stopping and going and getting stuck and choppy. In other words, it doesn't work. I figured if BBC and CNN videos can work, I figured NBC could work too if you just put in the effort. But I guess you don't want to. Fix the problem!! 0 stars

Good content, horrible app. There is a buffering problem not found on other video apps. Very frustrating to try to watch when the sound pauses all the time and then repeats normal speed, and then pauses. This constant stuttering is not being fixed. I don't have this problem with any other video apps. +++ three years later, and several updates, the buffering problem remains.

Unusable on GoogleTV because of "Stay up-to-date in the NBC News app" banner on screen. The banner appears immediately after opening the app, and traps the selection cursor on itself, making the app impossible to control. There is a small X on the banner, but it cannot be selected even with a mouse connected to the TV. With this banner bug, the app can only play the default stream. No interaction/menu navigation is possible.

title: Priceline: Hotel, Flight & Car
description:
Your ultimate travel app! Snag exclusive travel deals on hotels, flights & rental cars with Priceline. Get cheap hotel booking, find last-minute travel deals for your perfect trip. Amazing hotel deals, flight deals & rental car deals await. Download now!

Your travel plans or trip style, save on hotel, flights, & rental car with Priceline. Our travel app helps compare travel deals, secure cheap hotel bookings, finalize trip details, & save on every hotel & flight deal, wherever you are. Finding cheap hotel bookings and last-minute travel deals is simpler than ever.

Hotels, cheap flights & rental car deals - 5 reasons to download our travel app for your next trip & great travel deals:

Exclusive hotel deals & cheap hotel booking offers in our travel app. Unique travel deals for app users! VIPs unlock discounts & perks on hotel bookings, making trips rewarding with savings.
Your perfect hotel: Hotel deals with personalized recommendations for your trip. Find cheap hotel booking solutions for seamless travel planning.
Travel ready: All for your vacation or business travel in one place - hotel deals, rental car deals, & cheap flights. Your essential travel app for a stress-free trip.
Fast hotel booking: Secure your hotel or cheap hotel booking in seconds. Our travel app streamlines trip planning for hotel needs & last-minute travel deals.
Any hotel, any budget: Hostels to 5-star hotels, find accommodation & hotel deals for any trip & budget. Great travel deals for all.
Love travel and deals? Millions book travel deals for their trip with our travel app daily - download for your next trip! Hotel deals, flight deals, & cheap rental car deals mean serious savings. Find last-minute travel deals!

BUNDLE & SAVE WITH PACKAGE DEALS!
Bundle & save on your trip with Package Booking. Combine hotel, flights, & rental car in one booking for package travel deals. Craft your travel itinerary easily; our travel app makes trip planning simple & affordable. Priceline is your go-to travel app for trip management & package deals. Make dream trips a reality & save! Package bookings: smart travel savings.

HOTEL DEALS
Save up to 60% with Express Deals¬Æ on hotels! VIPs get more exclusive deals on hotels & cheap hotel booking, making trips affordable. Find best hotel deals & last-minute travel deals in our travel app. Cheap hotel booking is a tap away.

FLIGHT DEALS
Global travel, great deals on domestic & international flights. Our travel app finds flight deals for your next trip easily from your phone. Plan travel confidently with flight deals.

RENTAL CAR DEALS
Road trip deals on rental cars, 290 brands, 28,000+ locations. Our travel app makes finding rental cars simple. Free cancellation on most bookings & no credit card fees. Travel easy.

COMPARE, BOOK & SAVE
Find accommodation, cheap hotel bookings, & travel deals easily with our travel app. Search by city/interest to book hotels & rental cars for your trip. We find more travel & last-minute deals as you search.

QUICK HOTEL BOOKING
Rushed? Our travel app offers quick travel & hotel booking, especially signed in! Hostel tonight or cheap hotel booking for next month's vacation - we do fast well, securing your hotel.

YOUR TRAVEL BUDDY
Access & change trips with My Trips in our travel app. Check hotel/rental car details on the go. All travel info on your phone, even offline/booked on computer. Like magic! This travel app is your perfect trip companion for all deals.

Rated Best App for Travelers by Travel + Leisure! Book flights, get cheap hotel bookings, find accommodation, explore destinations for your trip - the Priceline travel app is best for all travel deals, like last-minute travel deals.

Priceline: trusted travel app for hotel, flight, & rental car deals. Part of Booking Holdings (Booking.com, Agoda, Kayak & OpenTable). Amazing travel deals & memorable trips start here!

title: Camera FV-5 Lite
description: Camera FV-5 is a professional camera application for mobile devices, that puts DSLR-like manual controls in your fingertips. Tailored to enthusiast and professional photographers, with this camera application you can capture the best raw photographs so that you can post-process them later and get stunning results. The only limit is your imagination and creativity! Major features: ‚óè All photographic parameters are adjustable and always at hand: exposure compensation, ISO, light metering mode, focus mode, white balance and program mode. ‚óè DSLR-like viewfinder display: see exposure time, aperture and stops display with EV and bracketing settings, in real-time! ‚óè Full fledged exposure bracketing: from 3 to 7 frames, unlimited stops spacing, plus custom EV shifting. ‚óè Built-in intervalometer: make stunning timelapses (even bracketed/HDR timelapses) and time-controlled picture series. ‚óè Program and Speed-priority modes. ‚óè Long exposure support: take beautiful night photos and light trails with long exposure times up to 30 seconds**. ‚óè JPEG, true 16-bit RAW in DNG format*, and lossless PNG photo capturing formats, perfect for post-processing. ‚óè Manual shutter speed: from 1/80000 to 2", or the range available on your device*. ‚óè All camera functions assignable to volume keys. You can adjust EV, ISO, color temperature and more using volume keys. Devices with hardware camera shutter key are also supported. ‚óè EXIF and XMP sidecar metadata support. ‚óè Autofocus, macro, touch-to-focus, true manual focus* and infinity focus modes. Autofocus lock feature (AF-L). ‚óè Autoexposure (AE-L) and auto white balance (AWB-L) locks in Android 4.0+. ‚óè In background photo and RAW developing and processing allows a smooth, uninterrupted camera operation. ‚óè Digital zoom using multitouch pinch gesture. Also shows 35mm equivalent focal length! ‚óè The most advanced electronic viewfinder: live RGB histogram, 10 composition grid overlays and 9 crop guides available. ‚óè Powerful organization options: different storage locations and fully customizable file names (even with variables). ‚óè The user interface is available in more than 30 languages. This camera application completely avoids scene modes, instead you get full manual control over all photographic parameters, just like you do with a reflex camera, so you can ultimately control every aspect of the picture, and leave the post-processing to the computer. So after your DSLR, you will never miss a photo opportunity again, being able to capture it with the closer sensation to your DSLR as possible. The Lite version is a fully functional version of Camera FV-5, with limited picture resolution support. Please buy Pro version to unlock all your device's resolutions and enable RAW capture (if it is supported on your device). IMPORTANT: If you find a bug using the application, PLEASE, visit the web page http://www.camerafv5.com/ or write to support@camerafv5.com with your phone model name and the description of the problem, before writing a negative comment. Customer satisfaction is our priority, and we will do our best to fix the issues as soon as possible! Connect with Camera FV-5 and stay always up to the latest information about current and future development. Visit the official website http://www.camerafv5.com, be a fan of http://www.facebook.com/CameraFV5, subscribe to http://www.twitter.com/CameraFV5 or watch tutorials at http://www.youtube.com/user/camerafv5. * Requires Android 5.0+ and a fully compliant Camera2 implementation. Currently only LG Nexus 5 and Motorola Nexus 6. ** Requires Android 5.0+. Compatible as well on the Samsung Galaxy Camera (1 and 2), Galaxy S4 Zoom and HTC One (M8). On Android 4.4 or older, long exposures lowers picture resolution to 2 or 1 MP, depending models. The reason is explained here: http://www.camerafv5.com/faq.php#long-exposure-resolution
descriptionHTML:
Camera FV-5 is a professional camera application for mobile devices, that puts DSLR-like manual controls in your fingertips. Tailored to enthusiast and professional photographers, with this camera application you can capture the best raw photographs so that you can post-process them later and get stunning results. The only limit is your imagination and creativity!


Major features:

‚óè All photographic parameters are adjustable and always at hand: exposure compensation, ISO, light metering mode, focus mode, white balance and program mode.
‚óè DSLR-like viewfinder display: see exposure time, aperture and stops display with EV and bracketing settings, in real-time!
‚óè Full fledged exposure bracketing: from 3 to 7 frames, unlimited stops spacing, plus custom EV shifting.
‚óè Built-in intervalometer: make stunning timelapses (even bracketed/HDR timelapses) and time-controlled picture series.
‚óè Program and Speed-priority modes.
‚óè Long exposure support: take beautiful night photos and light trails with long exposure times up to 30 seconds**.
‚óè JPEG, true 16-bit RAW in DNG format*, and lossless PNG photo capturing formats, perfect for post-processing.
‚óè Manual shutter speed: from 1/80000 to 2", or the range available on your device*.
‚óè All camera functions assignable to volume keys. You can adjust EV, ISO, color temperature and more using volume keys. Devices with hardware camera shutter key are also supported.
‚óè EXIF and XMP sidecar metadata support.
‚óè Autofocus, macro, touch-to-focus, true manual focus* and infinity focus modes. Autofocus lock feature (AF-L).
‚óè Autoexposure (AE-L) and auto white balance (AWB-L) locks in Android 4.0+.
‚óè In background photo and RAW developing and processing allows a smooth, uninterrupted camera operation.
‚óè Digital zoom using multitouch pinch gesture. Also shows 35mm equivalent focal length!
‚óè The most advanced electronic viewfinder: live RGB histogram, 10 composition grid overlays and 9 crop guides available.
‚óè Powerful organization options: different storage locations and fully customizable file names (even with variables).
‚óè The user interface is available in more than 30 languages.


This camera application completely avoids scene modes, instead you get full manual control over all photographic parameters, just like you do with a reflex camera, so you can ultimately control every aspect of the picture, and leave the post-processing to the computer. So after your DSLR, you will never miss a photo opportunity again, being able to capture it with the closer sensation to your DSLR as possible.


The Lite version is a fully functional version of Camera FV-5, with limited picture resolution support. Please buy Pro version to unlock all your device's resolutions and enable RAW capture (if it is supported on your device).


IMPORTANT: If you find a bug using the application, PLEASE, visit the web page http://www.camerafv5.com/ or write to support@camerafv5.com with your phone model name and the description of the problem, before writing a negative comment. Customer satisfaction is our priority, and we will do our best to fix the issues as soon as possible!


Connect with Camera FV-5 and stay always up to the latest information about current and future development. Visit the official website http://www.camerafv5.com, be a fan of http://www.facebook.com/CameraFV5, subscribe to http://www.twitter.com/CameraFV5 or watch tutorials at http://www.youtube.com/user/camerafv5.


* Requires Android 5.0+ and a fully compliant Camera2 implementation. Currently only LG Nexus 5 and Motorola Nexus 6.
** Requires Android 5.0+. Compatible as well on the Samsung Galaxy Camera (1 and 2), Galaxy S4 Zoom and HTC One (M8). On Android 4.4 or older, long exposures lowers picture resolution to 2 or 1 MP, depending models. The reason is explained here: http://www.camerafv5.com/faq.php#long-exposure-resolution
summary: Professional camera app that brings DSLR manual photography controls to Android.

scraped_reviews.content: Well, looks like CFV-5 has been abandoned again! (Or is it finished?) It's well made without having a lot of settings options to wade through. A dark background for the icons would help see them if the picture is at all bright. Having the shutter release change the zoom is good: this way I can see the effect not my fingers. I like that the video switch is in a menu, not on the viewfinder where it's too easy for my big finger to hit it accidentally.

I tried using it for astrophotography, mounting the phone to the camera, but it definitely didn't work properly. Longer exposure times do not result in a deeper image. Once it had an audacity to tell me that no frames were sent for a long exposure image, so I suspect that it internally takes a series of images and coadds them, which, well, coadd the noise as well, so it is impossible to collect enough light on anything that isn't visible in the preview window. You can get star trails of the brightest stars, but any nebulosity, any faint objects, you can forget about it.  Not to mention, it is very battery hungry.

Imagine trying to take a photo at night of an insect, but you cannot frame the picture because it is just to dark, well Camera FV-5 to the rescue, for they really went through a lot of trouble to make their camera as versatile as possible. Camera FV-5 is loaded with features and if I could, I would have given them 10 stars. I do a lot of close-up technical photography of component level electronic equipment and with this i never have to redo it to get the right results. Thank you!

ok I guess. No labels on buttons for the userface was my only frustration. I found it difficult navigating my way and identifying stuff beyond the tutorial provided. Perhaps I missed something there with settings. I'm 51 y/o age and have little knowledge of anything technical. Being unfamiliar with a new app/prog like this one with new user interface/functions to learn, my best efforts resulted in lots of mistakes & lots of time wasted. No shutter speed settings? any chance of patching that in?

Installed and uninstalled in 30 seconds. I understand it's a free version but what I don't understand is why it gives you a max resolution of 2.1 mp. Give us photo in our cameras with full resolution with a watermark so we can get a real feel of the app. After that, we can purchased the paid version if we like it (which I won't be doing).

Settings for ISO, shutter speeds, metering modes, more. I love it. I recommend it. It pretty much turns your phone into a manual rangefinder camera that you have at hand at all times in a pocket. This Lite version is easy to use and is far better than the average camera that comes with most phones. A real upgrade. A big thank you to the developer!üåüüåüüåüüåüüåü

phone must be perfectly still. My old Pixel's native camera app had an excellent long exposure feature, and you didn't have to hold your camera perfectly still or mount it on a tripod, it would combine the still parts of the image so that they remained sharp. with this app, the still objects are blurry, even when bracing the phone. It still creates an interesting effect, but not what I had hoped for.

It says you can take long exposure pictures up to 60 seconds. The instructions arent for this app tho. Pics of the interface for basic operation dont match even a little. None of the steps in the instructions are accurate at all. None of the descriptions match up. Garbage.. I dont think this app can even take long exposures. Been messing around for a really long time trying to find the option w No luck. Gonna poke around a little more and delete it if it wont do what i downloaded it to do .

Excellent app but it has delays in approaching the camera due to repeating some of the things after installing it, doesn't allow me to go straight to the camera,also not saving photos straight to the SD card.

I've been using this app since I got my Galaxy S3 many years ago (new) and this is still the best camera app I've ever used. I hope to maybe see options someday for the thermal imaging camera on phones such as Blackview, I would be very impressed if it happened. This app doesn't seem to have any noticeable effect on my battery life and hasn't lagged in any way. (Currently using the ubiquitous Samsung A03-2024)

The final picture shows much more than focused on. And widescreen shots appear square. And there isn't an autofocus mode as well. We should have the option. That's how dslr's are. If i want a film camera experience, I'll use my Nikons.

This is Great! All of the basic manual controls I've been wanting on my phone! Works well. Easy to use, opens fast, no brainwork -- just adjust and capture. Now I have wayyyyyy more control over my images, and I almost feel like I have my FujiFilm with me rather than my LG Stylo 5. If I happen to have my extra lenses and tripod in my backpack, it's as though I have a full setup without feeling like I'm carrying extra gear!

Great App. I tried this on my Samsung s9+. Too be honest I don't know why I tried it maybe just board in Lockdown. Anyway I took a few photo's and noticed straight away that Fv-5 was a lot clearer and colours where better too. I did a zoom comparison and on the phones own software the picture was not that clear on max zoom. With FV-5 it zoomed in more and was very clear. I took a photo of stones and rubble and even the smallest stones you could see clearly. Going for full ver for sure.

Decent camera but a bit slow. Out of 5 tested apps this landed in the middle of the pack. I have done several tests on various decides, clean cache and memory, clean start etc. It takes 1.5 x the amout of time from the best performers (also free) from "start of the app to the first shot and picture saved". Every second counts of you need to make picture as fast as possible.

This app is horrible for Android users! I downloaded the app and was even excited about the being able to control the ISO, Shutter Speed, and Exposure before taking the shot. But I often resulted to using the auto mode due to a lack of control with the exposure tool! The screen would often become very dark and the exposure tool could not be clicked on. Also images came out extremely pixilated. I got better results from my phone' s HDR settings

I used this app years ago, then updated my phone, can't remember which one, and it stopped working. So, I have reloaded the new version and it's working great so far. I love the intervalometer (sp?). Set to take a photo every few seconds for either a number of photos, or a set length of time. Lots of other great features. I'm happy to have it in my bag of apps again.

Most unstable cam app on the market. It crashes every time you return from the gallery and every time you activate it. I mean EVERY TIME. If you set exposure to "short" or "long" or some other values it will display focus as NaN and just shoot black blank images. It's just the tip of the iceberg. Developers don't seem to test the app at all. PS. Just updated. Now it can't even focus anymore. Just keeps trying infinitely.

I'd buy the paid version if it was reliable. I got a new Xiaomi Mi 9T (Redmi K20) which is still unrooted and on stock rom. Whenever I press the "Interval shooting" option, it just closes itself. I want to use my phone for making long-exposure timelapses at night. Would be great if you could look into the problem, as I said, I'd be happy to pay if it worked!

App crashes constantly and repeatedly after running only a minute or two, or less. Controls look fine, but that's rather moot, when you can't get it to run long enough to actually take a photo... The only positive thing I can say about it, is that it uninstalled flawlessly. I, unfortunately, can't give it zero stars.

Interface is really not appealing. What so ever. Basic privileges are subpar due to the fact that other free apps achieve the same results or do better. Premium privileges don't seem worth the price, like why am I going to pay for high quality when my stock already shoots the highest quality. Also I'm not sure if some of the premium features are even available for my device I.E. I definitely know I can't take RAW pictures. It's just not worth the buy and free version doesnt give enough to decide

It seemed to work fine when I installed it 2 days ago, but now the controls are there but the viewfinder is just a black screen. Yesterday it started black, I fiddled with settings and got a picture that was half green, then without changing other settings suddenly it was fine. But today it's all black. Will try to reinstall, but don't have high hopes.

Started with the lite, then bought the paid version, but did a return. I have a Samsung Galaxy S10e, the app keeps crashing. I may try later uninstalling, then installing the paid version directly. For long exposure photography, ICM, etc I really like the app. I had planned to make this my default phone camera but with the problems of crashing that's not going to work out. So I'll continue to use Open Camera by default, and this app for "artsy" ICM experiments.

Reasonable app. I like being in control of iso and other manual things that my onboard camera app doesn't have. I have an oppo a5s. What I don't like: Very often the app crashes. Almost every time I open it. So I need to start it several times. Minimum iso I can set is 100 though meta data of auto iso pictures tell me my phone has a lower base iso than 100. I also don't like that below 1 second you can't really control the shutter time. There is no 1/16 eg but only "short" and "long".

Very disappointed. When I first downloaded this app it WAS awesome! Settings were easily operational. Images clean clear detailed nice color. I do alot of nature and astrotography so quality and setting options are very important. You guys ruined a good thing. It also has issues with permission settings which was my final draw when I wasn't even using my phone it turned on taking pics no joke one day over 4000!!!! An it kept overiding my control n security settings not F'n cool!üëéüñï‚úåÔ∏è

The feature that I wanted most (interval/timelapse) does not work.  It crashes the app 100% of the time.  Support does not respond, and the website's FAQ self-help support page does not have any info on it at all.  The search function returns 0 results, no matter what I search for.  Too bad because some of the features seem nice, but I could not possibly recommend this to anyone with the fact that it crashes and offers ZERO support.

Cant turn off the "intervalometer" or whatever tf that is supposed to be called. Took me longer than 10 seconds to find a solution, but if some stupid app is gonna ask me to invest that kind of time, I'd much rather just put that energy into writing a bad review for it. Deleted and went for Open Camera instead, much better choice so far.

The exposure bracketing is not customizable good enough level. It sort of works automatically, it captures 5,6, or 7 photos (even if set to 0.7 EV and 7 photos. Also shutter speed jumps around. I only wanted to save DNG, but it saves jpg png and dng same time. Biggest positive is png save speed, it's fast, 7 photos take 15 seconds, HedgeCam takes 240 seconds.

No exposure adjustment? I looked all over for an exposure adjustment so i could lower the shutter speed to capture flowing water. Even with the iso as low as possible, it's naturally over exposed. Seems strange not to include exposure adjustment.

The app is unusable after paying for the pro with Xperia XZ1 Compact. It shows only 8MP max resolution (I could live with that) and it gets stuck after taking one or two photos every time. It just shows a rotating circle and won't do anything. For taking another photo I have to kill and restart the app or change to front camera and back. Weird is that the Lite version works alright.

Used this for a few years on different Android phones. Use it mainly for the light trails synthetic exposure as that's my thing. I used to like seeing the corrupted image artifacts on the long exposures, e.g multiple images on one long exposure image. Is there any way to bring this back as an extra feature perhaps? All good otherwise :-)

Max resolution 2048x1536, or buy Pro.... As settings options apears under home button, app is quite useless. As soon as I try to change a setting, home button is activated and I'm on the home screen. If I pay, does Pro version work. Not even going to try. If you don't have the time to do it correct the first tme, when will you have time to do it correct? ISO set to 100, my guess is it really is1600. Lot of settings, but non of them change anything.

OK, final update. App deleted, was put and about, and decided yo take a quick picture,but low and behold I when I opened it all the settings had changed again. I had 4 cameras on my, now three, and this is the only app that does this. Thank god I have upgraded to a real camera.

Long exposure images look like water colour and don't actually "expose" the image e.g. make it lighter, the image doesn't get any lighter even on 60+ seconds exposure on tripod, anyway to fix this? My default camera app supports 32 second exposures and it does it really well, not sure what this app is doing differently :/

Recently changes brings the app up with shutter time(?) at lowest setting, makimg it very dark. Too bad, I really liked the app. Don't know if the paid version allows the opening setting to be changed. Since most of the time I want to take a picture immediately, I stopped using.

A lot of options which can overwhelm users.You could try to scale down the ui and add labels for the options because i cant seem to find which option does what? Also you need to make the icons smaller.A tutorial or guide on manual photography and how to take advantages of the features would be a massive help.As it stands right now this is only meant for the "know it all" experts photography demographic.

Crashes and hangs Very nice when it works. However if crashes after phone goes into sleep mode and is woken up .. the camera comes back up on wake up but it's frozen and must be cleared with the task manager. Also other bugs. Love the features the layout just wish it worked without hanging and crashing.

can't enlarge photo for details post or send arrow is hidden and not scrolling. must go up again to post. simple send arrow after typing and done yet keyboard is stuck and can't post. weird setup? you have to use the left arrow to finish send

Had the payed version of the older app. Bhought I'd try this out. But no. Like that one, I film in 1080p and it seems to work fine... but try switching to 2160p (UHD) and the app crashes the moment you presd pause... it was the same on my note4 as on my current One+5t... the fact that they went to a new app without fixing these basics seems fishy... not to mention that even if it worked on the new one I'd have to pay for something I have already payed for... so no... I do not trust these guys.

Claims to be capable of long exposure but isn't, can't be bothered with lying developers, so app deleted. Glad they had this free version so I know not to ever get sucked in by this scammer developer again. Waste of time, effort and bandwidth... price is exactly right though, this camera is worth nothing.

Too many problems to bother listing. Maybe will work on my next phone which will have Camera2 api 3, instead of slightly limited version in my Samsung Galaxy a50. Too bad the app is kind of crippled, because it almost fixes the problems with the native camera app. FV-5 has always not quite worked on my phones but doesn't hurt to try every once in a while.

This app only works on older versions of Android software. I have an old phone running 4.3 and the app works fine, but on my every day Samsung, nothing works. Probably because the app hasn't been updated in at least 3 years. So if you have the latest and greatest, don't bother, because it's not going to work. But on my old samsung Android, all functions are operating well. I would give it 5 stars for the old version, but zero stars because it's way out of date. So it gets a 3. Grab an old Android

1. After upgraded to version 5.xx, back camara is always 90% disoriented; that's why gave up buying pro version! 2. However, custom storage is enabled and accessed to external storage; this was much better! 3. Anyhow now I can't use back camera? So I rate it 3 stars only. 4. Check the errors please.

can only change the iso to 3200 and the longest exposure is 1/10. my Huawei p30 pro.. old old phone. could do 30nsexond exposures and 64000 for the iso. and that was just the basic phone camera. now. every app. every phone camera. 3200 max iso. and 10.second exposure IF that. pathetic.

all the pop ups including the image previewafter your shot comes up as landscape when you're holding your phone in portrait. the photo preview comes up 1/3 of the way off the bottom of the screen. Auto white balance automatically white balances poorly at best and autofocus doesn't automatically focus

I wish this app worked fine with my Nokia 6.1. Today I took a picture but hours later I realised the file was not saved anywhere on my phone. Eventually it started crashing unexpectedly and I decided to uninstall it. Hope there's an upcoming update where I can fully use the interesting features this app promises to deliver.

Takes great photos when it works. This app likes to crash on me constantly. It crashes while switching front to back cameras, it crashes when I flip my phone and the screen rotates, sometimes it simply says the camera driver isn't responding. I don't have time to reboot my phone when I want to snap a quick photo.

What a beautiful waste. It just loads and take too long to take a pic. i just got this phome yesterday (LG Q7 Plus) so its not the phone. if it took the pic quick like the very first pic you take with it, (first pic loads quick but after that it just has the twirling white circle) it would be one of the absolute best apps ever.

There's a bug in my Realme 3 Pro. After I do an act (settings, see album, or anything else), always close the app by itself. And when I click the album, there's another bug in the display, the photo's position is down of the display, not center. Please fix :)

Such a depressing app. The shutter speed and iso controls had no effect on the camera. Despite of bearing that, it tampered the brightness settings of my phone turning bright and dim every 10 seconds for other apps too, even when it was NOT set to automatic.

Definitely one of the better camera apps available as my stock camera app is rather poor. I didn't know that my phone's camera had all this additional functionality and is actually capable of taking pictures I thought was impossible with my stock camera application.

title: Inter ‚Äì Banking & Investing
description:
Inter's banking super app helps you simplify your financial life with a full range of banking solutions‚Äîall in one app.
Spend, invest in stocks, save with gift cards, and send money abroad directly from your phone.

Take control of your finances in a modern way and access services designed for your lifestyle.

Why choose Inter?

- Trusted by millions: More than 40 million people use Inter.
- Your money is FDIC insured.
- Gift cards with cashback: Explore offers and deals from top brands.
- Physical & virtual debit card
- Inter Passport Credit Card
- Invest in stocks & ETFs from as little as $5.
- Global money transfers : send money to over 60 countries, including Mexico, Colombia, Brazil, El Salvador, Guatemala, Honduras, Ecuador.

And more:  

- 24/7 multilingual support: English, Spanish, and Portuguese.
- Inter LOOP rewards program: Earn points to exchange for gift cards and other perks.
- Get eSIMS for your mobile data needs.

Open your digital account and access all services in one place. 

DISCLAIMER: 

INTER & CO PAYMENTS, INC., doing business as Inter (‚ÄúInter‚Äù), is a financial technology company, a registered money services business (MSB) and a licensed money transmitter, not a bank (NMLS ID #907330).  Massachusetts Foreign Transmittal Agency (License #FT114374-100). Rhode Island Currency Transmitter (License # 20203960CT). Click here to access our NMLS licenses. 

Banking services are provided by Community Federal Savings Bank (‚ÄúCFSB‚Äù), Member FDIC and deposits are held by CFSB and Wells Fargo Bank, Members FDIC.  Inter is not a depository institution, deposits held at CFSB and Wells Fargo are not eligible for FDIC insurance.

The Inter US Checking account is provided by Continental Bank, Member FDIC. Inter US Checking accounts are FDIC-insured up to US$250,000. Inter US Checking account funds are eligible for FDIC insurance up to the allowable limit through Continental Bank, Member FDIC, and other program banks. Coverage is subject to aggregation of all of each account holder‚Äôs funds held on deposit at Continental Bank or at each of its program banks. Funds generated through Inter‚Äôs payment processing services are generally available in the Inter US Checking account balance immediately after a payment is processed. Fund availability times may vary due to technical issues. Inter is not a bank. Inter US Checking accounts do not provide monthly paper statements and do not issue physical paper checks. Inter US Checking accounts are not interest-bearing accounts. 

FDIC deposit insurance coverage only protects against the failure of an FDIC-insured deposit institution. If you have an Inter US Checking account, up to US$250,000 of your balance may be covered by FDIC insurance on a pass through basis through Continental Bank, Member FDIC, subject to aggregation of the account holder‚Äôs funds held at Continental Bank and if certain conditions have been met. 

Mortgage services are provided by Inter US Finance, LLC (NMLS ID #1161874), an affiliate of Inter & Co Payments, Inc. 

Securities brokerage services are provided by Inter&Co Securities LLC, Member FINRA/SIPC , an affiliate of Inter & Co Payments, Inc. and a wholly-owned subsidiary of Inter&Co US Holding.  View important information and disclosures here . 

If you have any questions or concerns regarding any transaction, please write to us at 501 Brickell Key Drive, Suite 202, Miami, FL 33131, or by email at help@inter.co or by calling us at 1-888-305-7264. 

The Inter US Mastercard¬Æ Credit Card is issued by Continental Bank, Member FDIC, pursuant to alicense from Mastercard International Incorporated and may be used wherever Mastercard debit is accepted. The Inter US Mastercard¬Æ Credit Card is issued by Continental Bank, Member FDIC, pursuant to a license from Mastercard International Incorporated, and may be used wherever Mastercard is accepted. scraped_reviews.content: Let me give some context; I am from Brazil, and i work in the tech field. I talk and interact with mostly foreigners online (You can see by Googling my name). Banco Inter completely locked me out of my account on 4 separate phones, supposedly because my phone is "infected with malware" (This included a phone with the only app being Inter). I called their miserable support and they didn't help. If this was just 2 years ago, i would've recommended Banco Inter without the slightest hesitation.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We're sorry to hear about your account access issues across multiple devices. Your feedback is valuable for our service improvements. We're available through our support channels via chat (https://ajuda.inter.co) and phone at 3003-4070 or 0800-940-0007. We want to turn your experience around!

scraped_reviews.content: I transferred 5$ from my venmo balance into this account via the virtual card. I never recived my deposit into my account its been hours and im still waiting on the "internal team" to email me about my funds! Super greatful i didn't transfer my entire balance over here or id been out thousands of dollars! scraped_reviews.content: Guys I'm begging you, change the Investment menu view back to what it was before! Or please make a few tweaks to it LOL. We need to click on the asset's category, which I actually liked, but when you click and get the list of assets they no longer show profit/loss right away, you must click on a particular asset "card", wait a popup page to load and only then you have the information displayed. Basically you need to go back and fourth individually clicking on each one of your assets to look if you're "making or losing money". Another thing is, if we now have a new "view", which is the pop up that shows up when you click on an asset, why wasting a huge space with a massive "Info box" saying things like "Profit/Loos" and "Average Price" are based on the asset's value at the moment of your purchase...". Why not just leave this info hidden on a ( ! ) small little icon-button and use that huge space to show a line graph with the change in the asset's price with a few filters like (Day) (Week) (Month) (Year) (5 Years)? Very simple changes that will add a lot of value to the platform (in my opinion). Please have a look at this and if possible, make some changes. Those were my 2 cents! Have a great one.

To do this, contact us via chat, in the bottom right corner of the screen on the website ajuda.bancointer.com.br or by phone, on 30034070 or 08009400007, and provide details of the problem, agreed? Hugs, Inter team. üß°

scraped_reviews.content: The app is really great. You can do every transaction with it. The bank itself is great too and you will feel very comfortable using the app to manage your account.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: #sanguelaranja

descriptionHTML:
Deezer is more than just a music platform.
It‚Äôs a fully personalized listening experience that adapts to you. From mood-driven mixes to curated playlists, discover music that sounds like you.

Deezer is where you can embrace your tastes, turn up the volume, and Live the Music.

With a Deezer Premium plan, you'll get everything you need in one app:

Music you love, made for you
‚Ä¢ A massive catalog with all the tracks you could ever want
‚Ä¢ Flow, your infinite, personalized mix of favorites and new discoveries
‚Ä¢ Curated playlists for every mood, genre, or season
‚Ä¢ Also explore Podcasts, Audiobooks*, and Radio*

Interactive and fun features
‚Ä¢ Shaker lets you mix playlists with friends and compare your tastes
‚Ä¢ Music Quiz tests your music knowledge ‚Äî solo or with friends
‚Ä¢ SongCatcher helps you find any song playing around you (even if you hum it)
‚Ä¢ Deezer Club gives you a shot at winning exclusive live event tickets

Customization at your fingertips
‚Ä¢ Shape your algorithm to find music that you love
‚Ä¢ Create custom playlist covers
‚Ä¢ Reorganize your Homepage and Favorites to put your top picks front and center
‚Ä¢ Share any song or playlist ‚Äî even with people who don‚Äôt use Deezer
‚Ä¢ Dive deeper with lyrics, including translations

And of course, the essentials
‚Ä¢ Ad-free listening, always
‚Ä¢ Offline mode for when you‚Äôre low on service
‚Ä¢ Unlimited skips and on-demand listening
‚Ä¢ HiFi audio quality, so you never miss a beat

Choose your plan:
‚Ä¢ Deezer Premium ‚Äì One Premium account with all our features
‚Ä¢ Deezer Duo ‚Äì Two Premium accounts, one subscription
‚Ä¢ Deezer Family ‚Äì Up to 6 Premium accounts with kid-friendly profiles
‚Ä¢ Deezer Student ‚Äì Get all the benefits of Deezer Premium for half the price
‚Ä¢ Deezer Free* - Full access to our catalog, with occasional ads and limited features

Take Deezer anywhere
Enjoy your music on all your favorite devices:
‚Ä¢ Smart speakers like Google Nest, Alexa & Sonos
‚Ä¢ Wearables including Galaxy Watch, Fitbit & other Wear OS devices
‚Ä¢ In your car with Automotive OS

On the road
Use Deezer Premium in your car with Automotive OS. Stream your Flow and Flow Moods, ad-free, with unlimited skips and HiFi audio quality.
Available for Deezer Premium, Deezer Family, Deezer Duo & Deezer Student plans.

On your wrist
Launch the Deezer app on your Galaxy Watch, Fitbit, or any Wear OS device and listen to your favorite tracks wherever you go.

Want more from Deezer?

Follow us:
Instagram: instagram.com/deezer
Facebook: facebook.com/deezer
X: x.com/deezer

Privacy policy
Terms of use

*Some features and plans may not be available in all countries.
summary: Your music, your playlists, and more‚Äîoffline and unlimited.

scraped_reviews.content: so, I really wanted to fully migrate to this platform from Spotify. but there's some features I wish they had so that I could enjoy it a lot more. Deezer has no way of viewing your library of music via genre suggestions like Spotify (that has issues in and of itself, I know). but the real dealbreaker for me is that there is no way to delete music from the currently listening to screen. I am always purging from my playlists, it is difficult to do that right now on this app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Sonimar, Thanks for your feedback, we really appreciate you sharing your experience. We‚Äôll pass your suggestions directly to our product team for future updates. For help contact us via this link http://dzr.fm/ContactSupport

scraped_reviews.content: I recently switched to Deezer premium from Spotify, and I've mostly been enjoying it. But lately I've been having an issue where if I pause a playlist for too long, say overnight, I can't resume it when I come back. I have to start all over again. This is really annoying for me as I like to completely finish a playlist without having to repeat songs. I might have to try another platform if this is going to be a continuous problem.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Suzi, thanks for switching to Deezer and sharing your experience! I‚Äôm sorry about the playlist issue. Please try clearing the app cache or reinstalling Deezer. If it keeps happening, contact support@deezer.com so they can help fix this.

scraped_reviews.content: Update 2: Half the songs on the app just stopped working. It pops up a message whenever a song comes up that it's unable to play, and requests you to pull up the app and troubleshoot it, but usually when I'm listening to Deezer hands free, I'm driving. I am unable to pull up my phone while driving to read the message while I'm driving. Deezer promotes usage of their app while driving, or it promotes driving in silence ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è I've finally decided to uninstall this app. Not worth the hassle.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Jay, thank you for your message. I am sorry to hear about your experience. I invite you to contact us via the link http://dzr.fm/ContactSupport for further assistance. I remain at your disposal if needed.

scraped_reviews.content: I really like Deezer so far, and it's a great alternative to Spotify. BUT I am having some buggy issues. When I tried to access my subscription management, it just sticks on the loading screen, and I had to use the PC version in order to get my playlists moved over. I will continue to stay with Deezer with the hopes that some of these bugs get ironed out over time. Music quality, selection, and interface is excellent, though.

This app is hot garbage. It won't open downloaded music without an internet connection, which defeats the purpose. It also frequently loads old versions of playlists rather than the current version. (The bug fixes they suggested did not help.) Update: Now, it won't show me explicit versions of many albums. I have to go to my liked songs, find a song from the explicit version from the album, and click "Go to Album" from there. Even then, the album doesn't load sometimes.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Aidan, Thank you for contacting Deezer support team. I understand your downloaded music isn‚Äôt playing offline and playlists aren‚Äôt updating. Please try clearing the cache, restarting your device, updating the app, and checking downloads. If the issue persists, contact our support team here: (https://support.deezer.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

scraped_reviews.content: Got this app to see if its a good alternative for Spotify due to their questionable ads lately. I barely do get any ads from this app, unlike Spotify that makes me listen to it after one song is played. I can turn on and off my phone, and it won't stop playing music, which I personally like since I do sleep listening to music. would recommend for people looking for alternatives for music app!!!

also looking for a Spotify alternative but this isn't it, very disappointed because the price point is the same but the UI is almost unusable. most importantly, on my android deezer doesn't play music unless the app is front and center and open on my phone. meaning I can't navigate away to another app. I can't close my screen. my phone always has to be on.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for the review and we are sorry for the trouble caused,please contact us via this link http://dzr.fm/ContactSupport and tell us the email address associated with your Deezer account so that we can assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: Pretty close to perfect. The app has occasionally crashed on me, even after initial set up. Just scrolling around, it'll freeze for a sec and crash or I get a pop-up telling me the app is unresponsive. All my playlists and favorites were transferred over from Spotify but for some reason my downloads are taking forever to finish. I'm really enjoying the high quality audio and availability of podcasts. I would like a 15-30 sec. skip on android auto for podcasts though. Great app alternative though
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Richard, thanks for the review and we are sorry for the trouble. To resolve the issues, please update Deezer to the latest version and also clear the cache. If it still doesn‚Äôt work, contact support at http://dzr.fm/ContactSupport and include the email linked to your Deezer account so they can assist further.

scraped_reviews.content: I'd like this app a lot more if there was an option to turn off playing songs that aren't on my playlist. Please add an feature to turn off random songs playing in the playlist. I think it's stupid that on the website, you can only play 30 seconds of a song. I was trying to find another alternative to Spotify because they've just been so money hungry these days. I used to use this app in highschool and I liked it then but it turns out y'all are just as money hungry. So annoying..
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Nana, Please reach out to us via this link: http://dzr.fm/ContactSupport so that we can assist you better.

scraped_reviews.content: switched from Spotify and it's a comparable experience. Getting used to a new interface/layout has been an adjustment, but I'm sure I'll get used to it soon. I had thousands of liked songs and dozens of playlists that were transferred; only a few random, obscure songs aren't on Deezer. Making the switch was easy and definitely should have done it sooner. I do wish there was a way to save podcast episodes to "like" or add to a playlist.

It seems like a good alternative to Spotify, but it could use some polishing and quality-of-life features. E.g. when clicking on + to add to a playlist, I can't tell if the song is already in a playlist or not. - For podcasts, there's no option to add to queue. - I'll be using this app for now. Hopefully it improves so that I can stick with it. (Spotify is good, but it's a problematic company in so many ways).
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello John , Thank you for the review . Kindly reach out to our support via http://dzr.fm/ContactSupport so that we solve your issue immediately

scraped_reviews.content: I want to like this app, I'm glad it pays artists fairly, but it is so slow I often have to wait a full minute for a playlist page to load or for a selected song to start playing. When adding songs to queue you can't swipe them, and it takes 30+ seconds for a song's options to pull up to even add to queue. I can't continue using such a slow app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, thank you for your feedback. I‚Äôm sorry to hear the app has been slow. Please ensure you‚Äôre using the latest version, as updates improve speed and stability. Your comments help us identify urgent improvements. If possible, reach out via the in-app Help section with your device details and app version so we can assist you. Thanks again!

scraped_reviews.content: Better sound quality on most songs than Spotify but everything else is worse. I often wait up to a minute for songs to load, manually have to press play after they load, and sometimes multiple songs will play simultaneously. The song/artist mixes aren't as good as Spotify either. Playing Michael Jackson usually ends up with artists like Jordin Sparks or JoJo playing next. Or playing Journey results in 80s bands even my parents have never heard of. The app could be a lot better but is rough rn.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Bena, Thank you for your detailed feedback. We're glad you enjoy the sound quality, but we're sorry your experience hasn't been smooth. Long loading times and tracks playing simultaneously are not normal. Please ensure you're using the latest app version for performance fixes. If issues persist, our support team can help. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: The app description said that with the free version, I'd get FULL ACCESS with ads. But the first album I tried to play only gave me one song - the rest were only available if I paid for Premium. That's full access? Also, it won't just play. an. album. All I want is an app that I can use to select an album, and play it from beginning to end. Is that so much to ask for?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Veronica, thank you for the review and we are sorry for the trouble that you have faced, for a better experience please subscribe to one of our offers using this link https://tinyurl.com/bddm5vbt. Thank you

scraped_reviews.content: Switched from Spotify due to an ongoing boycott of their services. Tbh, I don't regret it. Deezer is a really good alternative, and I'm enjoying it. Sound quality is good, almost all my liked songs from Spotify were able to be transferred with little issues, and it's quick/snappy to use. Only issue is the Deezer Player widget. After a few songs, it just stops working. Can't use the player controls to go to the next or previous song, or to pause playback. Fix that and it'll be 5 star material.

Deezer has good potential! I left spotify and wanted to try something different. The sound quality is miles better than spotify! I'm hearing things in songs I've never heard before. The UX/UI is not the best. The queue is not intuitive and you can't queue songs if you're using flow or a mix. After I imported my spotify library, the app slowed down a lot and was very laggy.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Amanda , I apologize for the inconveniences . Kindly Clear Cache , Update the app , If the issue persists , Reach out to our Support via http://dzr.fm/ContactSupport so that we solve your issue immediately .

scraped_reviews.content: My issues after 1 month: there's no way to sort playlists into folders, I have over 100 of them so that would be nice. Add to queue doesn't work; it adds the song randomly instead of after what's playing now, and you can't queue a song without internet?? If you go to an artist page and just play from the top, most the time you only get a few songs before it starts over. PLEASE change this to play every track the artist has released, instead of just the "most popular" ones.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Aaron ,I understand your concern, and I am here to assist you! For help, you can contact us by email or live chat between 9 AM and 5 PM GMT. Our team is ready to support you quickly and efficiently. Please reach out here: http://dzr.fm/ContactSupport

scraped_reviews.content: I've had the app for three days & I'm already considering switching to an alternative. it gave me a really hard time transferring my music from Spotify. now as I drove to work this morning, I was over halfway through a 2hr podcast episode & was all of a sudden hit with ads. no biggie, tried to skip over them bc there's a 30sec skip button, right? no. skips to the previous episode. then I go back through and get to the part where the episode skipped. no, the ad plays and skips to the next episode
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Sarah, thanks for sharing your experience sorry for the frustration with ads and skipping. That definitely shouldn‚Äôt happen during your podcast. Please try reinstalling the app or clearing the cache, and if the issue persists, reach out on http://dzr.fm/ContactSupport so we can help troubleshoot. We appreciate your patience!

scraped_reviews.content: I tried Deezer as a replacement for Spotify because of its involvement with the arms industry. I must say that I have been more than pleasantly surprised as I use it mainly to listen through my tuner, which offers app integration and Deezer provides much higher quality sound (FLAC). Also, I was able to transfer all of my playlists over without a hitch. Right now I rate it a high 4 stars because the UI can still be improved. After nearly a month I'm happy and keeping it.

Switched from Spotify- I really like the interface and the "Flow" function. The library transfer is super easy, and took no time to bring everything over from Spotify. my only gripe is that I wish the app would keep me signed in. I need to sign in basically every time I open the app. Hopefully, a bug that can be fixed soon!

It takes learning. I am not a fan of not controlling my entertainment experience, in any way. The 'free' account on the app does not allow organic connection with loved music experiences. It insists on pushing music that is not authentically desired. It withholds desired music/songs. Whether the intent to pay is an interest or not, the app really makes you think about not paying for it. Like final exam think about it. Frustration is definitely a by-product here.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Grover, thank you for your message. I'm sorry about this experience. Your point is noted, and I'll pass it on to the appropriate department. I'll be in touch if you need me. I wish you a very nice day.

scraped_reviews.content: read if you're switching from Spotify.... The app is easy to use. I do find that it is a little slower compared to S. Yesterday it straight up wouldn't load some songs. I was very happy that I could easily switch my playlists over. I think the algo/AI does a good job of knowing what I may like. my cons are that 1: for sleep time there is no "end of episode" and the WORST con is although it connects to Alexa, it's through voice only, NOT the app!!!

Pros: it's not Spotify. Easy import. Doesn't force political content in your face. Better music quality. Has some better "general" playlists. More useful content suggestions. Has a SHUFFLE not w/e Spotify has. Cons: the desktop apps make me login all the time. Doesn't have all the music I want (but most of it, even obscure things). It's kinda random. Doesn't have Spotify's user generated playlists (tho if they were clever they would import these).

The music streaming is good but the algorithm and sorting are... strange. It seems to pull from ALL of your liked files, even when generating for a "like this artist" or "like this album" queue, and I found that they had multiple artists with the same name under one listing, meaning I couldn't follow the one I actually liked in the list without 20 others. I do like the way ads are done so far. They're about as frequent as on Spotify but much shorter.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Odysseus, Thank you for your acknowledgment. Please reach out to us to help you with this sorting issue by using this link: http://dzr.fm/ContactSupport (http://dzr.fm/ContactSupport). with your email address linked to your Deezer account so that we can assist you further?

scraped_reviews.content: I really really wanted to like this app but it's probably the most broken app I've used in a long time! in order to get the really good quality you have to download on HiFi which takes up a lot of space but even when it's downloaded it would take 5 or 6 seconds to start the next song. but that's if they play the next song at all. it's been incredibly frustrating to say the least
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Briscoe ,thanks for the review and sorry for the trouble caused . Please update Deezer to the latest version and also clear the cache. If it still doesn‚Äôt work, contact support at http://dzr.fm/ContactSupport and include the email linked to your Deezer account so they can assist further.

scraped_reviews.content: The Mix and Flow features are great. I found several new artists I had never heard before. It helps keep music fresh, whereas Spotify feels very stale and repetitive. However, the app is riddled with all kinds of bugs. Menus that pop up and then disappear, searches that fail and then have to have a single letter changed to actually try again, and often a loop of attempting to load songs and not doing it. The integration with Sonos is also pretty bad, it often does not work at all.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Zack , I apologize for the inconveniences caused. Please reach out to our Deezer Support via http://dzr.fm/ContactSupport so that we solve your issue as soon as possible.

scraped_reviews.content: Good and bad.. In many ways it's much like any other streaming player, I like the concept option that I can "dislike" certain tracks and artists so they won't be played, although it often goes ahead and plays those tracks anyway! The most annoying thing is it simply won't cast to my home amplifier no matter how many times I try. ‚ÄîOther players cast just fine, but Deezer won't do it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Daniel, thank you for the acknowledgement and am sorry to hear that you have issues with the functionality of your app. Can you please contact us via this link http://dzr.fm/ContactSupport and tell us the email address associated with your Deezer account so that we can assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: Generally a good substitute for Spotify. But I have a couple of gripes: -As far as I can tell, there's no way to search for a specific song while using Android Auto. -Shuffling your playlists doesn't stick in Android Auto either. I have to select it every time I start my car and music. -Cleaning up a particularly big playlist takes a long time between waiting for search results to load and getting changes to appear.

Doesn't have a lot of songs I like which would be fine if all the songs actually downloaded. It's almost/completely selective. I've moved songs to other playlists to see if they'll download there. The best option was keeping them on the screen while the songs load and this was on another device and a lot of the songs still didn't download for offline access. Not a big fan but it's okay for the time being. Searching for a good mp3 player so I can just do it the old way.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi , thanks for contacting us . Please update Deezer to the latest version and also clear the cache. If it still doesn‚Äôt work, contact support at http://dzr.fm/ContactSupport and include the email linked to your Deezer account so they can assist further.

scraped_reviews.content: I switched to deezer from spotify after finding out spotify is running ads for ICE. But spotify's quality had been rolling downhill for years anyways. The audio quality on deezer is wildly better, first off, which surprised me. The UI took some adjusting to, but not much. And it was a nice change of pace anyways. The app doesn't have as many widgets as spotify, and honestly I kinda miss the audiobooks, but overall I'm glad I made the switch and would reccomend this app to anyone.

I got this app as an alternative to Spotify and I'm happy with the switch I made. This app is great, does everything that I want in a music app and has few ads. Yes there are ads in the free version but they're pretty spaced out so you don't get them too much to annoy and most of the time it's just an ad for the premium version at least for me so far. Definitely happy with the app.

I find it difficult In general to use. Never had a music streaming service before and maybe I'm a little too old or something. But it's sort of frustrating at times to understand how to set a different play list. and why doesn't it tell you that you already have added a song to a list? don't think I'll renew my subscription and just go back to my CDs and radio.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Paulo, I apologize for the inconveniences that you have faced , please contact us via this link http://dzr.fm/ContactSupport and tell us the email address associated with your Deezer account so that we can assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: So far no issues other than it stops during a song . It always does it when I open the app. Doing it more and more. Was 5 stars but now 4 stars. As you can see 3 stars now. I go to add music to my music queue and it double loads sometimes even triple the same album. Super annoying. Please fix asap or I will not be renewing my subscription. Thank you
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Juan, Sorry for the interruptions and duplicate album loading. Please update your app, clear the cache, and try reinstalling if needed. If the issue continues, our support team can help resolve it quickly. Contact us here: http://dzr.fm/ContactSupport.

scraped_reviews.content: Could have been 4-5 stars if it actually worked. TONS of bugs: entirely different songs than the one I tapped would play, swipe type doesn't work, add to queue doesn't work, opening queue crashes the app, etc. Customer Support refused to give me a partial refund and told me to buy a new phone in order to make the app work. Absurd. I'm going back to downloaded, locally-stored music from now on, throwback to the iPod days. Didn't think anything could be worse than Spotify, but I was wrong.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: So sorry for your experience Jared, this is definitely not what we want for our users. Please contact us at support@deezer.com so we can provide you with more appropriate and smooth assistance. We‚Äôd love the chance to help make this right for you.

scraped_reviews.content: This app is advertised as "free", but after transferring all my music over from Spotify, I couldn't find a single song that was available without buying premium. Even the featured Playlist I was given on my front page was all premium songs. I didn't see this mentioned anywhere, and it's incredibly disappointing. The UI looked decent, and the music transfer was smooth, but that doesn't matter because I can't listen to any of it
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Logan, we're sorry to hear this. This isn't the experience we want for you, please contact us via this link http://dzr.fm/ContactSupport and tell us the email address associated with your Deezer account so that we can assist you better.

scraped_reviews.content: There's no point to this service on a free plan compared to Spotify. The desktop app doesn't allow you to listen to full songs, only 30 second previews. The mobile app does,but you can't choose what songs you listen to. Since Spotify recently made updates on its free plan that allows you to choose your music on mobile, Deezer is pointless unless you're paying. If you're looking for a free alternative to Spotify, Deezer ain't it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Jay, thanks for your feedback. I understand how important flexibility is, especially on free plans. Deezer Free has different features from Spotify, but we‚Äôre always working to improve the experience. If you have suggestions, we‚Äôd love to hear them let us know on http://dzr.fm/ContactSupport!

scraped_reviews.content: So, it's a good switch after Spotify. But it does still share the data with third parties. I paid for a while and then was working on budgeting. And apparently if you don't pay, you can't shuffle your playlists. So if I wanted to hear *something* I liked of my 1400 songs, I would get "inspired by." To me, that's unacceptable. And it didn't used to be that way. So I am uninstalling and finding something else. It was good while it lasted.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Lilly ,This data breach occurred in 2022 within the IT systems of a former service provider used by Deezer until 2020. The provider violated several of its contractual obligations, particularly by retaining the data after the termination of the contract with Deezer. For more details , Reach out to our Support via http://dzr.fm/ContactSupport

scraped_reviews.content: Spent hours building and editing a playlist on the desktop app, but changes will not show up on my phone no matter what I do! Have restarted phone, logged out, logged in, refreshed a hundred times! Super frustrating. Support seems to be AI now, doesn't solve anything. Tells me to check a setting I can't find, won't tell me where to find it. I'm a paid subscriber. Just sync the changes I made on my desktop to my phone! How hard is syncing?!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Jules , I apologize for the inconveniences caused . Please reach out to our Support team via http://dzr.fm/ContactSupport so that we solve your issue immediately .

scraped_reviews.content: Now that the options tab in the media player has been moved to the top, it is very difficult to access the album page on the go. This is my most used button other than "launch track mix". Deezer should consider a shortcut that takes you directly to the album page of the song you're enjoying! Otherwise, Deezer is definitely improving and rounding out their app after the update. Great job on listening to people's requests!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Justin, we apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced with Deezer. Your feedback is valuable to us, and we'd like to hear how we can improve our service. Please share your thoughts and suggestions by visiting this link: https://en.deezercommunity.com.

scraped_reviews.content: absolutely love the quality of the sound!!! but since I switched to an android device I've had nothing but problems with the app being super slow and making my phone hot and draining my battery insanely fast. fyi all my music is downloaded. sometimes it takes 20 seconds once I click a song to play it. if they could get the bugs out of it it would be amazing!
