summary: Open Source Camera app.

scraped_reviews.content: It did not help with my Galaxy S5. I needed an app that keeps recording through a 4 hour show. Most phones stop at 3.99 gigs, then start over. Also the transition was not seamless, so every 33 minutes there is a 1 second break in the video, even when trying to piece it together with video editing software. Also you are limited to 9 gigs of video (why not unlimited?). But it still resets at 3.99 gigs. This app didn't do anything better than the stock camera.

Most of the functionality of this app relies on what the camera can do and that can be disappointing in its own right. However, there are two issues where the app falls short: One is the shutter time limitation of 0.6 s - far too short for high quality night time photography. The other is that when the camera is held upside down (which I have to do to attach it to a gimbal) the "right handed" menu is on the left (as is the left-handed menu). Not good. Also interval shooting is quite inaccurate.

Deleted. It may be a nice app for others, but the one reason I got it, it has failed completely at for the last time. It just can't seem to remember the setting for my flash storage and I've taken too many pictures now where it just sends the image into nowhere land instead of saving it to my card. Too many memories lost now. That has to be the one thing that a camera app cannot fail at. The second thing is to ensure as good a picture as possible with as little input from the user as possible. All I want is a simple click and shoot and save and don't use all the fancy bells and whistles of the app.

Over all I like this app. I find it easier to use than the stock app that came on my phone. So far my only complaint is that the photos are saved to a folder called OpenCamera, so other apps don't always find them. Changing the save location is rather cumbersome as you have to type in the location of where you want to save your photos rather than just navigating to the folder and selecting it. Other than that .. I am liking it.

Love it! Put on my Stylo 6. Just what I wanted. Control over my camera for taking times pictures. Offers so many features to set it up the way you want it for exposures, times, etc. I honestly do not see where it pops up ads yet. IF it does I really do not care. Worth it. Went thru a number of apps, deleted all of them. Kept this. May not do what some people want but does exactly what I want.

I got an external mic and this app works with it. I recorded 2 videos. Everything was working fine at first. But lately whenever I get done with a video, the app freezes and crashes, the video doesn't get saved. Whenever you record, it's a roll of the dice whether it will actually save the video or freeze once you stop recording. Its not reliable. If it weren't for that, it would be perfect.

Fantastic. Been using it for several years. The advantage is full control over the hardware's feature-set, from image size, to resolution, to quality (on lossy-formats, like *.jpg), and so forth. Unlike the default app on my Samsung, which fails to offer control on common settings (on my phone, you know, the one I paid for!). Open Camera is the answer.

The main reason I got this app was for taking images without noise reduction, but the "no noise reduction" setting still compresses it more than I would like. It also places more restrictions than I would like on my shutter speed. The ISO screen is a little buggy - when I choose 400, it gives me 800; and 800 results in 1600. Still, this app provides a lot more control and freedom than most apps, and is therefore still useful.

First let me say this a very full featured app which for the most part, works excellent. I have been using it for a long time. However, be aware, it will "not work with a Bluetooth Remote Shutter device" which I depend on a lot. The remote will start the video but within ¬Ω to 2 minutes the camera will just stop recording. I have tried 3 different phones and 4 different shutter devices and it happens every time with all of them. It has never happened once with any of the stock camera apps.

It used to be ahead of the curve, but the default photo app has caught up. It's still mega useful for the screen always staying on at full brightness, something I can't believe the default app won't do. Open Cam could do without many of its settings, which don't seem to make a difference, and are organized in a way I don't understand. Please consider focusing development on the photography experience itself. The "scenes" are a great start - Right now they're far too subtle. Please go hog wild!

Easy to use and works well with USB mics which is important to me. Update: Unfortunately, there is no support for adjusting the mic gain in the application. This hadn't been a problem for me, but more recently I've found that the gain seems to vary, my recordings with Open Camera are not always at the same level, despite everything else being the same. I also had a recording that was *way* too low and the audio was barely salvageable. Still a great application for what it does (and it's free!) but I need more mic control so I'll probably look at Filmic or something else (which will not be free.)

Good camera app which adds manual controls to newer devices which have removed them in an attempt to dumb things down for the average consumer. It is glitchy, though, as it often hangs after taking a few pictures and refuses to capture a new image until I restart the app. I'm running the latest version of Android on a Google Pixel device, so there is really no reason for compatibility to be an issue. I will definitely increase the stars if/when the bugs are worked out and this becomes less cumbersome to use. Until then, it's really the best option I could find, but that is only a reflection on the limited alternatives available.

A bit daunting at first, this app affords control that can be very useful. Exposure lock and adjustments on the fly along with manual focus (using Camera2 API) allow for some very close-up, well-focused photos. Hands-down one of, if not the best camera apps out there. You don't get fancy filters and dancing hot dogs, you get the raw power you need to take great photos. Great application all around.

It's a great idea, and it would be wonderful to shoot RAW images. The problem is that sometimes the photos save, sometimes they just appear to move down to the gallary after taking a photo, but they don't actually save about 75% of the time. So when you go back and look at your photos later, you're left with about 25% of the pictures you took - which was really great when we lost a bunch of family photos. Tested both SDCard and Internal storage saving. Same behavior on Xperia 1 and Xperia 1 II.

Gotta go 2 stars because of a glaring omission. There is no simple voice command that I can find. Oddly enough, you can use voice command to set the timer, but not to take a picture. Like, you can't just point the camera and say "shoot" or whatever magic word and have it take a picture. Makes no sense as that is pretty common technology. Otherwise looks like it could have been a nice app. And please, if I am just missing the voice command setting, please let me know.

Really good camera app, lots of features and in depth control over how my photos come out. However, I have one major complaint that really irritates me: no matter what settings I use (and I've tried quite a large amount of settings and focus options), HDR photos come out blurry and out of focus every single time. HDR mode is literally useless, and it's a big draw to why I use this app over others when combined with how much control I have over my camera.

Love it. But now colors in photos & video are strangely muted. Nearly grayscale, but there is some color. Very weird. Hence I've stopped using it. Cannot find a fix. It's not a camera mode, and doesn't depend on available light either. Don't remember when this first started, but seems like a year or more ago. LOVE all the options, settings, and camera controls. But it's unfortunately become unusable because of missing color. Other camera app doesn't have this issue.

This is a very good camera app in almost every respect. My only complaint is that there is a horrible sharpness filter that gets applied when taking zoomed in pictures. The image preview actually looks great, then when I take the photo and look at it, that sharpness filter makes everything look crunchy and fake. A simple setting to turn off this behavior would be amazing.

Great app but PLEASEE make a setting for flip phones! Whenever I take a picture with my flip 5 folded, it folds the image and I can't really tell what the picture I'm taking looks like, but on the original camera app when I fold my phone, the cameras image will go to the top of the phone or you can have it go to the bottom, so the image isn't warped. Great camera though!!!

This app was just what I was looking for. Lots of settings and controls, including the ability to repeat pictures "infinitely" on a timer, also known as time lapse photography. My only issue is the "infinitely" bit. The phone I'm using has no lock and is plugged in and set to keep the screen on while charging, but my time lapse keeps stopping randomly. I have no idea why, it'll go fine for hours then I'll check it and realize that it stopped itself. Annoying that I have to check it constantly.

This app does a lot and I'm extremely impressed. It has more features that some of the other paid camera apps. Only one thing I wish it had (or maybe it does and I can't figure it out): an option to average the entire field of view for auto exposure. I take a lot of pictures of plants and auto exposure from a small area on the screen causes all sorts of wild lighting changes that take a bit of finagling to get right.

This is a powerful, flexible upgrade from standard phone apps. It has tons of useful features that you can choose from the extensive setting menus. I especially like the easy-access short menu with settings you might want to change before each shot, like the shooting mode -- which includes not only HDR but a faster alternative, DRO, that does a really good job without merging three images. It will save both DNG (RAW) *and* JPG, so you'll later have the DNG if it's best on a particular shot.

Very versatile, if you can figure it out. I use it whenever the 'stock' camera won't do what I want. I can control focus, exposure, ISO... The results are lo-fi compared to the built-in camera. Sometimes that is what I want. Force noise, blur, depth of field that the night sight or HDR algorithm will not allow. Only a few criticisms of the app. It's complicated. I was a photographer when film üéª... So I understand it. Can't select the lens!!! Preview exposure does not match actual in the dark.

I take roughly 200 pics/day every day for work. Overall the app works great and I'm happy to replace the Samsung camera app with this one. There is, however an issue that is very irritating--I constantly have to quickly rotate the camera to force a horizontal image. The software can't seem to recognize how the phone is oriented. I've calibrated the gyro to no effect. Otherwise, the app works well where "Samsung Camera" falls short, including "mandatory permissions".

Seems to be much better than the default camera...which is shocking cuz I bought my OnePlus for it's superior camera. The only thing I would change...allowing me to save to my default gallery would be nice. This only allows you to save to Amazon pictures or Google photos. Each of which has annoying features. The gallery that came with the phone...just saves... without trying to automatically back up or throw stuff to the cloud....it just performs as needed. Otherwise... perfect!

It must be required a lot of power( or RAM) to run it then, cause it is somewhat heating up my phone ( Sony xperia XZ with 3GB of RAM). For this reason alone, it is no better than Sony's very own camera app ( they all heat up the phone when using!). The Camera show a lot of noise when using ( is that normal? Cause I can see a lot of noise before talking a photo, and that doesn't show on other camera app or even Sony's very own). Also, like some other mentioned it, it is kind of slow to save photo that being taken, and shooting a photo isn't actually easy and fast too. As it require you to gold still for considerably long Ôºà I could understand the focusing before taking a picture, but after you press the button to shoot the photo, from that moment to it save and done, it take somewhat long ‚ù≤ the whole processing‚ù≥ Ôºâ.

Doesn't work well on LG v60, some icons like the zoom in/out shows upside down despite rotating the camera, also it doesn't uses the wide angle lens as you zoom out, (probably hard to implement on certain phones), also it can't ignore the phone's "orientation?" Being that I wanted to take a picture upside down rather than turning the item in question.

Great camera app. I like that I can add watermark/text, Copyright info, Geotagging, edit naming prefix, and turn off the shutter sound. I would like to use my own gallery for viewing instead of Google photos. I would also like to change the font for the watermarking to a script. It would also be nice to have an easier way to return to 1X on zooming after altering for other photos. The slider or pinch method is currently difficult to hit the 1X mark. Still a 5 star app!!!!

Excellent Overall! what more can you ask for than a free camera app which supports unlimited photo taking functions. Program gives you full control over your photos from exposure to iso settings. Very Simple and easy to use. New auto level function was a bit distracting but has a setting to shut it off. Keep up the great work! THE BEST!!! Hands Down!!!

IMHO, pretty much the only true alternative to whatever camera app your Android phone came with. I use it to, for example, record UHD Videos at significantly higher bit rate than the camera app that came with my phone lets me. For pictures, Open Camera will let you adjust parameters such as exposure duration and many others if you want to do so. Try it!

So when it works it works well but other times it just drops the video. I was filming a 20 minute long video with my microphone plugged in and then when I was done I press the stop button and it just said "an error has occurred video will not be saved!"! So I was pretty upset so I went through all of my files trying to find yhe video and it wasn't anywhere! So then I tried again the next day and the same thing happened! So get this app if you want but be ready for disappointments!

Excellent app, especially for shooting films. Let's you select frame rate to match that of the film. Gives you a flickerless image. Lacks other features, though, and if I preset zoom and white balance, it refreshes after only a couple of minutes, making it impossible for me to set up the camera for an upcoming scene. Seems to lack a host of manual features, but otherwise works well.

A great, feature-packed app for people who want lots of flexibility and control of their photos and videos. Looking through the main settings show what you can do. But the quick menu and other on-screen buttons show all the things you can adjust quickly. I especially like being able to set the image size and aspect ratio from the main screen. The DRO image mode is a nice complement to HDR. Etc. etc. etc. Ten stars!!

Needs save to SD. I like the focus, file size and resolution customization, timer, and tap to photo settings. I wish there was a voice command to take photos option. What the app needs most of all is the option to save photos and videos to SD card. There is only an option to change the output folder name but I can't change the location. Otherwise really good app that takes better photos and video than my default app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry for the delay in replying, for saving to SD card does enabling Settings/More camera controls/"Storage Access Framework" allow you to then choose a folder on SD card? There used to be voice control, but I removed it due to concern of personal data (I used Android speechrecognizer, but this can send data online and it's not documented where).

scraped_reviews.content: Wow, this camera is amazing! I was having trouble taking videos longer than 30 minutes with my stock phone camera shutting off unexpectedly. This camera app has settings that can override that, plus a vast array of options. So impressed with the capability. A little complicated unless you understand camera language, but you can just leave everything on the default settings.

Fantastic, fully featured and customizable camera app. You can set it to basic point and shoot like any camera app, but the magic really happens when you go fully manual, allowing you to tweak iso, white balance, exposure, etc. And you can shoot in RAW (if your phone supports it)! If you're a photographer who prefers to shoot manual on your actual camera this is the camera app on your phone hands down.

OK camera, does what it says: takes pictures. Significant delay between pressing the shutter and it capturing the image means that spontaneous pictures are not possible. I'm not impressed with how one changes settings, although exposure compensation and flash are at the top. Would be more helpful to have white balance rather than a separate button for exposure lock.

It's ok. I am only using this app because my original camera got removed. The audio in videos isn't great, the settings have less options than any app I've ever used. It's hard to keep the camera in focus, it unfocuses when I take a picture and it takes 15 seconds to actually take the picture, even without a timer on. And I can't turn off the auto leveler, it ruins photos. Their website claims it's optional but you can't turn it off. I like my messenger camera more tbh

Great app! I do have 2 items on my wish list. That when I'm picture mode, when your click on the video icon it immediately starts recording. Samsung's old camera used to do that & it was lovely for spontaneous moments captured. The other item is to be able to store my photos on the SD card. If that's an option now, for the life of me I can't find the setting for that.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the suggestion for video recording. For saving to SD cards, please see https://opencamera.org.uk/help.html#faq .

scraped_reviews.content: Love the app! Large amount of settings to "dial in" what your preferences may be at the moment or basic all-round shooting. My ONLY desire....If you could only add a time lapse feature. Unless of course, it's there, and I can't find it... LOL Great job, THANKS!! BTW.... As I read them....ANY (most) negative reviews are user error!!

Fantastic app! When Samsung downgraded the default picture resolution on their mobile app without a way to set default to high-res (and without telling users), they made it difficult to use their phones effectively for work, or even for hobby photography (and created a bunch of nasty surprises for people who thought they'd captured great photos). This app is even better than the Samsung app from before their downgrade, and now I'm able once more to use my mobile for print-quality photos. Thanks!

I had an earlier version of Open Camera on a Samsung Galaxy sIII, but used it infrequently. After migrating to a newer Samsung Galaxy S9 I was disappointed to find its default camera program only recorded pictures in bloated "big" and "bigger" sizes, often wasting storage space, which is a problem when photos are backed up to the "cloud" and storage costs money. Open Camera allows shooting in sub-XGA and even sub-VGA sizes when ultra high resolution is not needed.

Wonderful app. It is almost too intelligent for me: it won't take a picture once it detects that the image will be blurry. At least, this is what I surmise. I don't mind if an image is blurry, that can be part of the interest. But as I was riding my bike, the phone stopped taking  images once I went past a certain speed. Once I stopped, it resumed. Is there a way to set it so it will take pictures even if they will be blurry? OR have I misunderstood the behavior? Thanks for a great app.

Not as good as on-board camera. The color on this app seems vibrant - I like that, but the focus is funky, and image bounces/goes in and out of focus constantly. Also, the sound isn't nearly as good as on my phone's default camera. I tried playing around with settings to fix the focus problem, but wasn't able to get it to improve. I just need something simple and ready to go, with good sound. Will be deleting this app.

I've loved this app until it updated this last time had been nothing but disappoint after another . As soon as I start the app or starts snapping photos w/o even focusing. Going to have to go another way bc it doesn't work so can't use it. I've always heard, "if it's not broken don't fix it". Was nice while it last. Also if it were me I wouldn't take to heart all the advice from Google, they definitely need to get the definition of what "static" means! Thanks

Video Recorder doesn't work! Just plays back an all gray video. Even reinstalled the app, same thing. If you want just a photo camera, it's simple and very good. I tried all types of video settings, it just wouldn't record. Mark, for such a great college football player and tv star, you can do better this, do it for the gipper, the gipper !

Just started using this, but already see that it handles macro better than the native controls on my phone. It can also be moved to sd card and will store there as well. My low end phone will now take macro photos I can use. As an edit, at least on my phone, when on sd card, storage destination has to be reset every time the phone is restarted. Still usable though annoying.

Brilliant!  I loved the photos on my new "Huawei Mate 20 Lite" phone when taken in bright daylight... but under cloudy skies or other low-light conditions, the photos are simply too dark. While the native Huawei camera app has a few "tricks" to help lighten the photo (such as activating HDR) there is no direct or easy-to-use exposure control.  "Open Camera" to the rescue! There's a little "+/-" icon on the viewfinder screen. When tapped, it opens up a simple slider-control for the exposure. It's very similar to the exposure slider my Samsung S7 had.  Just that slider control alone is well worth the price of admission (which is wonderfully free, by the way).   Great little app! Thank you Mark!

First time using camera app that did not ship with my phone. This one has lots of settings to play with and interface is easy to figure out. My S10+ has 3 cameras in the rear but haven't been able to access all of them yet. Will dig around some more. Really like this app. The Galaxy S10+ camera uses what I consider heavy handed noise reduction that cannot be disabled using the OEM camera app. Also uses too much compression of the JPEG pictures. Open Camera lets me turn off or at least modify both of these.

Completely revitalized the camera in my Z3v! I had all but given up on it before trying this. Any chance that manual focus could be added as a slider (like zoom)? I'd kind of like to be able to lock it to its closest range. Would be even better to have not only focus setting, but also a (disable-able) fine autofocus that determines what is most in focus at the given setting, then makes small adjustments to perfect it when the shutter is pulled (the macro mode is close to this).

title: Yandex Maps and Navigator
description: Yandex Maps is the ultimate app for navigating the city around you. Yandex Maps is packed with useful features that can help you get around with comfort and ease. There‚Äôs Navigator, with info on traffic jams and cameras, and voice assistant Alice. There‚Äôs searching for places by address, name, or category. There‚Äôs public transport like buses, trolleybuses, and trams moving on the map in real time. Pick any mode of transport to get to your destination. Or create a walking route if you feel like it. Navigator ‚Ä¢ Real-time traffic forecasts to get you moving and avoid traffic jams. ‚Ä¢ Voice prompts for turns, cameras, speed limits, accidents, and roadworks to help you navigate without looking at the screen. ‚Ä¢ Alice is also on board: she'll help you find a place, create a route, or call a number from your contact list. ‚Ä¢ The app recommends faster routes if the traffic conditions have changed. ‚Ä¢ To navigate offline, simply download an offline map. ‚Ä¢ You can use the app on your car screen via Android Auto. ‚Ä¢ City parking and parking fees. ‚Ä¢ Pay for gas in the app at over 8000 gas stations across Russia. Search for places and businesses ‚Ä¢ Easily search the business directory using filters and get detailed address results with entrances and driveways. ‚Ä¢ Find everything you need to know about a business: contact information, working hours, list of services, photos, visitor reviews, and rating. ‚Ä¢ Check the indoor maps of large shopping malls, train stations, and airports. ‚Ä¢ No internet? Search with an offline map. ‚Ä¢ Save cafes, shops, and other favorite spots to My places and view them on other devices. Public transport ‚Ä¢ Track buses, trams, trolleybuses, and minibuses in real time. ‚Ä¢ Choose to display only selected routes. ‚Ä¢ Get your public transport schedule for the next 30 days. ‚Ä¢ Check the expected arrival time at your stop. ‚Ä¢ Find public transport stops, metro stations, and other important facilities. ‚Ä¢ Learn in advance about congestion in metro stations. ‚Ä¢ Get information about the most convenient exits and transfers on your route. ‚Ä¢ Check if you need the first or last metro car ‚Äì a nifty feature for people traveling by metro in Moscow, Novosibirsk, or Saint Petersburg. Routes for any mode of transport ‚Ä¢ By car: Navigation that accounts for traffic conditions and camera warnings. ‚Ä¢ On foot: Voice prompts make it easier to enjoy a walk without looking at the screen. ‚Ä¢ By public transport: Track your bus or tram in real time and check expected arrival times. ‚Ä¢ By bike: Be warned about crossings and exits to motorways. ‚Ä¢ On a scooter: We'll suggest bikeways and sidewalks and help you avoid stairs where possible. Making cities more convenient ‚Ä¢ Book appointments at beauty salons online, at any time of day (or night!). ‚Ä¢ Order food from cafes and restaurants and collect it on your way home or to work. ‚Ä¢ Book electric scooters to ride around Moscow and Krasnodar. ‚Ä¢ Order a taxi directly from the app. And more ‚Ä¢ Download maps to create driving routes and search for places and addresses offline. ‚Ä¢ Never get lost in unfamiliar places with street panoramas and 3D mode. ‚Ä¢ Switch between map types (Map, Satellite, or Hybrid) depending on the situation. ‚Ä¢ Use the app in Russian, English, Turkish, Ukrainian, or Uzbek. ‚Ä¢ Find your way easily in Moscow, Saint Petersburg, Novosibirsk, Krasnoyarsk, Omsk, Ufa, Perm, Chelyabinsk, Yekaterinburg, Kazan, Rostov-on-Don, Volgograd, Krasnodar, Voronezh, Samara, and other cities. Yandex Maps is a navigation app, which doesn't have any functions related to healthcare or medicine. We're always happy to receive your feedback. Send your suggestions and comments to app-maps@support.yandex.ru. We do read them and reply!
descriptionHTML:
Yandex Maps is the ultimate app for navigating the city around you. Yandex Maps is packed with useful features that can help you get around with comfort and ease. There‚Äôs Navigator, with info on traffic jams and cameras, and voice assistant Alice. There‚Äôs searching for places by address, name, or category. There‚Äôs public transport like buses, trolleybuses, and trams moving on the map in real time. Pick any mode of transport to get to your destination. Or create a walking route if you feel like it.

Navigator
‚Ä¢ Real-time traffic forecasts to get you moving and avoid traffic jams.
‚Ä¢ Voice prompts for turns, cameras, speed limits, accidents, and roadworks to help you navigate without looking at the screen.
‚Ä¢ Alice is also on board: she'll help you find a place, create a route, or call a number from your contact list.
‚Ä¢ The app recommends faster routes if the traffic conditions have changed.
‚Ä¢ To navigate offline, simply download an offline map.
‚Ä¢ You can use the app on your car screen via Android Auto.
‚Ä¢ City parking and parking fees.
‚Ä¢ Pay for gas in the app at over 8000 gas stations across Russia.

Search for places and businesses
‚Ä¢ Easily search the business directory using filters and get detailed address results with entrances and driveways.
‚Ä¢ Find everything you need to know about a business: contact information, working hours, list of services, photos, visitor reviews, and rating.
‚Ä¢ Check the indoor maps of large shopping malls, train stations, and airports.
‚Ä¢ No internet? Search with an offline map.
‚Ä¢ Save cafes, shops, and other favorite spots to My places and view them on other devices.

Public transport
‚Ä¢ Track buses, trams, trolleybuses, and minibuses in real time.
‚Ä¢ Choose to display only selected routes.
‚Ä¢ Get your public transport schedule for the next 30 days.
‚Ä¢ Check the expected arrival time at your stop.
‚Ä¢ Find public transport stops, metro stations, and other important facilities.
‚Ä¢ Learn in advance about congestion in metro stations.
‚Ä¢ Get information about the most convenient exits and transfers on your route.
‚Ä¢ Check if you need the first or last metro car ‚Äì a nifty feature for people traveling by metro in Moscow, Novosibirsk, or Saint Petersburg.

Routes for any mode of transport
‚Ä¢ By car: Navigation that accounts for traffic conditions and camera warnings.
‚Ä¢ On foot: Voice prompts make it easier to enjoy a walk without looking at the screen.
‚Ä¢ By public transport: Track your bus or tram in real time and check expected arrival times.
‚Ä¢ By bike: Be warned about crossings and exits to motorways.
‚Ä¢ On a scooter: We'll suggest bikeways and sidewalks and help you avoid stairs where possible.

Making cities more convenient
‚Ä¢ Book appointments at beauty salons online, at any time of day (or night!).
‚Ä¢ Order food from cafes and restaurants and collect it on your way home or to work.
‚Ä¢ Book electric scooters to ride around Moscow and Krasnodar.
‚Ä¢ Order a taxi directly from the app.

And more
‚Ä¢ Download maps to create driving routes and search for places and addresses offline.
‚Ä¢ Never get lost in unfamiliar places with street panoramas and 3D mode.
‚Ä¢ Switch between map types (Map, Satellite, or Hybrid) depending on the situation.
‚Ä¢ Use the app in Russian, English, Turkish, Ukrainian, or Uzbek.
‚Ä¢ Find your way easily in Moscow, Saint Petersburg, Novosibirsk, Krasnoyarsk, Omsk, Ufa, Perm, Chelyabinsk, Yekaterinburg, Kazan, Rostov-on-Don, Volgograd, Krasnodar, Voronezh, Samara, and other cities.

Yandex Maps is a navigation app, which doesn't have any functions related to healthcare or medicine.

We're always happy to receive your feedback. Send your suggestions and comments to app-maps@support.yandex.ru. We do read them and reply!
summary: Search organizations, get directions, traffic & transport info, use maps offline
developer: Direct Cursus Computer Systems Trading LLC

scraped_reviews.content: This is probably the best navigation app to use in Uzbekistan. It‚Äôs incredibly accurate and even shows details like traffic lights, pedestrian paths, and stairs. With it, I can easily find my way, even if I‚Äôm in an unfamiliar place.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Ilova sizga yordam berayotganidan juda xursandmiz.

scraped_reviews.content: though I have offline maps downloaded, it says no internet connection. sometimes it shows the route partially and suddenly the current location will be shown in a completely different place and navigation will fail.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We recommend to turn on Bluetooth and Wi-Fi. In that case the app will more accurately determine where you are based on access points and devices nearby. Verify your internet connection's stability. Deactivate VPN, antivirus software and ad blockers. To resolve the issue of building routes without the Internet, please contact us: menu ‚Üí Contact us.

scraped_reviews.content: It used to be the best maps app for the former USSR, but as of late, they boosted "security" protocols making it impossible to log in. Completely useless now. Applies to all Yandex apps. R.I.P. Yandex. Also: shows spam ads (the only navigation app i know that does it); overloads the CPU; doesn't run well in the background.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Mark, could you please tell us in more detail what problems emerge when the app operates in the background? We aim to create advertising that is both relevant and useful, without disrupting the user experience. Show this ad on a screenshot and send it to us via Menu ‚Üí Contact us. Please also send us a screenshot showing the CPU load.

scraped_reviews.content: It just needs a "map" mode, where you can actually see street names. It's now quite tricky to figure that out, those names appear briefly with each zoom-in just to be replaced by nearby businesses names in a second. Not a most popular use case, but sometimes you just need it. Also, previously, when you searched for a street name, it highlighted the whole found street, but now it's just a point marker, and it is wildly inconvenient.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We've noted down your thought! We'll discuss it with the team and see if we can add the option to always display street names. Please send us a screenshot showing that the street is not highlighted in the search. To write to us, open the app. ‚Üí menu or profile icon üë§ ‚Üí Support.

scraped_reviews.content: Yandex Maps and Navigator is one of the most reliable navigation apps available, especially for users in Russia and nearby regions. The maps are detailed, regularly updated, and include a lot of useful local information such as traffic conditions, parking availability, and public transport routes. The navigation accuracy is impressive, and the voice guidance is clear and available in multiple languages. Real-time traffic updates help avoid congestion, and the app often suggests alternative rout
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. It's great to read this ‚ù§Ô∏è

scraped_reviews.content: The best Google analog for CIS countries in my opinion, here's why: Maps, Yandex's map has got a transport schedule, which can help you with your daily life, Go- taxi or delivery, works fine. Keep going like that!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. It's great to read this ‚ù§Ô∏è

scraped_reviews.content: Good maps with very useful virtual scoreboard. But please stop asking for geo location every time I open the app! I don't need it and you too. Also Belarusian language support would be nice.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for sharing these ideas with us ‚Äî we try to consider users‚Äô requests and ideas when working on updates.

scraped_reviews.content: I think yandex maps is better than Google maps for Belgrade, for example it has a more up to date street view images, more accurate and up to date information and I also like how you can see inside the malls in this app and interface is also decent and easy to use.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback ‚ù§Ô∏è

scraped_reviews.content: Decent maps for use in Russia, but it cannot build the route or even determine the user's location without internet connection. Meanwhile all the other apps can find your location and even to guide you through the route in case it was saved in advance.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We recommend to turn on Bluetooth and Wi-Fi. In that case the app will more accurately determine where you are based on access points and devices nearby. Verify your internet connection's stability. Deactivate VPN, antivirus software and ad blockers. To resolve the issue of building routes without the Internet, please contact us: menu ‚Üí Contact us.

scraped_reviews.content: india is not present in the offline map, so I am unable to search even for the accuracy of the current location on wifi with high-speed internet only for russia üá∑üá∫ not for all over the even not showing üáÆüá≥ in world map why telling world map and navigation worst app. are DEVLEPERS tell this is for russia üá∑üá∫ only.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Offline maps in the app are not yet available for all countries, but we are working to make them more available. Verify your internet connection's stability. Deactivate VPN, antivirus software and ad blockers. To resolve the issue of building routes without the Internet, please contact us: menu ‚Üí Contact us.

scraped_reviews.content: really enjoy navigate around but seems to miss key points when I minimise on phone no notifications on speed you travelling and speed cameras Samsung and poor GPS recognition üò¢ hopefully fix even when you are not navigate should get speed and cameras warnings as must üòâ otherwise 6 stars
scraped_reviews.replyContent: To keep the app running in the background, enable the ¬´Background Tracking¬ª feature: go to the Menu ‚â° or tap on your avatar in the top left corner of the screen ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Navigation ‚Üí Background Tracking. We recommend turning on Bluetooth and Wi-Fi. If this does not help, contact us: tap on the menu ‚Üí Support.

scraped_reviews.content: At present, there are no updates available for the UK. If the same postcode or road name is entered, Google Maps processes it within seconds. There is a necessity for enhancements in the updating of UK roads and house postcodes.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We can't promise yet that we will add the option to search by index. But we will continue to work on improvements and new features, and perhaps your idea will be implemented in the future. So that we can help with searching by road name, please specify: search query, selected scale and format ‚Äî online or offline.

scraped_reviews.content: it's WAY better than Google Maps but it needs slight polishing and tuning. for example the app opens a bit slower than Google maps which sometimes can be annoying when you need a map ASAP
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please record a video showing the app freezing and send it to us via the menu ‚Üí Support. If you are logged in, instead of the menu you will see your profile icon. This will help us resolve the issue faster.

scraped_reviews.content: Better than Google maps when you're in Moscow. It has more accurate, up-to-date information than Google maps does, you can search in either Russian or English (haven't tried other languages), and the results are the same. the directions are solid, and the interface is clean and easy to use.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Keff, thank you for your feedback. It's great to read this ‚ù§Ô∏è

scraped_reviews.content: Good app but map data needs to be improved, accurate speed data is essential. Lots of map data improvement needed for Abu Dhabi.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please specify the exact coordinates of the locations where the incorrect speed limit is displayed: press and hold the point on the map ‚Üí copy the coordinates from the top part of the card and send them to us. Also, please specify what other data on the map is incorrect.

scraped_reviews.content: this app shows fake bus arrival times, tracks buses, and shows them arriving and leaving the station when there is no bus, it a fake lies app, use Moscow transport app instead
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please let me know about the following: 1. Which route did this happen to? 2. Is the arrival time shown in the stop card? 3. If so, is it green or black?

scraped_reviews.content: Does the job but frustrating UX. Some basic things like changing workplace, that take 3 clicks on Google maps are impossible to find here. And no translation of comments in your own language. Lags behind...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thomas, to change your work address, click on the double flag icon to the right of the search bar ‚Üí 3 dots next to the ¬´Work¬ª tab ‚Üí Specify a different address ‚Üí move the pin to the desired location on the map or search for the address ‚Üí Done. Do we understand correctly that you want reviews about organizations to be translated automatically?

scraped_reviews.content: Spyware! Google the following: "Covert Web-to-App Tracking via Localhost on Android". It will also feed you up with an endless flood of useless, annoying, and distracting notifications. Turning it off in the app's settings does not help. –ë–µ—Å–∫–æ–Ω–µ—á–Ω—ã–π, –±–µ—Å–ø–æ–ª–µ–∑–Ω—ã–π –∏ –æ—Ç–≤–ª–µ–∫–∞—é—â–∏–π –ø–æ—Ç–æ–∫ —Å–ø–∞–º–∞ –≤ —É–≤–µ–¥–æ–º–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è—Ö. –û—Ç–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ —ç—Ç–æ–≥–æ –º—É—Å–æ—Ä–∞ –≤ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞—Ö —Å–∞–º–æ–≥–æ –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è –Ω–µ –ø–æ–º–æ–≥–∞–µ—Ç.

This app is really great. I would give it a score of 90 out of 100. In my opinion, among all the map apps I‚Äôve used, this one is the best. Sometimes, there are minor issues‚Äîfor example, if you take a wrong turn, it occasionally struggles to redirect properly to the original route. That‚Äôs why I deducted 10 points. But I believe this issue might be resolved in future updates. Still, overall, the app is excellent. A big thank you to the developer for creating such a useful map app!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Routes may not be configured due to problems with geolocation. We recommend that you turn on Bluetooth and Wi-Fi. Also check the stability of the Internet, disable VPNs, antiviruses and ad blockers. If this does not help, contact us: click on the menu or profile picture ‚Üí "Contact us".

scraped_reviews.content: stop working about month ago. Map looks like mesh. That's all. No buildings/ any names/ roads.. nothing. Updates didn't fixed that. upd: yes, search and route making works as usual.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We see that some users are experiencing issues with maps not displaying. We understand that this may cause inconvenience, and we apologize. Our team is already investigating how to fix this.

scraped_reviews.content: I love the design and idea, but for me, Europe is not detailed enough and you also have very little locations to download. If that would somehow be upgraded in the future, it would easily beat Google Maps.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please send us a screenshot showing the lack of details. To contact us, open the application ‚Üí menu or profile icon üë§ ‚Üí Contact us. This way we can quickly understand what the problem is. Also, can you please let us know which countries' offline maps are missing from the app?

scraped_reviews.content: I don't know how to live without this app. Maybe not perfect, but very sufficient for daily use
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Could you please tell us what we need to improve in the application? Feedback from you will help us.

scraped_reviews.content: interface is better than Google maps and it works in Pakistan as well.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the excellent rate of our app!

scraped_reviews.content: good service but short cut road not showing same same feature update some Google map
scraped_reviews.replyContent: To help us resolve the issue more quickly, please specify the starting and ending points of the route. Could you please tell us what data we need to update: map or satellite images?

scraped_reviews.content: Not knowing the borders between countries is bad for navigation. Ads don't really help to navigate as well.
Nice navigation reLly like it, would be great if @support could add Great Britain / United Kingdom / England Maps to download, then would be perfect
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the excellent rate of our app! Not all the countries are available for download in our app yet. We are working on getting more of them, but I cannot promise anything right now.

scraped_reviews.content: The app is overall quite good. But couple months ago the search bar has been moved from the top to the bottom. Nearly 30% of the convenient usage space (lower half of the screen) is unusable. I don't want to move my finger that high just to navigate the map. And if I need to search for something, which isn't something I do all the time, I can move my finger up to a less convenient place for the search box. 2 stars until search box is back on top
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We have placed the search bar at the bottom of the screen: according to our observations, it is more convenient to reach it with your thumb when you hold the phone in your hand. We will not ignore your request and will try to make the application even better in future updates.

scraped_reviews.content: Each time the app was updated all these years, I had to re-enable the option 'Routes in Navigator', because it was disabled by the update. It was really disgusting. The latest update just removed the switch, so now you have to create routes in Navi from the scratch. Well, at least the Maps team no longer pretends to be cooperating with Navi. But come on guys, you can't beat the Yandex Navi UI/UX no matter how you try. Just make a good map, leave navigation to the Navi team!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We stopped using the "Routes in Navigator" setting indeed. All the main features of car navigation are now available in Yandex Maps. Please tell us what features of the Navigator do you lack in Yandex Maps? We will try to take your comments into account in our work.

scraped_reviews.content: Bugs and annoying ads Well on my phone all icons of me, places and app's layouts like road traffic are crashing and turn into pixel mess.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We try to make ads relevant and useful. They should fit organically into the application and not interfere with users. Please show this ad on a screenshot and send it to us via Menu ‚Üí Contact us. Also please send us a video of the pixel situation in your email. This will help us figure it out.

scraped_reviews.content: Most roads are blank. On the plus side it shows more businesses on the map (if zoomed in enough) compared to other apps I tried. But who would use a mostly empty map with barely any road names? It's amazing to see something half finished like this. Other apps have every little tiny side road labeled.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please provide exact coordinates. To do this, press and hold the point on the map to open the context menu. Select ¬´What‚Äôs here¬ª ‚Äî the coordinates will show up at the bottom of the object card that opens. Copy them and send to us.

scraped_reviews.content: trash üóë It doesn't work properly I mean I have a good Internet connection still the program responds late I'm walking and sometimes,the arrow that shows where I'm going just turns around and goes backwards after a while it becomes normal and another problem is that when you're going somewhere if it's long distance after 200 or 300 metres the arrow that shows where are you going will reach you
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We recommend enabling Bluetooth and Wi-Fi ‚Äî the app will use them to more accurately determine your location based on access points and nearby devices. Update the app to the latest version, check the Internet stability, disable VPN, antiviruses and ad blockers. If this does not help, please let us know: tap the menu or profile avatar ‚Üí Contact us.

scraped_reviews.content: I used this app to search restaurant and shopping areas near where I stayed..and it's really helpful ..I easily make account on this then verify my number and email here and experience was nice ‚ò∫Ô∏è.I also used it when I want to search anyplace and tho I didn't want to go ..but just to see how much far is the route üòÖüòÖüòÖ..
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. It's great to read this ‚ù§Ô∏è

scraped_reviews.content: I really like this app: more places in Russia, especially numbering of entrances and direction from which side of building. Also I like that I can manage bookmarks(groups, visibility, logo), but this is function everywhere. Recently I found that I can order taxi and manage without installing Y.Go. I immediately used it (you just can pay with cash, no card...though using map with the same account). Oh, I like see moving public transport and be in time. I live in Ulyanovsk. And it's good for me
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Glad to hear that ‚ù§Ô∏è Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: It was working okay (so gave it 3) but recently started to show my location completely wrong. Moreover, it made me take wrong buses which made me completely lost and wasted much time. - Upd 1 for Yandex: I am in St. Petersburg. When I faced this proplem, I dowoaded 2GIS and it worked fine. The problem is not permanent, meaning, it sometimes show me completely wrong info, and other times, everything is working good.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Try changing the time settings on your device: go to your phone or tablet settings ‚Üí Date and time ‚Üí Use network time. If this does not help, disable Google geolocation: Settings ‚Üí Location ‚Üí Advanced ‚Üí Google Geolocation.

scraped_reviews.content: It's a great app. It has one bug though, a very annoying bug. If you choose a route to a certain place it doesn't always show all the options possible. It doesn't count metro at all sometimes. I had only one minibus going to a certain location near a bus stop, but when I look for the actual bus stop it shows many more. Also, if you choose a route it shows the time when buses and minibuses arrive. But if you miss that time it's not going to update on itself. Overall it's still great
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the feedback! Please email us at app-maps@support.yandex.ru between which points you wanted to make a route. We'll try to help you.

scraped_reviews.content: This is probably the best navigation app I've ever used to navigate in big cities like Moscow and St-Petersburg. It rocks as long as you stay within it's map coverage. Tip: Sometimes offline map may become unavailable for certain areas. Maybe the reason is overlapping maps like "Moscow oblast" and "Podolsk". Avoid such overlap when possible. Edit: Tried to reproduce the bug, but the map loads perfectly fine right now. Definitely would recommend the app!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Alexander, thank you for your feedback. It's great to read this ‚ù§Ô∏è

scraped_reviews.content: It's been a great app for quite a while. But now it's going downhill. Non-stop ads even with paid subscription - ‚úîÔ∏è, gamification - ‚úîÔ∏è, bloated UI - ‚úîÔ∏è. Hint for the product team: main bookmarks like home / office should always be visible for navigation view, for now it's unpredictable - today they are there, tomorrow - gone. Searching should always prioritize user's bookmarks. Searching bookmarks should be available in offline mode.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Andrey, thank you for sharing this idea with us. The Yandex Plus subscription does not influence the display of ads, but we make sure that ads do not distract from driving and are useful. Also, please explain in more detail what exactly you did not like about the interface. We will consider your feedback and think about possible improvements.

scraped_reviews.content: Whenever I try to get directions the app will immediately start to freeze. how can't it do its most basic function? the only reason to use this over Google maps is if Yandex has a monopoly over a city's transit data like Almaty. I've also noticed that every restaurant is maybe 1 star higher than it should be. I can't tell you how many "4.9 star" restaurants with thousands of reviews there are on this app when on Google maps they're like 3.4. Really odd.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Rating is not the arithmetic mean of all ratings. The rating is influenced by the weight that our algorithm assigns to each score. It is based on two factors: Reliability. If the user has previously rated organizations, the weight of his rating is higher than that of others. Influence. Algorithms check how a person has evaluated companies before.

scraped_reviews.content: Not user friendly. It often doesn't recognize the addresses I'm putting in and it doesn't allow me to look at the whole route at once. It has public transit and walking options, which is nice, but it's impossible for me to say how well they work, because I can't navigate the app. EDIT 3: Took 3 tries to get you guys to read my review before responding, but unfortunately, that was too late, as I deleted your app after the first nonsensical reply.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please specify the search query, selected scale and format (online or offline). Also inform what type of search you use: voice, text or with categories?

scraped_reviews.content: The maps don't work actually. Wherever I travel in simferopol, my current location always reverts back somewhat closer to simferopol airport which is almost 15 km away from where I live. Tried all off the possible methods to correct this - turned on and off airplane mode, gave all permissions, restarted my device. It works the same even when using the browser version.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please go to ¬´Date and Time¬ª menu in the system settings and enable ¬´Use network time¬ª option. If the geolocation accuracy doesn't improve, try disabling ¬´Google Geolocation¬ª option. Write to us via ¬´Feedback¬ª menu if this method doesn't work. We'll figure it out.

scraped_reviews.content: Yandex Maps and Navigator is a game-changer! The app's accuracy and real-time updates have made navigating through unfamiliar cities a breeze. The interface is user-friendly, and the traffic predictions are spot on. One of the best alternatives to Google Maps, especially for those traveling in Russia and Eastern Europe. Keep up the great work, Yandex
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. It's great to read this ‚ù§Ô∏è

scraped_reviews.content: uninstalling right after install. i was originally excited about an alternative to google that does not share my info with any 3rd parties. but then, the 1st thing you have to do in order to open the app is agree to privacy terms that clearly say "your data will be used to providing the service as well as promotional and development purposes", whatever that means. might mean 3rd party, according to that loophole, but seems very misleading. shouldn't have to agree to privacy terms for maps!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: The main issues of data processing in the services are regulated by the Privacy Policy, which can be found in the Menu ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí About the app. You can read about the data transfer procedure in section 7. The transfer of data to third parties can be carried out with your consent only.

scraped_reviews.content: I wish on two things from this app: 1) I want to know when im over speed limit, and NOT when there is a speed camera. I dont care about locations of speed cameras and the voice notification for them is very very annoying. 2) If i get directions to a location and choose public transport but then decide to take carsharing and go back, the app is reset and location is lost, not even in history i can find it. Altough i just wamt to go back to the moment i choose, searched or selected the location.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: In the app, you can choose which cameras will be voiced. To do this, go to the menu ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Sounds and alerts ‚Üí Cameras. Also, do we understand correctly that you want the app to return to the point after creating a route to a point and exiting the route menu, and not to the main screen?

scraped_reviews.content: it is not showing all the buses schedule
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please specify what color the arrival time was displayed in the stop card: green or black?

scraped_reviews.content: Very pleased with app. Big plus is showing house numbers on map. Why 4 instead 5 stars: using this navi in town, main streets is marked with light yellow color. If in street in front of me there's some cars, guided line is turning light yellow. It's hard to see guided line. I like using colors for traffic status, but not pleased with mentioned combination of colors. Thanks for good aplication.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback on the design of our maps and for the good rating! We will try to take it into account in our work, but at the moment we cannot promise anything specific. Email us if you have any more questions or suggestions ‚Äî this will help make the Yandex.Maps app nicer and more convenient.

scraped_reviews.content: Missing 90% of the roads in my hometown. It's rather useless when it only shows the highway through town, and none of the connecting streets. The contact option in-app crashes the app when clicked. So, look up Shepparton, Victoria, Australia to see an example of a city with 90% of it's roads missing. Almost all the towns and cities in Australia have a huge majority of roads missing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Daniel, please write us more about the situation at app-maps@support.yandex.ru specifying: 1. The steps you do before the app crashes; 2. The model of your device; 3. The version of your device's operating system; 4. The version of the Yandex Maps app; 5. Also show the missing roads on a screenshot. We will do our best to deal with the matter.

scraped_reviews.content: The great map app. I use it each time I need to look at vast Russian territory.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Yury, thank you for the excellent rate of our app!

scraped_reviews.content: It was the best. Not anymore. Now their unsolicited ads close left-turn part of the map, and also closing music control. Worst of all they show it fir paid users who pay the subscription monthly. Awful. Gonna switch to something else. And will never use what they show in ads. Because these companies mess up with my navigation.

The navigation is great on a mobile phone, but it's not good for Android Auto. The problem is the viewing angle on the car screen itself and the image is too zoomed in, for example the speed display is half invisible. Google Maps has a much better viewing angle and I can see much further ahead of me. If there is a traffic jam I want to see it on the screen, this way I have to keep scrolling which you will agree is dangerous while driving.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Could you please tell us if you would like the camera to zoom out further when guiding along a route?

scraped_reviews.content: False current allowed speed, unable to determine forbidden road, just uninstall after 1 navigation path, cost me 15 min, then finally use google maps to direct me to the destination. Response 1: Yes, of course, the GPS was acitvated.The speed limit was wrong though out the Journey, showing 100 continously when it was clearly 50. Happens on almost all occasions. After 15 min of taking wrong turns, have to switch to Google Maps. Last but not the least, the navigation was taking me to One-Way road
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please check if your GPS is turned on? Give the app access to the location: hold down the app icon ‚Üí "About the app". In the menu, find "Permissions" and give access to your location. Please describe the situation with the prohibited road in more detail so that we can sort it out.

title: Epic: Kids' Books & Reading
description:
Epic is the world‚Äôs largest digital library for kids! Our fun, kid-safe, interactive reading app fuels curiosity and reading confidence by letting kids freely explore their interests with instant access to 40,000+ books, audiobooks, learning videos and more.

Anytime, anywhere: Access our library from any Apple device. You can even download books to read offline! 

Books that read to them: In addition to our library of more traditional ebooks, we have a huge collection of Read-To-Me books and audiobooks. Featuring talented voice actors, fun music and exciting sound effects that bring stories to life!

Multilingual: The majority of books on Epic are in English, but we also have Spanish-, French- and Chinese-language books to engage readers of different backgrounds and interests.

Fun rewards and learning tools: Reading Buddies, badges and quizzes keep them motivated to read and learn. Spotlight Words and audio-enabled Dictionary Lookup teach vocabulary and pronunciation. 
 

FOR FAMILIES: EPIC FAMILY 
A paid subscription beginning with a 7-day free trial. Cancel anytime. 


Up to 4 child profiles, so each kid can enjoy a personalized reading experience.
Parent dashboard lets you see what they‚Äôre reading and follow along with their progress. 
95% of Epic parents say Epic helped improve their child‚Äôs reading skills.


FOR EDUCATORS: EPIC SCHOOL 
Epic School is free for educators and students to use during the school day.   

ELA Tools: Filter titles by AR, DRA, F&P, grade level and more. 
Quizzes, Dictionary Lookup and Spotlight Words help build skills.
Help with Daily 20: Teachers can easily assign and share books, then track daily and weekly reading. 
Multilingual books and fun reading formats make reading accessible for every student. 
9 out of 10 Epic Educators would recommend us to colleagues. 
Coming soon! Epic School Plus, a district-funded premium offering that gives educators and students 24/7 access to the full Epic library. 


PRESS AND EXPERT REVIEWS
Epic has been featured on The TODAY Show, CNET and Refinery 29, as well as in The Wall Street Journal, Parents Magazine, USA Today, Forbes, Parenting.com and more.

‚ÄúEpic strikes the perfect balance between educational and fun, and should allow parents to feel more confident about introducing the iPad into their children‚Äôs daily lives as a tool.‚Äù  ‚ÄìTechCrunch

"Get access to thousands of books on all subject matters" ‚ÄìParenting.com

"Epic is incredibly valuable because it gives students exposure to books that they wouldn't get from a library or our classroom." ‚ÄìCindy, Epic Educator Ambassador

Privacy Policy
getepic.com/privacy

Terms of Service
getepic.com/tos

summary: Learn with read-to-me books, ebooks, stories & videos for grade school children

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using Epic! with my now 4 year old for over a year. It's awesome. There are a plethora of great books. They miss many of my absolute favorites, but the ones they have are very good and we've found new favorites. And tons of audiobooks! Those are fantastic to have. However, finding all the books in a reading level is impossible, and I very much wish that was MUCH easier. I create lists myself and have found workarounds, but it's annoying and I wish we could search by reading level only.

Books are consistently blank. The read to me books will repeat words when moving to the next page. There doesn't seem to be a standard for when eggs are earned. It'll say to read 20 more minutes then say to read 20 more after we do. It's nice to have a safe place for kids to find reading material, but for something we pay for, I feel it's lacking in delivery.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Apologize for the inconvenience caused. We're more than happy to assist. Have you reached out to our customer support team already, if yes, can you please share the ticket ID here and we'll take a look, if not, can you please email us at support@getepic.com for further assistance?

scraped_reviews.content: I wish this app would work for us, I installed it for my kids 3 year old and 5 year old. Both are learning to read, and could not read on their own yet. The problem is, this app shows all sorts of books, and doesn't label the books according to their appropriate age category. I don't see any option for filtering the books according to age, level of difficulty, or level of reading proficiency. So finding an appropriate book to read for my preschooler is a hit and miss. Also, the read to me option is not interactive at all, its like watching a video, not a reading experience. I want my kids to be able to read along, ie they should be able to follow the reader verbatim, and then flip the page at their own pace. I guess this app is not so suitable for early readers (pre-K or grade K).
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for providing your feedback. We care a lot about our product and we are always looking for ways to improve it! We appreciate you taking the time to let us know what you‚Äôre looking for ‚Äî most of the improvements we make come from ideas and suggestions like yours, so thank you for reaching out!

scraped_reviews.content: Awesome! Especially if you check on your kids all the time. If you spend time working with Epic, than it will be perfect for your kids and you. You will get over 40,000 books including videos and audiobooks, customized books and reading level, and your kids get to read all the time. It is also used at my kids school, and it works out perefect for them. And all for a cheap price -IF you subscribe to Epic.

I got the app because of good reviews and my child loves reading. I got the app and signed up,but it blocks my way with an add for unlimited and there is no way to exit out of it. At the bottom it has a sign in and each time I sign it it sends me straight back to this add and it keeps looping and I can't get out. So much for a "free" app. It seems like either I have to pay the unlimited fee or delete the app. I'd rather know outright it isn't free than to go through the trouble.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Oh no! We sincerely apologize for the issue. We'd be happy to take a look into this for you, please contact us at support@getepic.com. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: WARNING: Don't pay for a subscription until they fix their technical issues. I've been having the same issue other users have been having; you get charged for the subscription but it doesn't work. Luckily, I was able to get a refund both times that I tried. Uninstalling and reinstalling the app doesn't help. It looks like this has been going on for 2 months or so, based on other reviews. No response from customer service. My kids are bummed!

This app is great! Only thing is it doesn't have certain books but other than that it's great! One other miner note, please add mmore read to me and audiobooks. That would be awesome. I have been discovering all sorts of new characters I like in this app. I also tried Farfaria which has some of the same characters and books. It doesn't have as many books as Epic does. Update! Now there isn't any read to me books or videos on Epic so I have had to unsubscribe and switch to a different program. Ca

I'd like to just legitimately try the app before giving you my payment information and having to cancel after 7 days if we don't like it. My kids use the program at school and like it. The interface looks slick, but I can't get past the endless cycle of sign up, "start your free trial", sign in, click a profile, then back to "start your free trial". Rinse, repeat. You literally cannot see any content before you sign up for a subscription. If the app is so great, give me a true 7 day free trial.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, I will be more than happy to assist. Please email us at support@getepic.com for assistance.

scraped_reviews.content: Not bad. I got this so that when I'm away for work I can call home, read my daughter a story and share my screen on the video call for her to follow along with the illustrations. Definitely like that you can save favourites. There seems to be some sync issues with the web/browser and the app though. Favourites added on the web page are not showing up in the app. Quite annoying especially if you have a toddler that wants to hear her favorite books again....and again....an again. Lol.

The best feature of this app by far is the appearance of the digital books, as compared with books on Amazon Freetime, which download slowly, and are hard to read until you double click the paragraphs, which is difficult to get right with a child, etc. Even the digital books on Libby are sometimes frustrating to read. Every book, audiobook, read-to-me books, and videos play seamlessly. The selection is excellent including books in Spanish! I also love that it's free to educators.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback! We are delighted to hear you are enjoying Epic!. :)

scraped_reviews.content: This is the app that helped my daughter to learn how to read, she loves it! She reads everyday from the largest variety of books it has. We discover the app when she was in 2nd grade and we'll keep it for many years. It also has books in Spanish which is a plus!! Every time you connect it shows you books according to your reading level, and it allows you to save books to read later when you're offline. It also allow you to connect your account with epic school and track her performance.

This app is great! I like the variety of books available, though I hope the library continues to expand. The user interface is easy to navigate and I love being able to download for offline reading. Two things I'd like to see added are a repeat button so the littlest readers can easily replay the same book again and again. Add the ability to download the book from the non grid style list along with the available options, collection and/or favorite.

Wish they would warn you that you must pay a fee to get this app before you input all your personal information. BEWARE do NOT input your info unless you want to pay a monthly fee. I would had not mind paying for the membership but I don't like it when apps like this pull this kind of stuff to get your email to start sending you junk mail even though you decide not to go forward with the app. Now they sending unwanted junk mail. Ugh so annoying!!!

I really like this app. BUT.... the only thing I dont like is that you cant use it after school hours unless you are paying for it. And when the child is reading and gets stuck on a word , you sometimes can click on the word and it will help the child by saying it and the noun if the word. But is not all words. For example the word nervous my daughter couldn't read it so she clicked on it and it was empty. No definition it dint help her with what it say and other easier words too. please fix.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for providing your feedback. We care a lot about our product and we are always looking for ways to improve it! We appreciate you taking the time to let us know what you‚Äôre looking for ‚Äî most of the improvements we make come from ideas and suggestions like yours, so thank you for reaching out!

scraped_reviews.content: Love it!! I am a mother and all 4 of my kids use it. It's awesome that some of 4he hooks are read to you and the words are highlighted. It helps so much with my little ones and it has other books that you can read on your own. My kids use it when we are in the car and they just go from book to book. The app is easy to use for any kid and it's just a great amount of book options for many age groups.

It's so good, and guess what? NO ADS 0 ads like I can read 500 books and not 1 ad will come up literally like we have wanted this and know we have it only 1 thing, tho when you hold a word for some time, it will pop up the definition of that word BUT WHEN YOU TAP ON IT,IT WON'T SHOW YOU THE DEFINITION but other than that it's a great app OH and did I forget to mention that it has various videos like how to build an stuff like that but yeah it's a great app you should definitely download it.

It's such a cute app!! It has so so so many different books to choose from there is even books where they read to you, audiobooks, read by yourself!! You can even read in a different language!! It's such a great way to read quickly!! If your stuck on a word and it's meaning click on the word and it has the definition!! It also has cute pets and badges for you when you read! I definitely reccomend the app (costs a bit of money)

It's a great app, however I have renewed my account back in September and it was giving my daughter a prompt saying to upgrade for more reading. I can't understand why it's asking me to upgrade to the yearly subscription when I have already did. On that note, I have submitted 3 helpdesk requests for billing and subscription and I haven't heard or received any feedback from them.

When it works, it works well but offline books need review. I downloaded this app because you were able to download books and read them offline. this would have been perfect for my 12 hour flight with my 3 year old son, except that when I reopened the app on the plane, all the books I had downloaded were wiped out.. I've downloaded books on 3 separate occasions and each time they disappear after a period of time. no idea why. If they could fix this then it would be a great app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Apologize for the inconvenience caused. Have you reached out to our customer support team already, if yes, please share the ticket ID here, and we'll take a look, if not, could you please email us at support@getepic.com, and our customer support team will assist you further?

scraped_reviews.content: This was used for students where I used to work and they enjoyed it. I wanted to see if the family version would appeal to my son, but I can't look it over without the seven day "free" trial, and to start the trial I HAVE to turn on automatic paid subscription renewal. I've had so much trouble in the past with turning off automatic renewal, after trialling a service I quickly decided I didn't want, that I am deeply reluctant to do it again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Thanks for writing to Epic! Please note that Epic is free for Educators only. For Family use, you need to sign up for a monthly/yearly plan to access the books (which includes a free trial where you can cancel the subscription if not interested). Feel free to email us at support@getepic.com to sign up for a discount plan.

scraped_reviews.content: Has some very nice content but it's very expensive with a monthly sub double the cost of an Amazon Prime or Apple TV+ subscription in my country. And for such a premium, the app really shouldn't be the buggy mess that it is. To pick one example, literally none of the profile options in the patent dashboard work so I need to look up my kid's reading activity on a laptop.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi,
Sorry for the inconvenience caused. Please note that you can still access the profile history from the Epic app, Parent Dashboard -> Profiles -> Go to specific profile, Profile Options -> View Activity. For further assistance on the reading activity & for a discount plan, please feel free to email us at support@getepic.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Daughter loves the content. However, the app is beyond useless. Downloaded contents will still use data unless you switch to offline mode from the start.
