title: ProShot
description: NEW: Try ProShot Evaluator first to see which features your device supports https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.riseupgames.proshotevaluator "The screen layouts are excellent. DSLRs could learn a thing or two from the design of ProShot" -Engadget "If you can name it, chances are ProShot has it" -Gizmodo Welcome to ProShot, your complete photography and film making solution on Android. Whether you are a seasoned professional or just getting started, ProShot has something for you. Its expansive feature set and unique interface unlock unlimited possibilities, ensuring you‚Äôll never miss that perfect shot. Manual Controls ProShot unleashes the full power of the camera2 API to offer a range of manual, semi-manual and automatic controls, just like a DSLR. Take full advantage in Manual mode, keep ISO in check in Program mode, or leave it all on Auto and simply enjoy the moment. Endless Features With its wide range of options, ProShot adjusts to your changing world. Fly through camera settings with its unique Dual Dial system. Record video from any mode with the press of a button. Play with light in unique Light Painting modes. Capture the stars with Bulb mode. And adjust camera output with options for Noise Reduction, Tone Mapping, Sharpness and much more. Privacy Built-In In a world where everyone wants to harvest your data, ProShot doesn‚Äôt, because that‚Äôs the way it should be. No personal data is stored, collected or transmitted, so you can rest assured that your images, videos and data are safe. There is so much more to ProShot. Below is a list of many of the features waiting for you. ProShot is under constant development, so great new things are always just on the horizon! ‚Ä¢ Auto, Program, Manual, and two Custom modes, just like a DSLR ‚Ä¢ Shutter priority, ISO priority, Automatic, and Full Manual control ‚Ä¢ Adjust exposure, flash, focus, ISO, shutter speed, white balance and more ‚Ä¢ Shoot in RAW (DNG), JPEG or RAW+JPEG ‚Ä¢ HEIC support on compatible devices ‚Ä¢ Support for Vendor Extensions including Bokeh, HDR and more ‚Ä¢ Light Painting with special modes for capturing water and star trails ‚Ä¢ Bulb mode integrated into Light Painting ‚Ä¢ Timelapse (intervalometer and video), with full camera control ‚Ä¢ 4:3, 16:9, and 1:1 standard aspect ratio for photo ‚Ä¢ Custom aspect ratios (21:9, 5:4, anything is possible) ‚Ä¢ Zero-lag bracket exposure up to ¬±3 ‚Ä¢ Manual focus assist and focus peaking with customizable color ‚Ä¢ Histogram with 3 modes ‚Ä¢ Zoom up to 10X using just one finger ‚Ä¢ Customizable accent color to fit your style ‚Ä¢ Camera roll seamlessly integrated into the viewfinder ‚Ä¢ Adjust JPEG quality, Noise Reduction quality, and storage location ‚Ä¢ Shortcuts for GPS, screen brightness, camera shutter, and more ‚Ä¢ Customization panel to truly make ProShot your own. Customize startup mode, remap volume buttons, set filename format, and much more Video Features ‚Ä¢ All camera controls available in Photo mode are also available in Video mode ‚Ä¢ Up to 8K video with extreme bitrate options ‚Ä¢ Support for ‚Äúbeyond 4K‚Äù on compatible devices ‚Ä¢ Adjustable frame rate from 24 FPS up to 240 FPS ‚Ä¢ LOG and FLAT color profiles for increased dynamic range ‚Ä¢ Support for H.264 and H.265 ‚Ä¢ Up to 4K Timelapse ‚Ä¢ Industry-standard options for 180 degree rule ‚Ä¢ Support for external microphones ‚Ä¢ Monitor audio levels and video file size in real-time ‚Ä¢ Pause / resume recording ‚Ä¢ Support for simultaneous audio playback (like Spotify) while recording ‚Ä¢ Video light Time to leave the heavy DSLR at home, ProShot's got your back.
descriptionHTML:
NEW: Try ProShot Evaluator first to see which features your device supports
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.riseupgames.proshotevaluator

"The screen layouts are excellent. DSLRs could learn a thing or two from the design of ProShot"
-Engadget

"If you can name it, chances are ProShot has it"
-Gizmodo

Welcome to ProShot, your complete photography and film making solution on Android.

Whether you are a seasoned professional or just getting started, ProShot has something for you. Its expansive feature set and unique interface unlock unlimited possibilities, ensuring you‚Äôll never miss that perfect shot.

Manual Controls
ProShot unleashes the full power of the camera2 API to offer a range of manual, semi-manual and automatic controls, just like a DSLR. Take full advantage in Manual mode, keep ISO in check in Program mode, or leave it all on Auto and simply enjoy the moment.

Endless Features
With its wide range of options, ProShot adjusts to your changing world. Fly through camera settings with its unique Dual Dial system. Record video from any mode with the press of a button. Play with light in unique Light Painting modes. Capture the stars with Bulb mode. And adjust camera output with options for Noise Reduction, Tone Mapping, Sharpness and much more.

Privacy Built-In
In a world where everyone wants to harvest your data, ProShot doesn‚Äôt, because that‚Äôs the way it should be. No personal data is stored, collected or transmitted, so you can rest assured that your images, videos and data are safe.

There is so much more to ProShot. Below is a list of many of the features waiting for you. ProShot is under constant development, so great new things are always just on the horizon!

‚Ä¢ Auto, Program, Manual, and two Custom modes, just like a DSLR
‚Ä¢ Shutter priority, ISO priority, Automatic, and Full Manual control
‚Ä¢ Adjust exposure, flash, focus, ISO, shutter speed, white balance and more
‚Ä¢ Shoot in RAW (DNG), JPEG or RAW+JPEG
‚Ä¢ HEIC support on compatible devices
‚Ä¢ Support for Vendor Extensions including Bokeh, HDR and more
‚Ä¢ Light Painting with special modes for capturing water and star trails
‚Ä¢ Bulb mode integrated into Light Painting
‚Ä¢ Timelapse (intervalometer and video), with full camera control
‚Ä¢ 4:3, 16:9, and 1:1 standard aspect ratio for photo
‚Ä¢ Custom aspect ratios (21:9, 5:4, anything is possible)
‚Ä¢ Zero-lag bracket exposure up to ¬±3
‚Ä¢ Manual focus assist and focus peaking with customizable color
‚Ä¢ Histogram with 3 modes
‚Ä¢ Zoom up to 10X using just one finger
‚Ä¢ Customizable accent color to fit your style
‚Ä¢ Camera roll seamlessly integrated into the viewfinder
‚Ä¢ Adjust JPEG quality, Noise Reduction quality, and storage location
‚Ä¢ Shortcuts for GPS, screen brightness, camera shutter, and more
‚Ä¢ Customization panel to truly make ProShot your own. Customize startup mode, remap volume buttons, set filename format, and much more

Video Features
‚Ä¢ All camera controls available in Photo mode are also available in Video mode
‚Ä¢ Up to 8K video with extreme bitrate options
‚Ä¢ Support for ‚Äúbeyond 4K‚Äù on compatible devices
‚Ä¢ Adjustable frame rate from 24 FPS up to 240 FPS
‚Ä¢ LOG and FLAT color profiles for increased dynamic range
‚Ä¢ Support for H.264 and H.265
‚Ä¢ Up to 4K Timelapse
‚Ä¢ Industry-standard options for 180 degree rule
‚Ä¢ Support for external microphones
‚Ä¢ Monitor audio levels and video file size in real-time
‚Ä¢ Pause / resume recording
‚Ä¢ Support for simultaneous audio playback (like Spotify) while recording
‚Ä¢ Video light

Time to leave the heavy DSLR at home, ProShot's got your back.
summary: Welcome to ProShot, the most powerful camera app on Android.

scraped_reviews.content: I think this is an excellent app with great potential! With my limited time of use so far, on Pixel 7 pro, I noticed that the image was not saved correctly. It seems like the saved image is in preview quality, but the file size is large (normal). When you zoom in, no details. There must be something wrong with saving. Updates: the issue mentioned earlier I believe was due to the app used the ultra wide camera for other focal lengths by using digital zoom (without actually switching the camera)
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello,

For RAW photos, ProShot only displays them in the camera roll as low res thumbnails because decoding RAW files takes a lot of time. If you are having issues with image capture however, please send me an email, I'd be glad to take a look! support@riseupgames.com

scraped_reviews.content: I'm experiencing a problem with my Z Fold 5 using this photo app. When I open the camera, the screen displays a lot of wavy pixels, making it difficult to take photos. Strangely, the images turn out perfect once they are clicked and saved. I'm puzzled as to why the camera's screen display isn't clear, even though the final images are fine. Initially, I suspected there might be an issue with my phone, but I tried a different camera app and the screen appeared just fine.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, I am sorry to hear about the error. Is it still happening in the latest version of ProShot? If so, please send me a brief screen recording of the error and I'd be glad to look into it! support@riseupgames.com

scraped_reviews.content: The app does as it says and the UI is pretty good, although sometimes confusing. Main reason for 3 stars is that zooming has turned out to be extremely frustrating. I'm not sure why but pinching with one hand to zoom in and out it will simply not work, and even if I use both hands, it's hit and miss. I don't have these issues with the core Pixel Cam app. I purchased this trying to get a better option; in some ways it is, but the frustration I feel every time I use it isn't worth the price
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for your feedback! To make zoom operation easier, ProShot lets you zoom with just one finger :) Please give it a shot, and if you're still having trouble, send me and email and I'd be glad to help: support@riseupgames.com

scraped_reviews.content: Definitely not an expert at photography, but I can say that this is a good alternative to expensive cameras! Although, I would suggest adding some sort of guide feature to the app for those like me who sometimes forget certain aspects of things. (EDIT: Now that I know about the guide actually in the app, I'll definitely be sure to use it!)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for your review! You can access several guides including a user manual and a video tutorial by opening the settings panel and tapping the "three dots" button :)

scraped_reviews.content: Pretty decent. When it works... Bought this for my pixel 5a so could have control of my shutter speed. Which, it does - along with a bunch of other cool features. But unfortunately as I'm using it, the app will become slow and unstable to the point where eventually just becomes unresponsive and locks on a black screen. It also will have trouble switching between the 1x and .6x lenses. And annoyingly will often not retain user settings if the phone locks...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, I very am sorry to hear about the issues. A blank screen may happen on some Pixels if you use manual white balance, which Google has not fixed on their phones for several years. To retain camera settings, please set the Resume Settings button to "On". If you run into any other issues, please send me an email anytime! support@riseupgames.com

scraped_reviews.content: This app is odd. I used it a few months ago on a LG k30 ( basic mid tier Android ) and it worked great, however now I am using the LG v35 thinQ ( towards the upper end of premium tier Android's ) and once I open the app the sensor is rotated 90¬∞ as stated by the app, I can't seem to get it into the correct orientation, I would love to know how to fix this as to continue my search to see if a app can make a already perfect photo the phone will take and make it better.

App seems to work OK as a camera. However, it refuses to save photos to my SD card, instead only saving to the internal phone memory. It's really a pain in the backside to have to constantly find the new images and move them to the SD card manually. The app provides an unhelpful error message then doesn't save the photo unless I select internal storage.(Fixed!)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, glad to hear its been fixed, thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Evaluator worked. But I wanted to do a time-lapse of the comet with cloud motion and environment. It said it could do up to 50 second exposure. I didn't need that but the native app can do 30 second. I needed about 10 second exposure. It kept erroring at 10 but worked at 8 second. I got 40 frames and now it won't do long exposure at all. Since it took more than two hours to discover the failure I'm now out the cost of a mostly useless app even as I'm discovering more failures.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, I am very sorry to hear that. For longer shutter speeds, some devices have a "cooldown" period. If your timelapse interval does not account for this, the timelapse may stop running. Samsung actively blocks third party apps from accessing long shutter speeds, but in most cases ProShot can get around it. Finding max SHR on it requires testing.

scraped_reviews.content: Needed a new video recording app. Demo worked well on my phone so I bought Proshot. I like 24 fps so I set my video to that - and the viewfinder froze when I hit record. Couldn't see what was recording. Developer got back to me in a day, helped me troubleshoot, figured out 30 and 60 fps will work. Not exactly what I want, but controls are good. Demo app should let you take a, few photos.

Looking into this app as the OnePlus stock camera app is extremely laggy when exiting. ProShot seems good so far but on my OnePlus 11 it doesn't seem to switch to the 0.6x camera, and likewise the 2x camera doesn't seem to work. It has a button for the 0.6x but when I press it the image blurs for a second then returns to the 1x view it was already on. EDIT: legacy mode let me use 0.6x, but not the 2x from what I can tell. Manual modes didn't work.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, I am sorry to hear about the lens issue! OnePlus has been pretty developer-unfriendly with their camera2 API implementation. I'd recommend going to ProShot's Settings > Customize > Lens Mode and switching to either Manual, Manual (Safe Mode), or Legacy to see if either of those help.

scraped_reviews.content: Not the best one yet but still can be an option for a backup camera to remove digital sharpening from Samsung's camera. would be much better if the desharpening function can be more "in effect" because I see that there is still a sharpening on the results. i used samsung s24 exynos version btw. This have a very great future. keep a good work!

ProShot offers more options and control than the default Samsung S23 Ultra camera app, which I really appreciate. However, one issue bothers me: it doesn‚Äôt auto-rotate photos and videos. I usually shoot in landscape and process files on my PC, but unlike the default app, ProShot doesn‚Äôt adjust orientation for proper viewing on a computer or TV. I haven‚Äôt found a setting to enable auto-rotation‚Äîdoes one exist? To me, this is the difference from 3 stars to 5 stars.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, I am sorry to hear you're running into an issue with media rotation. ProShot should auto-rotate photos and videos, but if you have OS rotation lock enabled (or in ProShot's Settings panel) it may interfere with how the OS reports and / or saves rotation metadata. I would first check the Settings panel to make sure rotation lock is not on :)

scraped_reviews.content: Really disappointed with this product. Photos are worse than the stock cameras on my oneplus 13. Close ups are blurry and out of focus. Seems to be stuck on the main lens and won't change. Dissapointed. I would like a refund.

Switching white balance from auto to manual and back to auto messes up. It doesn't return to the initial auto settings until the apo gets restarted. This bug has been present for such a long time now and not yet fixed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, please accept our apologies for the error. We test ProShot on dozens of devices and haven't run into this issue, so it is likely a firmware bug in your Infinix GT 20. In a future update, some of ProShot's camera code will be written to use newer APIs found in Android 16. If your device supports it, we would recommend updating to Android 16.

scraped_reviews.content: This is the best camera app for taking videos because it gives you the most control over frame rates etc. However they seem to be picky over your hardware and software. Runs on a Pixel 7 but they wont let you download from Play Store with non-stock Android e.g. GrapheneOS. Would be five stars if they fixed this restriction - it is the same phone after all (and all other apps work). Using OpenCamera until they patch this.

Initially it didn't work well with the OnePlus 13, but was great on my old S22 Ultra. The developer reached out and helped with one of the major issues I had and now it works much better. Great app and great support from developer. Thank you
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, certain OnePlus phones may require a small tweak in order to work properly. Please go to Settings > Customize > Troubleshooting, and set the Lens Mode to "Legacy". If that does not work, please send me an email and I'd be glad to help: support@riseupgames.com

scraped_reviews.content: Pictures are unusable unsharp and lack any brillance compared with the Pixel 8 stock app. Installing on another device is not allowed. The evaluation version did not allow taking pictures.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, I am sorry to hear the images aren't coming out clear. For the Pixel 8, there is a bug in Google's firmware that causes images to come out soft. To correct it, there are a few options you may need to toggle within ProShot. This is detailed in our online guide, but please feel free to reach out and I'd be glad to help! support@riseupgames.com

scraped_reviews.content: One of, if not the best camera apps on the play store, and I hardly give reviews at all. Absolutely worth the one-time purchase. I do see that it's only detecting the main and selfie camera of my 8849 Tank 3, and doesn't pick up the wide/tele/infrared lenses, so I would absolutely give it 6 stars if an update unlocked these (and perhaps an option to force rescan hardware while retaining the settings)!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for your review! ProShot does its best to make sure all cameras are available, but in some cases the device manufacturer locks 3rd party apps out. One thing you can try is going to Settings > Customize > Lens Mode and selecting the different options (if available) to see if any of them can access more lenses. Hopefully that works!

scraped_reviews.content: Great app, but takes ages to load and sometimes doesn't load at all (Nokia G42). Definitely an app for staged shots, not one I'd use for quick snaps.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, ProShot is a very lightweight app, it should load in under a second on modern hardware, and under 2s on old hardware. If you're not seeing that, please send me a screen recording and I'd be glad to look into it! support@riseupgames.com

scraped_reviews.content: A very good camera app for manual control of settings and intuitive flow. Recommend and worth the money for getting an app for high quality camera shots.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: This app installed xiaomi 15 ultra, pics result is good as compare to lica app in xiaomi , but some time feel oddy lock and it's Night mood not working in xiaomi ultra 15, please provide solution.

Pro Shot is the best camera app, I have used it for years. I bought it for another phone to use with external Bluetooth mic DJI mic 2 pro. The app settings on the drive dial in video mode show it is using this mic, but it is actually using the built-in phone mic so it's useless to me. The developer responded quickly anyway - such a shame, I really do want to use Pro Shot!

Are you kidding me? Who would want to use any other camera app? I would rate it at 5 Stars, but I have every confidence that the creators can add more options. Now, about the question asking whether the app offers storage for no charge. I put NOT SURE because it is an app that is purchased only (i.e., there is not really a free version)... however, it's definitely worth the price! I am a firm believer in improving ourselves, apps included. Still, I love the ProShot app as it is! Thank you!

so far my experience has been good.. but there is no Timer function I can spot.. and no documentation. It would be lovely to set a 10 second timer, go where you need to be and have it take the shot 5 seconds from when you pressed the shutter. maybe I'm just missing it.. but nothing is labelled
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for asking! You can find the timer buttons above the Photo menu when you open the Drive Mode Dial. Its admittedly easy to miss, so we're hoping to improve that discoverability in a future update :)

scraped_reviews.content: The standard Google Pixel camera automatically distorts and edits images it takes, and there is no option to turn it off. This app allows you to take photos without the automatic retouching! Simple to use and with the same level of quality.

This app is a significant improvement on the stock camera for photos, but for video it's night and day difference. It allows shooting in way higher quality, manual setup of ISO, and most importantly, gives you manual focus with peak highlighting. It can squeeze out decent footage even out of a cheap phone's horrible camera, and it's a joy to have all these controls available (and making actual difference). There are some bugs but the customer support was great and very helpful.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Seems great, different options and controls. really excited to try to the different options like light painting. FIXED it won't allow for different lenses. Using Sony Xperia 1 V. evaluator showed all the lenses and check it off. When selecting an different lens, it flickers and makes a ticking noise but won't switch. Everything works fine with the normal camera app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! I'd be glad to help with this. Sony has a quirk on some of their phones when it comes to lens selection. You should be able to resolve this in ProShot by going to Settings > Customize > Lens Mode and setting it to LEGACY.

scraped_reviews.content: Unlocks proper hardware controls and enables camera's full potential. Respect!

App only shows 10 and 13mp for main camera while 13 is only the ultra wide. The 64mp wide is not shown at all. Lens mode is grey out. Images are poor on file size even if I play with jpeg compression. To be honest these problems didn't show up in the evaluator app . Not expecting that my Moto edge 30 will be top notch, but at least expecting the app to be better than the stock app which btw have all the manual modes etc. Anyway , the app itself is worth the cost but is not the best
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, unfortunately Moto is not allowing third party apps to directly access that 64MP resolution. ProShot can still take advantage of the full resolution of the image sensor via lossless digital zoom and super sampling, but the output will alway be about 12MP.

scraped_reviews.content: The app is great, I bought it for Pixel 6, and it worked great, but later it became uninstallable for some reason. the Google Play says it's "unsupported", but it's not unsupported, it can work. Please, fix this problem, so I would be able to download it again from the Google Play
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, I am sorry to hear you're running into installation issues. If you are running a de-Googled OS and are accessing the Play Store through a sandbox, it may not be possible to install ProShot due to updates in Google Play's app integrity policy. At this time ProShot is only available through the Google Play store on non-de-googled OSes.

scraped_reviews.content: when will be version 9 available for android having interface like apple devices. please add support for filters and b&w photography with raw support

As a person who uses mirrorless camera a lot, this app is jewel. I tried many paid and free camera apps before, & as conclusion, I found that this app is truly the answer for photographers who want to use smartphone as their gear. Of course this app is device and OS dependant, that makes several differences in user interface and features in different phone. But most of all, you'll find that this app has the core of photography that not just applying filters. The price is worth it!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: I like everything about ProShot but one thing I can't find is the way to switch to 50MP on my pixel 10pro xl. The stock camera app is pretty wasteful, that's the reason I switched to ProShot. But now I can't shoot at 50MP. Any clue if I can get it working? the max I can see is 12mp.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, unfortunately Google is blocking third party apps from directly accessing the 50MP output. ProShot can still take advantage of the full resolution of the image sensor via lossless digital zoom and super sampling, but the output will always be about 12MP. That said, we're investigating a workaround, but its very early in development.

scraped_reviews.content: The best non-stock camera app on android. Exceptional user interface, great design, and most importantly, PRO VIDEO MODE! I've been looking so long for an app that lets you lock the shutter/iso of a video for filmmaking purposes.

This is by far my favorite camera app. It's got a small learning curve, but spending an hour looking through the settings and testing it out helped a lot in finding the optimal settings for my preference.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: I don't understand why it does capture images in 64 mp. My Oneplus Nord has a 64 mph camera but this app shows 22 mp raw and 8 jprg
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, unfortunately OnePlus is not allowing third party apps to directly access that 64MP output. ProShot can still take advantage of the full resolution of the image sensor via lossless digital zoom and super sampling, but the output is being limited by the device manufacturer.

scraped_reviews.content: I've never seen a camera app that defaults to flash off, and no way to change its default to auto. Completely bizarre. It also appears on my lock screen constantly, even though I don't want it there, ever. Now reports that it is not compatible with my device, after I paid for it!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: I'd be glad to clear things up! If you want to retain your camera settings (like Flash), set the "Resume Settings" option to "On". ProShot will securely run under lock screen if you last had it open when locking your phone (this is an Android feature). ProShot runs well on Pixels, but if you have issues please email me: support@riseupgames.com

scraped_reviews.content: Used to be a little barebones.. that was 6 years ago. Now I am back to using it, and it's the most fantastic app ever! I might have a couple of quirks that I think I should email the dev. In particular for S24 Ultra - the zoom is a bit weird with RAW enabled, and slow motion does not seem to work (even when changing the settings). That's as much as I got for now.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for coming back! ProShot's gone through a lot of changes in that time, with more to come :) I'm aware of the RAW zoom quirk (or when lens mode is set to Manual) on the S22 - S24. It's sadly a bug in Samsung's camera2 API implementation. For slomo try editing the video in Samsung's gallery app, it should (hopefully!) add the slomo effect

scraped_reviews.content: The app works very well. I use it on a Samsung Galaxy S22 plus. Everything works fine (all 3 lenses are available). I like the layout of the controls and the variety of manual parameters. The photo quality is very good - quite similar to those from the native app, but I think that the light balance is a bit better (Samsung tends to warm the colors to some extent). My only complaint is that the exposure compensation slider is thin and hard to operate. I would like to have buttons for +/- 1/3 EV.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for your review, those buttons will be coming in the 9.0 UI update :)

scraped_reviews.content: Some irritating quirks. It's good to be able to access all the camera's settings in an easily findable way (why doesn't the built-in camera app do this). However a real annoyance is that operations on the camera seem to pause my streaming media that I am listening to. And you can only discover this on the paid-for version, not the trial one. [Edit: issue with selfie stick resolved in developer's response.]
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, some selfie sticks send "volume changed" events to the hardware when you press the button. It looks like you may have configured ProShot to change the EV when pressing the volume buttons. You can correct this by going to Settings > Customize > Volume Buttons and changing the behavior to "Default"

scraped_reviews.content: I was looking for an app that could capture DNG/RAW photos in a sustained rapid-fire manner for photogrammetry purposes. I am thrilled to say that ProShot does exactly that by pressing and holding the capture button. As an added bonus, you can choose to capture *only* the RAW format photos, so you don't need to sift through the JPEG's later. Of course, ProShot has all the standard DSLR features you 'd want for a phone, and manual controls for all of them. I cannot stress enough the enormous value of being able to take rapid-fire RAW images for photogrammetry. Absolutely indispensable. If I could rate this higher than 5, I would, just for that feature.

"This app is no longer compatible with your device. Please contact the developer." I have a nothing phone 2, a 2 years old flagship device. What is so specific in this app that the new version won't work there?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, this error will occur if you are trying to download ProShot on a de-googled OS. Google Play's app integrity checks are pretty strict here, but workarounds may be possible depending on the ROM.

scraped_reviews.content: Please stop using Play Integrity API=>anti-competitive scam that does nothing to protect your app, and only stops BUYERS using alternative flavours of Android from using it. Purchase is protected by the Play signature check anyway. Use hardware attestation API if you must. I purchased it but now can't update on my GrapheneOS. Edit: You are not stopping anyone,I gave you the better method already.Pirated versions don't check licence.Rooted phones will lie anyway.SOME HONEST USERS ARE HURT=>SCAM.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, I completely understand. I openly did not add piracy protection to ProShot for nearly a decade, because it's not a fight I want to be in. Unfortunately in recent years my inbox has been flooded with bug reports from pirated copies, which made it difficult to provide support to those who actually own the app. I wish there was a better way.

scraped_reviews.content: This seems like it would be a great app, but on the Xiaomi 15 Ultra, I cannot select any of the lenses except for the default 23mm. Any selection of the 95mm or any other results in a series of errors.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, I believe on some Xiaomi phones you may need to adjust the Lens Mode in ProShot. Please go to Settings > Customize and set the Lens Mode to "Legacy". That should fix it :) If you are still running into issues please send me an email and I'd be glad to help: support@riseupgames.com

scraped_reviews.content: difficult app to adapt to. menu presentation is confusing and really needs simplification. No need to be fancy if people can't understand operation. looking forward to update. have you used dslr's for 20 years so no stranger to them. will update again to give you another comment after update. I'll have more experience with your app then.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for your feedback. ProShot is designed to mimic the operation of traditional DSLRs, so it should be familiar to those who own or have used one. That said, I am always looking for ways to improve the interface to make it more accessible to all levels, and will be doing just that in this year's 9.0 update :)

scraped_reviews.content: Hi, the app is good and i would like to ask i can use it on ios platform with the same purchase on play store or not? Review for recent updates: i have noticed some feature have disappeared now. i had ND filters and long exposures capabilities and now they are gone. i paid for the app to get access to these feature but now not being able to use them kind of sucks,
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for asking. For privacy reasons ProShot does not connect to the internet, so there is no login system to support cross-platform downloads (like Facebook, Instagram, etc for example). ProShot does not have ND filters so I am not sure which feature you are referring to, but please try reinstalling to see if that helps!

scraped_reviews.content: I like it. I wish the cameras were more aggressively controlled. still goodüëç thank you for your effort to provide other camera options to phones like ours that have jarring over sharpened over colored messes

As a photographer looking for more control of my phone camera, this absolutely ticks all the boxes! UI is great, everything is nice and accessible on the fly, plus all that control over settings. Only gripes, found a bug where the app locks up if swapping to an incompatible combo, such as being in slowmo and accidentally changing to wideangle cam which doesn't support the frame rate. It'd also be nice to have the option to have a single button to lock exposure, focus, and white balance at once.

I like the idea of this app, but it is not yet polished enough to be fully recommendable. Specific problems I encountered on a Pixel Fold: 1. When the phone is unfolded although the interface is correct, the actual photos taken are rotated 90 degrees, regardless of the orientation of the phone 2. There is no way to enable 'front-camera selfie mode' All made worse by the rigid no-refund policy so zero option to try before you buy. Buyer beware!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, I am sorry to hear you are running into issues. The Pixel Fold reports its orientation in a non-standard manner, which is I believe is what is causing your issue. The return policy is determined by Google, but is generally a 48 hour window. If you would like a refund please feel free to reach out and I can process it: support@riseupgames.com

scraped_reviews.content: I really like this app! Video is breathtaking! The stereo audio is immersive and full. I wish you could control the audio somehow but it's nothing that can't be resolved in post.

title: Rumble: Videos & Livestreams
description:
Welcome to Rumble: The Future of Video & Live Streaming üöÄ

Tired of censorship and restrictive algorithms, or looking for a true YouTube alternative? Rumble is the freedom-first video-sharing platform built for creators and viewers who believe in free speech and an open Internet. 
Here you can watch live streams, share videos, and even monetize your content, all without the influence of Big Tech. Rumble is a real alternative media platform where your voice truly matters.

üí¨ WHAT OUR USERS SAY ABOUT RUMBLE
‚≠êÔ∏è "Rumble is true free speech and an absolutely amazing source for true news."
‚≠êÔ∏è "Great alternative for YouTube!"
‚≠êÔ∏è "Easy to use platform... Highly recommend getting Rumble Premium and supporting your favorite independent journalists!"
‚≠êÔ∏è "This is the App that America needed as an answer to YouTube‚Äôs corporate control & Censorship! Free Speech lives here. Ready 2 Rumble!"
‚≠êÔ∏è "Rumble beats YouTube! So many diverse opinions in one place."
‚≠êÔ∏è "Great experience, independent, very easy to use, better than YouTube"
‚≠êÔ∏è "I'm very happy with Rumble as a YouTube alternative. I feel safer. Please stay independent."
‚≠êÔ∏è "It's like YouTube with free speech. I watch videos on and have less ads than YouTube."
‚≠êÔ∏è "WAIT, THIS MIGHT BE BETTER THAN YOUTUBE üòÑ I‚Äôm using this forever!"
Join millions of users and top independent creators who have already made Rumble their home for live video, streaming shows, and exclusive content.

üé• WHY RUMBLE IS THE RIGHT VIDEO PLATFORM FOR YOU
Whether you‚Äôre looking for news, politics, podcasts, gaming, sports, or conversations about the culture, Rumble offers a diverse and growing library of videos and live streaming content. Our recommendation system makes it easy to discover viral videos, live streams, and authentic voices you won‚Äôt find anywhere else.

‚Ä¢ Unfiltered & Uncensored: Authentic content and bold creators free from censorship.
‚Ä¢ Seamless Live Streaming: Watch live streams of your favorite channels, chat in real time, and never miss a moment.
‚Ä¢ Explore Trending Videos: Find the most talked-about news, gaming, sports, politics, and cultural content.
‚Ä¢ Smooth Performance: Enjoy reliable video playback and livestreaming on any device.

There‚Äôs a reason Rumble is the fastest-growing video-sharing platform in the world. 50 million users are discovering that creators and livestreams on Rumble are exclusive and can‚Äôt be found anywhere else.

EXCLUSIVE ON RUMBLE: THE LINEUP üéôÔ∏è
Rumble is home to The Lineup, a daily livestreaming schedule where top creators go live every hour to discuss breaking news, politics, and culture:

‚Ä¢ 9am ET ‚Äì Dear America with Graham Allen
‚Ä¢ 10am ET ‚Äì Vince
‚Ä¢ 11am ET ‚Äì Steven Crowder
‚Ä¢ 12pm ET ‚Äì Timcast
‚Ä¢ 1pm ET ‚Äì DeVory Darkins
‚Ä¢ 2pm ET ‚Äì The Quartering
‚Ä¢ 3pm ET ‚Äì Viva Frei + Russell Brand (M/W/F)
‚Ä¢ 4pm ET ‚Äì Redacted
‚Ä¢ 5pm ET ‚Äì The Crucible + Kim Iversen
‚Ä¢ 6pm ET ‚Äì Hayley with BonginoReport and Nick Di Paolo
‚Ä¢ 7pm ET ‚Äì Glenn Greenwald
‚Ä¢ 8pm ET ‚Äì TimcastIRL
Plus: Dr Disrespect bringing live gaming streams to Rumble üéÆ
This exclusive lineup makes Rumble the destination for live and exclusive videos you won‚Äôt find anywhere else.

FEATURES THAT EMPOWER CREATORS üí∞
Rumble is built with the creator in mind. We believe your time and talent should be rewarded, not restricted.

‚Ä¢ Monetize from Day One: Start earning on your videos immediately. No watch-hour or subscriber thresholds.
‚Ä¢ Higher Revenue Splits: Keep more of what you earn with one of the most generous ad revenue shares.

RUMBLE FEATURES AT A GLANCE
‚úÖ Livestreaming & Live Chat
‚úÖ Channel Creation
‚úÖ Video Hosting
‚úÖ Smooth UI & Performance
‚úÖ Video Monetization

Download Rumble today and join the Rumble community. 
Watch live, share videos, and be part of the future of video sharing. 
Free to be entertained. Free to create. Free to speak.

summary: Livestream, news, & gaming content. Watch, chat, and upload. Join Rumble today!

scraped_reviews.content: Great replacement for youtube, but the app still needs a lot of work. Premium completely broke playlists. The queue gets stuck and won't play the next video when the freemium timer runs out. There's also no good way to organize playlists into chronological order. There's also a bug that opens the same video twice, so you get an "echo" and doesn't go away until you close and Reopen the app twice. All these need to be fixed before this becomes a functionally usable app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry for the issue you are facing. Can you share some more details of the issue with our support team at support@rumble.com so that we can help you better.

scraped_reviews.content: Great app except for the frequent crashes and numerous and repetitive ads. The app crashes often, at random times while watching videos and sometimes during the ads. Because of this problem, I'm forced to watch even more ads when I try to play the video again. It's super annoying and frustrating. There's also no way to block spammers and trolls in the live chat, so when they spam messages, there's no way not to see their nonsense. I hope these issues get fixed soon.

This app does not like to work with Android Auto. Occasionally it will let sound through, but most of the time I plays the video with no sound. I know it's not my connection as Spotify works just fine. The ads, while insufferably bad, used to be just 2 per video, and now I get 2 ads every 7 or so minutes. Starting to feel like watching YouTube.

I love the no ads, i like it when you're watching, you can minimize it into a small windows, but it won't allow you to minimize it after a live show ended. it closes it each time which is very annoying. also they need to fix the green bar at the bottom of the video if you've watched it or not. sometimes they pop when I haven't watched it and sometimes they don't show up at all. Just wish these things would get fixed and ill make this 5 stars

I love the app, but I keep having problems with it now suddenly. It no longer plays when I am using other apps. Picture in picture doesn't work. It just closes & then restarts when I open it again. I have to use my phone to clear patient call lights, so I can't listen to Rumble while I work anymore. Please fix this asap! Otherwise, great app. < doing it again üòï

Updated review: Well, Rumble has been getting progressively worse again - randomly freezing, reloading, and closing. I have installed, re-installed, cleared cache, checked for updates - all of it. Rumble used to at least be the one livestream app that could play even when my screen is off. Now, if the screen times out, the podcast/livestream stops playing. YouTube does that, but at least plays smoothly without the lag, buffering & closing out. I don't know what's going on there, but fix it!

This app is suddenly using a lot of battery. it mostly worked well the last year and a half I've had it, but I guess a recent update isn't playing nice with my Pixel 4a; it loads slowly, navigating through the app is slow, live chats are slow, you can't really chat because of it. my phone is getting warm and losing battery faster now when listening to Rumble. the video and audio still play once you get it going so it's still usable, hence at least 3 stars.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. We‚Äôd like to know the details of the problem you mentioned. Please send the details or screenshot to support@rumble.com. We'll pass it along to our development team and see if there is any way we can improve it.

scraped_reviews.content: I run a channel on a few different platforms. this is one of them. Even though I make daily content, my uploads are constantly giving me errors making my page seem inconsistent. I've contacted support and still issues persist. It's been over a year and it is still difficult to get daily uploads as I receive error messages. No matter which device I use or the type of connection. until this gets fixed, my review remains the same

I like that rumble takes a firm stance for free speech but the app is terrible. Doesn't show me what I might be interested in just "featured" stuff and things people are reposting. Sounds like a nice idea to see new people and content but in practice it just shows me nothing I'm interested in. It lags and now has started crashing all the time, can't swipe up or down without it crashing. I would go on but there is a character limit, you guys need to do better, it's 2025, we have the technology.

Edit: Uninstalled app. I watched FOUR ads and then the video didn't play. I'm done. I really want to like Rumble, but I'm a brand new user trying to see what's on here, and the first thing I get slammed with is 2 ads before viewing my very first video. Then when I immediately don't like the video selected and pick another one, only to get slammed with 2 more ads. Then I close the app because there was nothing of value to hold me.

One of the worst apps I have ever used. I have been trying for years and all of the same issues persist. constant crashing, freezing, failing to load, getting kicked out of my account. When any of these happen it never saves where you were in the video you were watching. Terrible search feature. I can find no redeeming features about it at all. Some people I follow only post on Rumble exclusively and I get so annoyed I will miss their content for months at a time because of the frustration.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry for the issue you are facing. Can you share some more details of the issue with our support team at support@rumble.com so that we can help you better.

scraped_reviews.content: It's a glitchy mess and i think it's been over a year since they updated it. Terrible app. They are going to need to step up their game a lot of they want a prayet at competing with youtube. RESPONSE TO DEVELOPERS Well, it was so minor, it went unnoticed. Can't upload videos (ever lasting finalization and crashing), can't delete videos, categories are displayed randomly and i could go on.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there,

We continuously work on updates for our app. The version you're on was released about a month ago. Please contact us at support@rumble.com and share details about the issues you're facing with the app. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: it's OK but when scrolling through the video feed. The previews continuously plays whilst another preview starts playing. And when open a video the preview videos are still playing in the background while you're watching a video you've opened up. Plus pushing ads constantly isn't going to help you get more users. I registered an account because I thought this social network seemed promising. But it's letting me down.

Hot garbage! I was bombarded by a dozen ads and upsell attempts before I got to my first video and then all I could see was the rumble icon. Uninstalling in less than five minutes. Response: I didn't say I wanted no ads, but a dozen ads, plus multiple upgrade upsell requests before I see a single video (that didn't even work) is too much! That's not revenue, that's greed and not caring about your customers!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Ad revenue keeps our platform free to users as it covers the significant costs of hosting millions of videos and supporting creators. If you still feel you want no ads, but want to support creators and Rumble, you can sign up for premium (FIRST MONTH IS FREE) use this code: rumble.com/?premium_checkout=1&promo_code=THANKYOU9089

scraped_reviews.content: For the most part, I'd say this app is great. ads exist but aren't too bad. sometimes can't skip them though, not sure if that's intentional. the e-mail verification seems pretty buggy right now, too. I've had three links sent to my email over the corse of about a month now. but for some reason, it won't stick. Hopefully, that'll be fixed soon. Also, lives sometimes still play even if the app is closed! However, while there are bugs, most of my experience using this app has been very positive.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: All ads should be skippable after 5 seconds. If you're experiencing something different, please contact us at support@rumble.com. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: I want to love this app and give it 5 stars, but whenever I pause a video, it randomly resumes playing without me clicking play. I can't technically keep any video pause cuz eventually it's going to start playing. And it's driving me nuts, I'm on the phone and then my video starts playing üôÑüôÑ I think this app is possessed. I had to uninstall it because it would just start playing even though I have the app completely closed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Alyssa, it looks like you're on an outdated version of the app. Try updating and let us know if this issue continues support@rumble.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Needs better support for podcast style listening. On Spotify I can listen to a 2 hour long podcast in an area with almost no cell coverage and no WIFI, and it is seamless. On Rumble, it stops the playback until I manually play it again. Please add support for downloading the audio/video for offline playback. Otherwise the app has improved greatly!

If you pause a live show, you can't watch the end, which is extremely frustrating. The app sends you to a different show and if you go through the ridiculously confusing process of finding the show you were watching, it says the show ended and it won't load it again. I hate YouTube policies, but their platform is 100% better.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. When behind in livestream and the livestream ends, it begins the process of converting to a VOD. In this situation, you'll either be sent to a new stream, or a the stream ends. We know it's not an elegant solution and we're looking to improve it.

scraped_reviews.content: Watch progress isn't saved, if you quit watching a video it doesn't save your spot and you have to try to remember where you were at. You can't see which videos you have already viewed. The home screen is a bunch of garbage recommendations. search function is horrible. For some reason I can't comment on videos. App crashes constantly and is super buggy. I want to leave YouTube but until rumble makes viewing an enjoyable experience, I can't make the switch. (still not a premium app).
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, Please try updating to the latest version of the app. If you continue to experience this problem, contact support@rumble.com. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: Where is the app for PCs? When I'm not at work, I like to listen on my computer instead of my phone. Why is there no computer app? As for the phone app, I find it hit-or-miss. When I'm driving around at work (I work for the Post Office), the audio will stutter and break up. It's annoying when I have to pause and restart the audio every other minute. Sometimes, I have to restart the app completely. Very frustrating. But, when it works, it works perfectly.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, we don't offer an app for PCs but you can reach us in your web browser at https://rumble.com/. If you're experience video playback issues with the app, please contact us at support@rumble.com for assistance. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: Whenever I watch a video late or pause it and then start again (whenever I'm not live), I get kicked out of the video every time the livestream ends (it's very annoying. Then I have to go back in (and get hit with more ads) only to find it's not working for several minutes. Then I have to keep trying to go back in (and get hit with more ads) until it finally lets me back into the video. And then I have to zip through it until I find my spot where I was kicked out. Very annoying....

Few items that knock the ratings down, make it so you can disable raiding. Raiding sucks! Fix the intermittent sound drop every other second. This happens in any android device i have and needs to be addressed. If in browser, this doesn't happen.Lastly, when i force close the app, the video continues to play. I have to reopen the app and force close it again in order to stop. Sometimes it doesn't work so when you open another stream, the precious stream and current run over each other, no bueno!

get it together. I've been paying for a few years now. Today alone have dealt w your app glitching 3 times forcing app closure. and install a "play all" button on content creator pages if you cant get you playlist more user friendly. I'm a huge advocate of free speech so I stick around. But if a new platform could do the same better.... well I'd rather spend my money there at this point.

Horrible viewing experiences now. You used to run flawlessly, but now there are so many ads, that freeze, stop, buffer, that the listening experience is ruined. I'll find another avenue to view the videos I enjoy watching. üò≥üôÑü§î P.S. and because of how intrusive the ads are, in addition to being annoying, I would not purchase any of what they are pushing! üí•üí£üí•
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Ad revenue keeps our platform free to users as it covers the significant costs of hosting millions of videos and supporting creators. If you still feel you want no ads, but want to support creators and Rumble, you can sign up for premium (FIRST MONTH IS FREE) use this code: https://rumble.com/?premium_checkout=1&promo_code=THANKYOU0897

scraped_reviews.content: Things like "Top live categories" should be at the top, and MUCH smaller. like buttons with various categories instead. you could also have a LOT more categories, while taking up less space, and being much more pleasing to look at. Also- are there any anti theft features on there? I'm seeing a lot of stolen videos from various yt creators. Also, seeing tons of lives immediately after opening the app is a bit jarring. They could be in a separate page from home, and in a category of their own.

Not sure what happened but the app used to work great when I closed my screen but ever since the last two updates it shuts off when the screen is dark after a few minutes. I've tried everything, uninstalling, rebooting, reinstalled with the same problem. a friend of mine is having rhe same problem. please fix this, it used to work great a month ago!

I like the things I can access through the app, the problem I have is the app is what I call, a narcissistic app. meaning, I can't do anything else with my phone, while listening to something on the app. if My screen turns off, or I turn it off myself, the app goes silent, and I have to go in and reinitialize whatever I was listening to. not cool.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jonathan, sorry to hear about issues you're facing with background play. Please contact support@rumble.com so we can troubleshoot this with you!

scraped_reviews.content: Uninstalled......sad that this app does not have a 'block user' option. Rumble is quickly becoming another version of FakeBook! Too bad. 9/2025....will try once more. Well, that didn't take long. Rumble is now full of ad after ad after ad! Plus it will not let you post more than one comment. Yes, the woke and left now rule over the once great 'Rumble'. bye

Recent updates just load a black screen that spins. As soon as I minimize I see it's trying to load an ad and fails. Going in via browser page works fine. Also, you used to be able to watch free portions of shows, while they were still streaming their premium portions. Now you cannot, it interrupts and blocks you from watching the free portion till they are done streaming. Edit: even after recent updates, issue persists.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, Please try updating to the latest version of the app. If you continue to experience this problem, contact support@rumble.com. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: I love the service. The app could use a bit more work. I am echoing what others have been saying. Hopefully, it'll get through from enough of us. Rumble doesn't behave like any of the other mature media players. Rumble should support "picture in picture" where the app can be minimized but the playing video remains in a small widow. Rumble should have the option to continue playing while the app is in the background or the screen is off. Rumble should actually integrate with the phone where, for example, it shows up in the list of phone notifications and can be played/paused from there. Or where it can be played/paused from Bluetooth earbuds, car stereos, etc. It doesn't have any of this integration. It behaves more like a desktop application that's been cross-compiled into an App... and not actually developed as a cellphone App from the start.

Wish it didn't lose my place when I go back to finish watching videos. This used to take me back to where I left off. Very frustrating having to try to find it. Otherwise love this app!!! Update: they are playing annoying ads every 2 min during the podcasts! Yuk!! Please go back to playing at the beginning of the shows! This is annoying enough to consider not using the app anymore. :(

Pretty good, when it works. I can deal with the fact that it's much clunkier than YouTube, because I understand that it's a work-in-progress, and is presumably consistently being updated and improved. What I CAN'T deal with is the fact that I have to log in to use it, but that I can almost never do so. The app appears to log me in, then just returns to the login page with no error. So most of the time, I can't use the app at all.

I have always loved using this app. I can get content here that I can't get on YouTube and I use it often to watch x22, and we know, and Dan Bongino. But since you've started offering a subscription, the ads I get are absolutely ridiculous! I get at least 1 ad every 10 minutes. It's taken me almost an hour to watch 40 minutes of an x22 episode and I finally am so frustrated with having to stop what I'm doing to skip ads every 10 minutes. I can't afford to go ad free and I'm about to delete!

Great content but the app has some serious shortcomings. If you tune in to a "live" event part way through and go back to the beginning, when the "live" event ends it also shuts down your feed and doesn't allow to restart for quite awhile. Also it would be helpful to separate "shows," between full events and clips, put them in completely different search groups.

Love the concept of rumble and overall think it's great. I just have a few minor complaints. When I try to click and drag the time scroll on a video, it is extremely difficult to get it. I often miss it because it is way too small. When I watch a live video and I have to pause it a lot, then when the actual live feed ends, my video ends also even though I'm still watching. This also makes me lose my spot in the video.

I want to love this, but I can't! Please fix these bugs, and I'll gladly change this to 5 stars. App crashes all of the time--somtimes after a few min. Then I get to reopen, search for my video, rewatch ads, and try to find where I left off. Please fix this, as well as add a "watch later" section so I don't have to keep searching for my videos.

Right now...the app SUCKS! It crashes regularly! I am unable to "like" videos - I get an error message. Nothing is showing on my home page. Can't easily find creators I follow, including one that Rumble has a deal with - this creator is also the reason I joined Rumble!!! This app needs a lot of work! Step up your game or you will never be able to compete with other streaming tech!

I like the app, however, I like to watch live content starting late so I can watch it at a faster speed. Two problems: if I catch up to live TV, the speed does not reset back to normal, so I get a jumpy video. Second, if the live show ends, but I haven't reached the end, I am cut off and the app sets me to start over from the beginning.

Doesn't work properly in a few ways, purchased the premium membership twice in one month and it never actually works, ads don't stop, and when I go to check there's no proof that I ever purchased it. It doesn't play when I lock my screen anymore. Which is something I used to be able to do. Why isn't this fixed yet? Notifications are obnoxious. Get the same notifications repeatedly and emails as well. It's too much.

I'd give this 5 stars in a heartbeat if this app's UI was even slightly better. It doesn't recall where you left off on a video. Gives continual errors when attempting to "rumble", comment etc. It won't allow me to follow anyone, so I have to search for channels every single time I want to watch anything. The premise and stance in favor of free speech as a platform is great, so it's a 3 star until the actual usability improves.

Love the concept of more free speech. what I don't love are the (at least) 2 ads that come on when, for example tuning in to Dan Bongino's podcast at 11AM EST. Some ads are over a minute long before the "Skip Ad" notification comes on to tap it. Get rid of them. I do have to say, fortunately that's not AS annoying as YouTube, when you're watching a "How To" video or song and it cuts to those ghastly ads every few minutes.

Just got the app a short few days ago, but so far my experience has been amazing. I really want to give it a 5 star but I just feel like something is still missing. I think it's the adds. I am slightly biased since I have had youtube premium since it was first released as youtube red and I haven't seen an add in years. But they aren't bad. I have yet to see more than 1 add on Any vid, and most of the ones I watch are over an hour. Looking forward to staying and watching it grow!!!

Rumble is a fantastic service, in the browser. The mobile app however has an echo for live streams that the mobile browser version does not, throws an unknown error when hitting the Rumble button on content, and has no live chat for streams. My home page is just blank no matter what. Needs lots of work, I reccomend using the mobile browser version for now because it all works. This should be relatively easy, but I dont know what else they are trying to do under the hood of this mobile app.

The app is getting better, and I appreciate having a YouTube alternative. However, please make a dark mode. I sometimes use the app at night, and the white background is annoying when I play videos while struggling to sleep. I also wish it would remember what point in a video I was at after closing a video and reopening it. Could also use the ability to search for the next video I want to watch while still listening to the current one.

Absolutely love there's a better option than YT. I'm still hoping for a way to tell what I've watched while scrolling a channel. My biggest complaint is not being able to start on my phone and cast to any Roku we have (speaker bar specifically). It's a loading circle, they tells me to make sure it's on the same WiFi network, then says there is nothing to cast to. I do this with YT and have no issue.

Your app uses far more data than it should. I had a video paused. PAUSED!!! And in the span of 1 day, your app gobbled up 15 gigabytes of data. AND IT DID SO WHILE BEING IN THE BACKGROUND! I had other apps active the whole time. So I had to turn off wifi on this tablet, and KEEP it turned off. I'll turn it on, only when necessary, like to write this review. Please fix your data leak.

The app used to be great but after some 'upgrades' has become next to useless. One used to be able to listen to something in the background now it cuts off. Want to listen to your favorite podcast in your vehicle while also using your GPS? Sorry. Tough luck. Want to play where you left off after being cut off? Enjoy listening to some ads again. Very disappointing.

I just changed my mind. I was trying to get more involved with this app but, it's janky af. I can't even figure out how to put a profile picture up. I can't pause your videos with my earbuds. You don't keep any history of watched videos, so when the app gets closed I gotta guess where I was in the video. I only come here mostly to watch Crowder. And some other deleted videos from YouTube. But you are not winning me over. I have a plethora of other issues, get to work rumble. Make this better.

Thank you for fixing the autoplay bug! It's much better now. However, it seems that the 240p option has been removed and the player struggles to play consistently at any higher resolution (I can't ever watch livestreams). I imagine people don't always have the best service, so 240p (or smaller) is essential. Also, if I select anything other than auto (360p, 480p, etc.) it shuts the player down and says "something went wrong", which requires a restart of the application.

I absolutely love this platform! My issue is that there are some bugs that prevent basic operation (ie. unable to comment on videos or "rumble" the videos) without getting an error message. I also wish it would have a few additional features, like having a history of the videos you watched. Besides that, I highly recommend this app, and using this Rumble platform! I cannot wait for more people to begin adopting Rumble, so that there is a lot more content on here.

title: Alibaba.com - B2B marketplace
description:
What is Alibaba.com?
Alibaba.com is one of the world‚Äôs leading B2B ecommerce marketplaces. Our app allows you to source products from global suppliers, all from the convenience of your mobile device.

Purchase with confidence
Our Trade Assurance service protects your orders and payments on the platform, letting you purchase securely and conveniently with extended support.

Customizable products
Meet suppliers with years of customization and order fulfillment experience for sellers on Amazon, eBay, Wish, Etsy, Mercari, Lazada, Temu and more.

Easy sourcing
Discover millions of ready-to-ship products in every industry category. Tell suppliers what you need and get quotes quickly with Request for Quotation services.

Fast shipping
Alibaba.com partners with major freight forwarders to provide land, sea, and air shipping solutions with on-time delivery services, end-to-end tracking, and competitive prices.

Livestreams and factory tours
Interact with manufacturers in real-time via product demos and tours of manufacturing facilities, providing insight and oversight on how your products are made.

Popular categories and trade shows
Source a wide range of popular items ‚Äì from trending consumer goods to raw materials ‚Äì and join our annual trade shows for niche product highlights and discounts.

Quality control
Choose Alibaba.com Production Monitoring and Inspection Services to reduce production delay and quality risks.

Discounts and promotions
Unlock new discounts and promotions from featured manufacturers and suppliers.

Stay updated
Use the Alibaba.com app to stay up to date on new products and promotions from your favorite suppliers.

Language and currency support
Alibaba.com supports 17 languages and 54 local currencies. Use our real-time translator to communicate with sellers in your mother tongue.

summary: A world-leading B2B marketplace

scraped_reviews.content: This app is a glitchy, ad-filled nightmare pretending to be great. Scroll through the ‚Äú5-star‚Äù reviews and you‚Äôll see the same fake hype over and over ‚Äî clearly written by bots. Alibaba‚Äôs app doesn‚Äôt deliver, it just tries to trick you into thinking it does. Save yourself the headache.

Buyer beware! They have tons of listings that allow you to place items in your cart, checkout and pay. When you pay, there is a 3% transaction fee from Alibaba. Then the suppliers will message you saying their prices have increased, the items are out of stock or shipping costs more. If you don't want to pay the increase, you cancel the order. Guess who refuses to refund the transaction fees. You might think this happens sometimes. Nope. So far it's been 33% of the orders I've placed. SCAM!

This app is most disappointing this year compared to 2018. Buying products for my personal use is now a futile endeavor. It has proven to be an unnecessary hassle and too much of my valuable time was consumed. The number of options are very limited pertaining to the number of brands, colors, design, and size. Previously (2018) I was able to order just what I needed for my personal use. I see the prices of their (limited brands) products and shipping have risen dramatically.

CYBER BULLY MARKETING!! I would seriously appreciate NOT being forced into the play store to download an app just because I would like to read about one product that came up in a search. Intrusive, forceful, deceptive. It's like pop up spam at its absolute worst-case and makes the thought of buying anything with this company seem like a most probable mistake in the long run. If that's what it's like to not have the app, I can't imagine the nonsense of what must go in if it's downloaded.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry for your experience. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us and we will assist you shortly: https://ai.alimebot.alibaba.com/intl/index.htm?from=acYpMgJcEFKz

scraped_reviews.content: I enjoyed the app, selection, etc. Until I got to the ordering. Everything appeared to be in order, but when I placed my order, I received a message that I would have to wait for an agent to confirm and contact me. The next day, I received a message that my purchase was "accepted" but that shipping would be more than double what I had seen in the order. Their excuse was because "branded" products are more sensitive so they cost more to ship. Dishonest and deceitful supplier.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry for your experience. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us and we will assist you shortly: https://ai.alimebot.alibaba.com/intl/index.htm?from=acYpMgJcEFKz

scraped_reviews.content: It's just a little hard finding things you want. What I may think it will be and what they will have interpreted to say for sale are two different things App works very smoothly. No problems with it on my droid phone and it updates just fine. Installed 3 different phones & office computer. On my phone for over a year. Makes researching new products and styles very easy. Cuts out the middleman. Too much to look at. LOL

To confusing!!. If I want to order something you start the order with shipping info. The you have to contact seller and I am not sure, but I think I am waiting on a seller to respond, which 2 hours later, nothing. Now I have lost interest. You have to do this for each item you order. Havent even gotten to the payment part yet. Lost interest in ordering. Deleting app

The whole experience was just bad. Written instructions were broken, like a second language. Zoom commands do not fully respond. But those are just the little things. Vendors are shady, trying to manipulate terms of a sale. And either multiple vendors sell the exact same item, or they steal the same photo. I had to cancel every negotiation because of this nonsense, and will never recommend this to anyone.

The items are great, but when I click on one of the variation options and add enough that I more than satisfy the minimum requirement, then press the "Send inquiry" button. it just shows a black screen and I have to can't send an inquiry after adding over the minimum quantity. I can get back via phones back button, but can't buy anything. Please assist. I'm on a Pixel 7 Pro running Android 14. Thanks!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we are sorry to hear that. Do share additional screenshots/videos (they are generally very helpful for trouble-shooting) at https://m.alibaba.com/feedback/contact.html?feedback_id=5320506&language=en to enable us to assist you further.

scraped_reviews.content: I love browsing the site. I wish there were more clarification on all profiles like: Clarity on Shipping Cost, I have no idea what's the real shipping cost the way its formatted gives a unsure feeling not knowing if it's a deal or not, real or not. For example: I am browsing this site as I type this, searching for a good deal on USA E26 Electrical Cord with a Adjustable on/off Switch for Hanging Lamps, plus more. But like so many times over the years, I've not bought yet. Im just unsure. I like

If your only checking ebay when you need something, especially something electronic or some larger purchase, you'd be missing out if you didn't give Alibaba a whirl first . Extremely competitive environment with (at least so far) parallel ethics and safeguards to ensure you get what you ordered. Not as fast as some others yet ... but I've found it to be well worth the wait. And the icing on the cake?... So far, the customer service has been top shelf. My rep.Miguel is definitely underpaid :)

Not happy with my experience. I have purchased many things on this site and it's a gamble everytime! The items don't match the photos what a complete scam!!! When I try to get a refund the Supplier declines and Alibaba is on the Supplier side everytime and the Buyer has to take a loss . There needs to be some changes. The Supplier needs to be band for stealing photos and trying to copy and create the item because it never comes out like the photo! Unbelievable !!!!

No protection from fraud! Seller keeps giving tracking numbers and they it never makes it to USA. 1st order placed was amazing and now its FRAUD and "trade assurance" is a joke! Also you can only rate a supplier if it is a good rating, if you say anything negative, it disappears and the option is removed! Keep this in mind! I had 3 great orders but the second fraud happened, they stand firm with the seller and have no guarantee to refund you as long as the seller provides a tracking number.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry for your experience, we provide following solutions for your feedback, please click https://m.alibaba.com/feedback/contact.html?feedback_id=4456168&knowledge_id=20111516&language=en for further assistance.

scraped_reviews.content: Stay away. Had ordered an item. They claimed it arrived within a few days but it never did. There was no tracking information provided to confirm this item did arrive, but it was virtually impossible to put in a claim that there was an issue. I had to go through credit card to get money back. I wouldn't trust any of these reviews... that are positive. High chance they are bots.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we are sorry to hear that. Do share additional screenshots/videos (they are generally very helpful for trouble-shooting) at https://m.alibaba.com/feedback/contact.html?feedback_id=5427590&language=en to enable us to assist you further.

scraped_reviews.content: It's all around a great app except for the face that I cannot send files through their messenger, only pictures. It is pretty inconvenient since I need to Share other files besides pictures with my suppliers. Please take note of this! to be more specific, i would like to share files (pdf, xls, doc.) and have no option to do so through the app. that is a necessary improvement to answer your question
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. Could you tell us more about your concern, like which function need to improve?

scraped_reviews.content: this app is a little difficult to navigate and quite frankly impossible to keep track of conversations. It's a convoluted mix of request for quotes and responses. There's no real history as far as what you're discussing. They have different chats and conversations in different places I can't figure out how to keep track of them and it quickly got so confusing I don't even want to order anything.

Prices are great. The only issue I had (for me, this is a huge issue). The items that I had purchased that came out to $285 was not delivered. Stated it was delivered but came to find out items were delivered to the wrong address, and the seller did nothing to fix the issue except make me run in circles trying to fix a problem that wasn't my problem! Never again will I purchase from overseas!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry for your experience, we provide following solutions for your feedback, please click https://m.alibaba.com/feedback/contact.html?feedback_id=4046865&knowledge_id=1000129338&language=en for further assistance.

scraped_reviews.content: This is one of most valuable companies in the world and they give us this app? Messages take ages to come through on the app, frequently messages can't be sent, files take forever to open, and every single time you open it, it has to reload and shows you an ad screen. If there was a sightly worse way of buying goods from Chinese with a usable app, I'd definitely make the switch!

This sight is ridiculous. The way everything is set up is so confusing. I put things in my cart to order, and it tells me that the quantity isn't enough. Then, when I try to enlarge the order, there isn't any way to accomplish it. On top of that, I sent a message to a seller with specific questions only to receive "Hi" as a response. I'm uninstalling and find a much easier app to deal with..

Nice shopping app. If you have to dispute something they always intervene. But once I accidentally inputted $0 as my request refund (it was just $0 by default) and they accepted the dispute but I got no money out of it (and it was $40!). There's no way to dispute it again and no one to contact. That was just unlucky though, overall this app is good. Just be catios when disputing something, if you don't dot every i or cross every t, you'll loose your chance.

I love the many selections to choose from with this app, but shipping costs are outrageous for minimal orders. Had to request refund because an entire month went by, and seller never shipped my order. Seems like everyone on there is a bot and you can't ever get any answers.
